31b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/byang chub sems dpa'
32a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor nyan thos gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod cing ston pa dang 'chad cing 'grel
32a2(nyi khri): pa dang /rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa dang /yang dag par ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig
32a3(nyi khri): par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//dran pa nye bar
32a4(nyi khri): bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan
32a5(nyi khri): lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
32a6(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
32a7(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
32b1(nyi khri): brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /chos kyi dbyings ni byang chub sems
32b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
32b3(nyi khri): ston par rig par bya ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni lam mo//pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o//pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni sgron ma'o//blo'o//shes pa'o//shes rab bo//pha rol tu
32b4(nyi khri): phyin pa drug ni dpung gnyen no//pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyabs so//pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni mgon no//pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ma'o//pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni pha'o//dran pa nye bar
32b5(nyi khri): bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
32b6(nyi khri): brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa
32b7(nyi khri): brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin
33a1(nyi khri): rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas
33a2(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
33a3(nyi khri): ni lam mo//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snang ba'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sgron ma'o//blo'o//shes pa'o//shes rab bo//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dpung gnyen
33a4(nyi khri): no||lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni skyabs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni mgon no//lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ni ma'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pha'o//rnam pa thams
33a5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di
33a6(nyi khri): dag ni/'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi'ang
33a7(nyi khri): yab dang yum du gyur to//rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhini gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par
33b1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi'ang yab dang yum du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po
33b2(nyi khri): 'di dag ni da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi'ang yab dang
33b3(nyi khri): yum du gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di los byung ba ni 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/rab 'byor de bas na
33b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya
33b5(nyi khri): bar 'dod pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan pa
33b6(nyi khri): dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa ste/rab 'byor ngas don gyi dbang de mthong bas/'di skad du 'di lta ste/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
33b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang /ma dang pha dang /dpung gnyen dang /skyabs dang /mgon yin no zhes brjod do//rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
34a1(nyi khri): bau gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya bar 'dod pa dang /gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bcad par 'dod pa dang /
34a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o//de ci'i phyir
34a3(nyi khri): zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan to//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom
34a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab
34a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni med pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan
34a6(nyi khri): 'das mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis
34a7(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa de nyid kyi chos thams cad yod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
34b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o//chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa'o//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na
34b2(nyi khri): 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad yod do//rab 'byor gyis
34b3(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben la/chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam
34b4(nyi khri): par byang ba'ang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur//
34b5(nyi khri): rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/dben pa dang stong pa nyid ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong mi rgya/dben pas ni stong pa nyid la chos gang
34b6(nyi khri): yang mi dmigs/dben pas ni stong pa nyid la sems can gang byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu mi dmigs na/bcom ldan 'das bstan pa de'i don bdag gis
34b7(nyi khri): ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba la spyod dam/gsol
35a1(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lags so bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gir bgyi ba la spyod do//bcom ldan
35a2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya ba dben zhing stong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dben no//bde bar gshegs pa
35a3(nyi khri): stong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing /kun tu 'khor bar
35a4(nyi khri): gyur tam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/bdag dang bdag gir bgyi bas sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing kun tu 'khor
35a5(nyi khri): bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa yod pa yin te/gang la bdag tu bya ba med pa dang /bdag gir bya
35a6(nyi khri): ba med pa de la 'dzin pa med/gang la 'dzin pa med pa de la sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing /kun tu 'khor ba med de/de la kun nas nyon mongs pa gang yang med pas/rab 'byor
35a7(nyi khri): de ltar na sems can rnams kyi rnam par byang ba yod pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni gzugs la mi spyod/tshor
35b1(nyi khri): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/skye mched dang /khams la mi spyod/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi spyod/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mo spyod/
35b2(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma
35b3(nyi khri): spyod/nang stong pa nyid la mo spyod/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi spyod/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
35b4(nyi khri): dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa la mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs
35b5(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug po dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par
35b6(nyi khri): shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgro la mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje
35b7(nyi khri): chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mi spyod/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang /gang gis spyod pa dang /
36a1(nyi khri): gang la spyod par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigs so//bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang /blo dang /
36a2(nyi khri): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi thub pa ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil
36a3(nyi khri): gyis non par mi nus so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis mi non pa la gnas pas/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
36a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni zil gyis mi non pa ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
36a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can ji
36a6(nyi khri): snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par 'gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/de dag nam 'tsho'i
36a7(nyi khri): bar du bzhugs pa la/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod par byas te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med
36b1(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom/
36b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
36b3(nyi khri): gzhan la ston pa dang /'chad pa dang /rnam par gzhog pa dang /rab tu gzhog pa dang /'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed pa dang /gsal bar byed pa dang /yang dag par ston pa dang /shes
36b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
36b5(nyi khri): bar gyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par me'i lus thob par gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la/
36b6(nyi khri): de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bista stang du byas/mchod pa byas te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med
36b7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol
37a1(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
37a2(nyi khri): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /'chad pa dang /rnam par gzhog pa dang /rab tu gzhog pa dang /'grel po dang /rnam par 'byed pa dang /gsal bar byed
37a3(nyi khri): pa dang /yang dag par ston pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor gal te dzam+ba
37a4(nyi khri): gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi mod par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
37a5(nyi khri): la rab tu bkod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
37a6(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
37a7(nyi khri): la rab tu bkod de/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mi
37b1(nyi khri): de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang
37b2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /'chad pa dang /rnam par gzhog pa dang /rab tu gzhog pa dang /'grel pa dang /rnam par
37b3(nyi khri): 'byed pa dang /gsal bar byed pa dang /yang dag par rab tu ston na/de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor gral te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
37b4(nyi khri): kyi bar gyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'o las kyi lam
37b5(nyi khri): la rab tu bkod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
37b6(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab
37b7(nyi khri): tu bkod de/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i
38a1(nyi khri): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs
38a2(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /'chad pa dang /rnam par gzhog pa dang /rab tu gzhog pa dang /'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed
38a3(nyi khri): pa dang /gsal bar byed pa dang /yang dag par ston na/de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
38a4(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par 'byed pa ni/sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de bzhin
38a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de lta bu ni sems can gang la'ang
38a6(nyi khri): med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub ste/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
38a7(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can thams cad gsod par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar lta ste/de dag snying rje chen po 'thob bo//de dag rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod pas/dga' bas rab tu
38b1(nyi khri): dga' ba dang /mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par bsgrub bo//de dag mtshan ma dri dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo//rag
38b2(nyi khri): 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
38b3(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o//rigs kyi bu de dag ni
38b4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyus kyang /sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/bla na med pa ying dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
38b5(nyi khri): las phyir mi ldog go/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir su'i gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad
38b6(nyi khri): la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang /sbyin bdag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa'o/
38b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po don yod par khams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyad par 'dod pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang /snang ba chen po dbyung bar 'dod pa
39a1(nyi khri): dang /khams gsum gyi btson ra na gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig
39a2(nyi khri): bskyed par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyun miched par gnas par bya'o//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
39a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar rnam par spyod na'ang /des yid la bya ba gzhan gyi go mi dbye ste/ngos ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
39a4(nyi khri): ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtong zhing brtson par gnas pa de ltar bya'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sngon tshad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la/des dus gzhan
39a5(nyi khri): zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/des nor bu rin po che de rnyed pas dga' ba dang /spro ba dang /yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar
39a6(nyi khri): gyur na/de'i rgyus sdug bsngal dang /yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kyi hud bdag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che de dang bral bar gyur to//
39a7(nyi khri): zhes/nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sha stag rgyun tu 'byung ngo //rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni rin po che'o snyam du bsams
39b1(nyi khri): te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che de sbyor bar yang mi bya ste/de ltar na rtag tu bdo
39b2(nyi khri): dang /yid bde ba mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das yid la bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/yid la bgyi ba thams cad kyang
39b3(nyi khri): rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyi ba dang ma bral ba lags/bral ba
39b4(nyi khri): ni byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs/yid la bgyi ba mi dmigs/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te byang
39b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de dag ni nyan thos kyis ma byas/rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
39b6(nyi khri): rnams kyis kyang ma mdzad de/chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de
39b7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni gnas pa yin no zhes bya bar shes na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
40a1(nyi khri): byin pa dang ma bral ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis dben/rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/de
40a2(nyi khri): la 'phel ba med do//yongs su 'grib pa med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis dben zhing /rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na//
40a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par byung zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
40a4(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
40a5(nyi khri): yang dag par byung yang 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med de/de bzhin nyid la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib pa med do//chos kyi dbyings la 'phel ba 'am yongs su 'grib
40a6(nyi khri): ba med do//yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gcig kyang ma yin/gnyis kyang ma yin
40a7(nyi khri): no//rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dzum mi 'gong /mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i
40b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dbyings la gnas pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya
40b2(nyi khri): bar rtogs par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stong pa nyid dang /gsog nyid dang /gso ba nyid dang /rag lus pa nyid
40b3(nyi khri): dang /snying po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom
40b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos gang yang dmigs su mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
40b5(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci legs/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
40b6(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin
40b7(nyi khri): no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/stong pa nyid las gud na stong pa nyid spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/
41a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa shes
41a2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'dras ci lags/skye mched dang /khams
41a3(nyi khri): dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan
41a4(nyi khri): 'das ci lags/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
41a5(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
41a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mi med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa
41a7(nyi khri): dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
41b1(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/rnam pa
41b2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci
41b3(nyi khri): lags/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang /gsog nyid dang /gsob nyid dang /rag lus pa nyid dang /snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan
41b4(nyi khri): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dgu pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de
41b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/tshor ba dang /'du shes
41b6(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid dang /gsog nyid dang /gso ba nyid dang /rAg lus pa nyid dang /snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de
41b7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam
42a1(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan
42a2(nyi khri): 'das ci lags/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i stong pa nyid dang /gsog nyid dang /gsob nyid dang /rug lus pa nyid dang /snying po ma mchis pa nyid
42a3(nyi khri): dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid
42a4(nyi khri): dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin
42a5(nyi khri): no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
42a6(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang /ched med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang //
42a7(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
42b1(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi tsho snga ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid dang //
42b2(nyi khri): gsog nyid dang /gsob nyid dang /rag lus pa nyid dang /snying po ma mchis pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid
42b3(nyi khri): dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/
42b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na/bcom
42b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du
42b6(nyi khri): sems/chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
42b7(nyi khri): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom
43a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni me lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/chos gang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su
43a2(nyi khri): yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/chos gang dmigs su med pa de skye ba
43a3(nyi khri): 'am/'gags par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
43a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ste/rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
43a5(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/rab 'byor de ni stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
43a6(nyi khri): pa'i lam zhes bya ste/lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod/de ltar rtsol/de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
43a7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi ye shes/ye shes chen po/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
43b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/de'i chos de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar
43b2(nyi khri): du nam yang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las/byang chub sems
43b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol
43b4(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/skye ba'ang ma lags/mi skye ba'ang ma lags pa las/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
43b5(nyi khri): lung bstan tam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te skye ba'ang ma lags/mi skye ba'ang ma lags pa las
43b6(nyi khri): kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na med pa
43b7(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
44a1(nyi khri): byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan
44a2(nyi khri): 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das chos
44a3(nyi khri): gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang
44a4(nyi khri): dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
44a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po ni/'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o//'di ni mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
44a6(nyi khri): bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog
44a7(nyi khri): pade dag thams cad med pa'i phyir te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa
44b1(nyi khri): lasa?/le'u bzhi bcu lnga pa'o////de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol//
44b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o//blta dka' ba'o//rtogs par dka' ba'o//brtag tu ma mchis pa'o//brtag pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa'o//zhi ba phra ba zhib pa'o//
44b3(nyi khri): mkhas shing rig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /'chang zhing klog pa dang /kun chub
44b4(nyi khri): par bgyid pa dang /de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/sems dang sems las byung ba'i
44b5(nyi khri): chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni/dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/sems
44b6(nyi khri): can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /'chang zhing klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par
44b7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni/dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma
45a1(nyi khri): rgyunason no//kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ngam+bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur/bas ma g+ha /
45a2(nyi khri): bzhi dang /ched med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur la/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig
45a3(nyi khri): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang la/klog cing kun chub par byed par gyur te/gzung zhing bcangs te/klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /de bzhin
45a4(nyi khri): nyid du nan tan byed na/kau sho ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la snga ma'i dge ba'i rdza bo des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//sbyong gi chu dang /brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya
45a5(nyi khri): phrag stong gi byar gyi cha dang /grangs dang /cha dang /bgrang ba dang /dpe dang /rgyur yang mi bzod do//de nas dge slong gcig cig gis lho'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
45a6(nyi khri): smras so//kau shri ka dzam+bu gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa/tshad med pa bizhi dang ldan pa/gzugs med pa'i snyoms
45a7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi g.yeng
45b1(nyi khri): pa'i sems kyis 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing bla na med pa yang dag
45b2(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi gro mi 'byed pa de dag gis zil gyis non to//de skad
45b3(nyi khri): ces smras pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so//dge slong jem+bu gling gi sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/bsam gtan
45b4(nyi khri): bzhi dang ldan pa/ched med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/de dag thams cad byang chub sems
45b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pas kyang zil gyis non na/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa
45b6(nyi khri): dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /gzung zhing bcangs te/klags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang /de bzhin
45b7(nyi khri): nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis non par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni lha dang /
46a1(nyi khri): mI dang /lhum smin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cid 'gro bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de l+yA dang /myi dang /lham
46a2(nyi khri): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir
46a3(nyi khri): mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba
46a4(nyi khri): dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas su'ang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
46a5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha
46a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
46a7(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba/de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang
46b1(nyi khri): mazad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/shes
46b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/byang chub sems
46b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/thabs mkhas pa dang dral ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
46b4(nyi khri): byin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems
46b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
46b6(nyi khri): bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
46b7(nyi khri): po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis gnon par mi nus so//byang
47a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bra la spyod pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji skad du bstan pa dang mthun par spyod/
47a2(nyi khri): ba ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi bcad pa'i don du gnas pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
47a3(nyi khri): po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ring du mi byed do//de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub dang 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro//byang chub
47a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sems can bying ba rnams gdon par 'dod pa'o//de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems
47a5(nyi khri): dpa'i bslab pa la skyob pa ste/nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no//rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no//de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
47a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te/nye bar 'dong zhing 'di skad ces smra'o//kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobs shig/skyes bu chen
47a7(nyi khri): posbyin par slobs shig/lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
47b1(nyi khri): nas blang bar bya ba ste/'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston to//de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
47b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dong bar sems so//de'i
47b3(nyi khri): drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'ang /mtshe ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//lha'i
47b4(nyi khri): rgyal po rab dga' ldan yang /dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' yang /'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan
47b5(nyi khri): cig 'gro bar sems so//lha'i rgyal po dbang bsgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'ang /tshangs
47b6(nyi khri): ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so//dge rgyas dang 'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba
47b7(nyi khri): dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong par sems so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
48a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rtag tu dgongs pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa'
48a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la de ltar spyod pa de'i lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba gang ji snyed cig lus la
48a3(nyi khri): 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/dge slong de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
48a4(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta ste/mig gi nad dam/rna ba'i nad dam/sna'i nad dam/lce'i na dam/lus kyi
48a5(nyi khri): nad dam/snying gi nang gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang /lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
48a6(nyi khri): zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/'di'i yon tan du rig par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo 'di snyam du gyur te/lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spobs pas shes rab kyi ba
48a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ston cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang /legs pa brjod dam/'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe
48b1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa dga' bo'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa dga' bo bdag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
48b2(nyi khri): tuphyin pa ston pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa nu sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa
48b3(nyi khri): dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dga' bo de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/lha'i dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang /shes rab kyi pha
48b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs so//dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems
48b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa de'i tshe/
48b6(nyi khri): gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/bdud sdig to can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag
48b7(nyi khri): pa'i mtha' mngon du byas te/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub
49a1(nyi khri): thob par 'gyur ram/'on te ma yin gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/dogs pa rnyed
49a2(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi
49a3(nyi khri): zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang
49a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pas/sems gcig tsam 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang /zhum par 'gyur ba dang /spu g.yo
49a5(nyi khri): bar 'gyur bar skar ma ltung ba gtong zhing 'jigs pa bskyed do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci lags//
49a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsdam pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo
49a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no//dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
49b1(nyi khri): 'on ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi ba
49b2(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can dag gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo //dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems
49b3(nyi khri): dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/'on te ma yin zhes the tshom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud
49b4(nyi khri): sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo //dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na/des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong bas//
49b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so//ma thos pas mi shes so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas/de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed de/
49b6(nyi khri): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la//
49b7(nyi khri): dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par byed na/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to con gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang
50a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na/de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems
50a2(nyi khri): te/gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba de ni/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
50a3(nyi khri): pa mang po'i nang nas bdag gi grogs su rnyed pa ste/de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas
50a4(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba ni/de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga'
50a5(nyi khri): bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/'di
50a6(nyi khri): skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/bsgoms pa dang gzung ba dang /bcangs pa dang /
50a7(nyi khri): kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na khyod kyis lta rnyed ri skan zhes zer na/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags
50b1(nyi khri): rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa bskyed cing /nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
50b2(nyi khri): spyad pa'o//nga ni tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o//khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma
50b3(nyi khri): yin no//khyod ni tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su byed na/dga' bo byang
50b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na/dga' bo
50b5(nyi khri): de'i tshe/bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /spro ba dang /nyams bde ba dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang
50b6(nyi khri): bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ming brjod pa 'om/rus brjod pa kun tu grogs par gyur na/de ming brjod pa
50b7(nyi khri): 'am/rus brjod pa des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing /bdag bstod/gzhan la smod la/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
51a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang /tshul dang /mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la med par/rnam pa dang /tshul dang /mtshan ma med
51a2(nyi khri): pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa bskyed cing /bdag bstod/gzhan smod de/'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang
51a3(nyi khri): ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par mi snang ngo zhes/de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
51a4(nyi khri): theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par brjod cing smod na/de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi gnas ni stongs par mi 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /
51a5(nyi khri): byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /yi dwags kyi yul shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes/ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar
51a6(nyi khri): bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste/de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang /yid ches par bya bar sems te/de la de dag gis
51a7(nyi khri): thos sam/mthong na/mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/de dag gis thos sam/mthong nas 'thun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/de dag de bzhin du slob cing /de bzhin nyid
51b1(nyi khri): du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las gang dang gang brtsams pa de dag
51b2(nyi khri): thams cad mi 'dod pa dang /mi sdug pa dang /yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te/de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/byol song gi skye gnas
51b3(nyi khri): dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /yi dgas kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/dga' bo don gyi dbang de mthong nas//
51b4(nyi khri): bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /spro ba dang /tshim pa dang /yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/gang zag nyan
51b5(nyi khri): thos kyi theg pa pa dang /rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams
51b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'thab mo dang /'khrug pa dang /rtsod pa dang /mtshang
51b7(nyi khri): 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo//de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo//de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten
52a1(nyi khri): gyi lam mo//de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
52a2(nyi khri): dang /gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la/'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/'di gnyis ka'ang rnam
52a3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o//'di gnyis ka'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
52a4(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin/rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni/sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi
52a5(nyi khri): skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas/dga' zhing spro ba dang /tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gal te byang
52a6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing /'thab cing rtsod la/'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/gal te des rnam pa thams cad
52a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi btang zhe na/ji tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang /'thab cing rtsod pa dang /'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal par
52b1(nyi khri): go cha bgo bar bya'o//dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems bskyod pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam/'on tri ma lags kyis/bskal pa de snyed kho nar
52b2(nyi khri): go cha bgo 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /byang chub sems
52b3(nyi khri): dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/dga' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
52b4(nyi khri): dang /'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan du brjod pa dang /'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod pa byas na/phyir mi 'ochags par mdud par 'dzin cing khon du
52b5(nyi khri): bzung ste gnas na/dga' ba gang zag de ni 'byung bar nga mi smra ste/gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi btang zhe na/gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go cha
52b6(nyi khri): bgo bar bya'o//dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang /mi snyan par brjod par gyur na'ang mdud par mi 'dzin la/phyin chad
52b7(nyi khri): sdom pa 'dzin cing /bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na/de ltar bdag smra ba la phyir smra ba dang /bdag gis
53a1(nyi khri): sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/de ltar bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir zlog pa ni mi tshul gyis/bdag gis de ltar mi bya'i//
53a2(nyi khri): bdag gis ni glen pa dang lkug pa bzhin du bya'o//bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o//sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
53a3(nyi khri): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya dgos na/de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang /de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul
53a4(nyi khri): ma yin gyis/bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o//bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba
53a5(nyi khri): yod par ngas bshad de/de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lto zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do//dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan
53a6(nyi khri): thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o//de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o//'dug par mi bya'o//gal te 'dug na'ang des su la 'ang gnod sems su mi bya/'khrugs
53a7(nyi khri): par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang /'khrugs par bya ba de dag ni bdag la mi tshul lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag ni
53b1(nyi khri): bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bkrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o//
53b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po lnga bcu lnga pa//dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byangs
53b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i theg pa padag dang gnas par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'o
53b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos grang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dri ni bdag gri grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o//'dis ni ji ltar bslab par
53b5(nyi khri): bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o//'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod phyi'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyis
53b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phyags pa'i bden
53b7(nyi khri): padang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /
54a1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa
54a2(nyi khri): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang la bslab par
54a3(nyi khri): bya ba de nyid la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do//des gzhan yang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam ston
54a4(nyi khri): pa ste/gal te de 'dres par spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral bar gyur na/de la bdag gis bslab par mi bya'i/gal te byang chub
54a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ma bral bar gnas na bdag gis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o snyam du
54a6(nyi khri): sems bskyed de/de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa mnyam pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/le'u
54a7(nyi khri): bzhi bcu drug pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
54b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos mnyam pa nyid gang la bslab par bgyi ba'i/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
54b2(nyi khri): pa/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do//phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam
54b3(nyi khri): ba nyid do//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do//rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni byang chub sems dpa'
54b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid do//gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong /skye mched
54b5(nyi khri): dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas stong /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
54b6(nyi khri): rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis stong /'phags pa'i badren pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par
54b7(nyi khri): thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas stong /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang //
55a1(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgro ni gzungs kyi sgos stong /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'dzugs pa dang /so so yang dag/
55a2(nyi khri): par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
55a3(nyi khri): pa nyid kyis stong ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
55a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs pas
55a5(nyi khri): par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad
55a6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/gzugs 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/gzugs mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob/
55a7(nyi khri): na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa bas par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams///
55b1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/rnam par shes//
55b2(nyi khri): pa 'gag par bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
55b3(nyi khri): pa lags sam/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bas par bgyi ba dang /'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang /'gag par bgyi ba dang /mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i
55b4(nyi khri): slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sbom cu rtsa bdun
55b5(nyi khri): dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthor gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
55b6(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
55b7(nyi khri): stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bas par bgyi ba dang /'dod chags dang bral bar bgyi ba dang /'gag
56a1(nyi khri): par bgyi ba dang /mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bas par
56a2(nyi khri): bgyi ba dang /'dod chags dang bral bar po gyi ba dang /'gag par bgyi ba dang /mi skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa lags sam/bcom
56a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gang 'di skad du/gzugs zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
56a4(nyi khri): nyid du slob pa yin nam/gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/gzugs 'gag par bya ba'i phyir
56a5(nyi khri): slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/tshor ba dang /'du
56a6(nyi khri): shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya/
56a7(nyi khri): ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam//
56b1(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zad par bya ba dang /'dod//
56b2(nyi khri): chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /'gag par bya ba dang /mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid
56b3(nyi khri): thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
56b4(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
56b5(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zad par bya ba dang /'dod
56b6(nyi khri): chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /'gag par bya ba dang /mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
56b7(nyi khri): du zad par bya ba dang /'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /'gog par bya ba dang /mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam zhes
57a1(nyi khri): smras pa de ni ma yin no//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
57a2(nyi khri): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin
57a3(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i
57a4(nyi khri): bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam par
57a5(nyi khri): thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /
57a6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas
57a7(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/spang ba 'am/skye ba'am/
57b1(nyi khri): 'grag par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar slob
57b2(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/de bzhin nyid ni zad pa'am/spang ba 'am/skye ba 'am//
57b3(nyi khri): 'gag par 'gyur ba med de/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/
57b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/stong pa nyid thams cad la slob pa yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag
57b5(nyi khri): pa rnams la slob pa yin/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
57b6(nyi khri): pa la slob pa yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob pa yin/bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob pa yin/rnam par
57b7(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la slob pa yin/mngon par shes pa dang /ting
58a1(nyi khri): nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo la slob pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas
58a2(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
58a3(nyi khri): bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis
58a4(nyi khri): pham par mi nus pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
58a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gi pha de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i
58a6(nyi khri): chos rnams la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob
58a7(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
58b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du
58b2(nyi khri): bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya/
58b3(nyi khri): ba'i phyir slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar
58b4(nyi khri): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus
58b5(nyi khri): byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o zhes slob pa yin te/rab 'byor sems can dman pas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di la bslab par mi nus so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
58b6(nyi khri): gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can/
58b7(nyi khri): dmyal bar mi skye'o//byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o//yul mtha' 'khob dang /yul gcong rong can du mi skye'o//phyag bdar ba dang /gdol
59a1(nyi khri): pa'i rigs su mi skye'o//zhar bar mi 'gyur ro//sgur por mi 'gyur ro//zhu bor mi 'gyur ro//yan lag skyon can du mi 'gyur ro//'on par mi 'gyur ro//
59a2(nyi khri): lag pa med par mi 'gyur ro//dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur te/dbang po yongs su tshang zhing /dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro//srog gcod par mi 'gyur ro//ma byin
59a3(nyi khri): par len pa dang /'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma can dang /zhe gcod pa smra ba dang /tshig kyal pa can+da dang /chags sems can dang /gnod
59a4(nyi khri): sems can dang /log par lta bar mi 'gyur ro//'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro//yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims ngan pa
59a5(nyi khri): can du mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi
59a6(nyi khri): skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe ring por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de/de'ang
59a7(nyi khri): gong zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
59b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug/ched med pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/bsam gtan
59b2(nyi khri): dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di lta
59b3(nyi khri): ste/nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/
59b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang gis yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba
59b5(nyi khri): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su
59b6(nyi khri): dag pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems zhum pa med cing
59b7(nyi khri): 'gong ba med pa de ni/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/byis pa so so skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de mi shes mi mthong bas/sems can de dag gi don du byang chub
60a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha
60a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/nang stong pa nyid la spyod/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod/
60a3(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan
60a4(nyi khri): lag brgyad pa la spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod/rnam par thar pa brgyad
60a5(nyi khri): dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyod/mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang //
60a6(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
60a7(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod de/rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad
60b1(nyi khri): kyi stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
60b2(nyi khri): sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /spyod pa dang /g.yo ba rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sa chen po'i phyogs gang na dzam+bu na da'i gser gyis
60b3(nyi khri): le sbram 'byung ba de lta bu ni nyung ngo //rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab po 'di la slob pa'i sems can de lta bu yang nyung ste/sems can gang nyan thos
60b4(nyi khri): kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i
60b5(nyi khri): las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/sems can gang khams kyi rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //rab 'byor
60b6(nyi khri): de bzhin du sems can gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu yang nyung ste/sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba
60b7(nyi khri): de lta bu ni de bas ches mang ngo //rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas
61a1(nyi khri): ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de lta bu ches nyung ngo //de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs
61a2(nyi khri): rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing /the
61a3(nyi khri): tshom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon pa de dag pas ni/gang phyir ldog pa'i sa gnon par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //rab 'byor de bas no byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa'
61a4(nyi khri): chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'dod pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sar chud par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor
61a5(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i
61a6(nyi khri): sems mi skye'o//'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//shes rab 'chal pa dang ldan pa'i sems
61a7(nyi khri): mi skye'o//'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//tha ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
61b1(nyi khri): gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel
61b2(nyi khri): par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
61b3(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
61b4(nyi khri): pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//de bzhin
61b5(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
61b6(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i
