186b3(nyi khri): pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
186b4(nyi khri): rnams la bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la ni thams cad shes pa nyid ces bgyi/ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
186b5(nyi khri): chen po rnams la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ji tsam du phyi dang nang gi chos ji snyed pa tsam ni thams cad nyan thos dang rang
186b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes te/lam thams cad du ni ma yin no//rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la lam gyi
186b7(nyi khri): rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor lam thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsgrub par bya/lam thams cad byang chub sems dpa'
187a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ste/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gang ji snyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang ji snyed pa de dag
187a2(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin la/lam de dag gis kyang lam gyi bya ba bya dgos te/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan
187a3(nyi khri): 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi 'tshal na/'o na ni nges yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon du bgyi bar
187a4(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas la/sems can yongs su smin par ma byas par byang chub sems
187a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yang dag po'i mtha' mngon du mi bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam la
187a6(nyi khri): gnas te/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na lam ma lags pa la
187a7(nyi khri): gnas te 'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na lam yang lags la/lam ma lags pa la'ang gnas te 'am/bcom
187b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na lam yang ma lags la/lam ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa la gnas te 'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
187b2(nyi khri): stsal pa/ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
187b3(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/khyod lam la gnas pas nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
187b4(nyi khri): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'o na lam ma yin pa la gnas te 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
187b5(nyi khri): stsal pa/'o na lam yang yin la/lam ma yin pa la'ang gnas te 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'o na lam
187b6(nyi khri): yang ma yin la/lam ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa la gnas te/len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni me lags so//
187b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sems ni gang la'ang gnas pas/nye bar len pa ma mchis par zag pa las sems rnam par grol ba ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
188a1(nyi khri): sems ni gang la'ang mi gnas pas rnam par grol lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
188a2(nyi khri): pos ci la'ang mi gnas par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bya'o//rab 'byor gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni/rnam
188a3(nyi khri): pa gcig gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ste/'di ltar zhi ba'i rnam pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o//rab 'byor 'di ltar yang rnam pa gang dang /
188a4(nyi khri): tshul gang dang /mtshan ma grang gis chos rnams brjod par bya ba'i rnam pa de dag dang /tshul de dag dang /mtshon ma do dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pas/de'i phyir
188a5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
188a6(nyi khri): ces bgyi ba/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di gsum las nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i rnam pa 'dis ni lhag ma ma lus par spangs so//'dis ni lhag ma ma lus par ma spangs so zhes bgyi
188a7(nyi khri): ba'i bye brag mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nyon mongs pa spangs pa la ni bye brag med de/de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bag chags kyi mtshams
188b1(nyi khri): sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa mnga'o//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams la ni/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci
188b2(nyi khri): logs/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis 'dus ma bgyis ma thob par nyon mongs pa spangs sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin no//
188b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/'dus ma bgyis pa la bye brag dmigs su mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
188b4(nyi khri): gal te de ltar dmigs su ma mchis na/ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad du 'di la ni/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa mnga'o//'di la ni bag chags kyi mtshams
188b5(nyi khri): sbyor ba spangs pa med do zhes bka' stsal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor po ni nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin mod kyi/nyan thos dang /rang
188b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnams la 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi lus kyi rnam pa dang /ngag gi rnam pa yod de/de dag gi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye
188b7(nyi khri): bo kun dang thun mong du gnod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/thams cad du thams cad/rnam
189a1(nyi khri): pa thams cad du thams cad mi mnga' zhing mi dmigs so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'ja/
189a2(nyi khri): gral te lam yang ma mchis la/mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma mchis na/'o ni ci'i slad du/'di skad du/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs bya'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni
189a3(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'o//'di ni dgra bcom pa'o//'di ni rang sangs rgyas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
189a4(nyi khri): po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bshad/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong
189a5(nyi khri): ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
189a6(nyi khri): rgyas zhes bya ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/'dus ma bgyis te/'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o//'dra ni
189a7(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o//'di ni dgra bcom pa'o//'di ni rang sangs rgyas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o//'di ni de /
189b1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi bar rab tu 'byed pa mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'dus ma byas
189b2(nyi khri): ni rab tu 'byed pa med mod kyi/'on kyang tshig tshad mar byas shing brjod de/don dam par ni rab tu dbye bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de la tshig gi lam gyi gdags pa med de/'on kyang
189b3(nyi khri): gang dang gang gis mtha' mchod pa de dang de dag la phyi ma'i mthar gdags pa yin te/rab 'byor chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la/sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs na//
189b4(nyi khri): phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de gnas med do//rab 'byor sems can de dag chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par mi shes pas/de dag la 'di skad du/
189b5(nyi khri): 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' zhes bya'o//'di ni phyi ma'i mthu' zhes bya'o zhes bstan to/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la sngon gyi mtha' 'am phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su
189b6(nyi khri): med do//rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la
189b7(nyi khri): spyad na/nang ngam phyi'i chos sam/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas sam/nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos gang la'ang mngon par
190a1(nyi khri): chags par mi 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
190a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
190a3(nyi khri): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa thob pa yin te/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan
190a4(nyi khri): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
190a5(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad/chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur/pha rol tu phyin/pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur bas/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
190a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis/chos thams cad kyi mchog gi tshul phyed de/chos de dag kun lo'ang 'khor ba ma
190a7(nyi khri): dmigs pas de'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir/de bzhin nyid kyang chung /yang dag pa'i
190b1(nyi khri): mtha' yang chud/chos kyi dbyings kyang chud de/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang ldan
190b2(nyi khri): pa'am mi ldan pa 'am/bstan du yod pa 'am/bstan du med pa'am/thogs pa dang bcas pa 'am/thogs pa med pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
190b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di ni/gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad
190b4(nyi khri): kyi spobs pa thams cad dang /snang ba thams cad bskyed pa ste/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdud dam/bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/gang zag nyan thos dang
190b5(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa nas/mu stegs can gzhon gyi bar dang /sdig pa'i grogs po rnams kyis mi phyed mi 'phrogs pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
190b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la de dag
190b7(nyi khri): thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i don la spyad par bya'o//rab 'byor
191a1(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don la spyod pas/mi rtag pa'i don la spyad par bya'o//sdug
191a2(nyi khri): bsngal gyi don la spyad par bya'o//bdag med pa'i don la spyad par bya'o//sdug bsngal shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o//kun 'byung ba shes pa'i don dang /'gog pa shes
191a3(nyi khri): pa'i don dang /lom shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o//zod pa shes pa'i dron dang /mi skye ba shes pa'i don dang /chos shes pa'i don dang /rjes su 'gro ba shes pa'i don dang /
191a4(nyi khri): kun rdzob shes pa'i don dang /yongs su rtog pa shes pa'i don dang /sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i don la spyad par bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
191a5(nyi khri): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/don dang don ma lags pa mi
191a6(nyi khri): dmigs na/'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don la spyad par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
191a7(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don zab mo 'di la spyod pas/'di ltar spyad par bya ste/'dod chags bdag
191b1(nyi khri): gi don ci 'am/don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//zhe sdang bdag gi don ce 'am/don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//gti mug bdag gi don ce'am/don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o///
191b2(nyi khri): 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gauti mug bdag gi don ci'am/don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//log par lta ba bdag gi don ce 'am/don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//lta
191b3(nyi khri): bar gyur pa thams cad bdag gi don ce'am/don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang don du mi
191b4(nyi khri): byed/don ma yin par mi byed do//lta ba'i rnam pa dag gi de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang don du mi byed/don ma yin par mi byed do//gzugs bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//gzugs
191b5(nyi khri): bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rnam par shes pa bdag gi don
191b6(nyi khri): ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad
191b7(nyi khri): par mi bya'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs
192a1(nyi khri): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /ched med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i
192a2(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /
192a3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//gzungs kyi sgo bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//de bzhin gshegs
192a4(nyi khri): pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag gi don ces spyad par mi bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos
192a5(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don zhes spyad par mi bya'o//bla na med pa
192a6(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bdag gi don ma yin zhes spyad par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
192a7(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/chos gang don du bya ba 'am/don med par bya
192b1(nyi khri): ba de lta bu gang yang ma dmigs so//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skyes kyang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma skyes kyang rung ste/chos rnams kyi chos nyid
192b2(nyi khri): dang /chos kyi gnas nyid ni gnas pa/chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ste/de ni gang la 'ong don kyang mi byed/don ma yin pa'ang mi byed do//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems
192b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don dang don ma yin pa spangs te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
192b4(nyi khri): phyin pa gang la'ang don kyang mi bgyid/don ma lags pa'ang mi bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
192b5(nyi khri): ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid gang yang mi byed de/de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang la'ang don du byed pa'ang ma yin no//don ma yin par byed pa'ang
192b6(nyi khri): ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na 'dus ma bgyis/sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das
192b7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus ma byas ni sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas kyi nyon thos 'phags pa thams cad kyi don kyang yin te/phan pa'am/gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma
193a1(nyi khri): yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' de bzhin nyid ni gang la'ang phan pa'am/gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//rab 'byor
193a2(nyi khri): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chos gang la'ang phyin pa 'am/gnod par nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//gsol pa/
193a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma bgyis kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
193a4(nyi khri): thob par mi bgyid dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha
193a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci
193a6(nyi khri): lags/gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos thob par bgyid dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na
193a7(nyi khri): gnyis kyi chos shig gnyis kyi chos thob par bgyid pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na ji ltar thob par 'gyur/bcom
193b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nam gnyis kyi chos sam/gnyis su med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs pa ni thob par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mi dmigs pa ni thob pa ste//
193b2(nyi khri): de ni dmigs pas kyang thob par mi 'gyur/mi dmigs pas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga bcu gsum pa'o///
193b3(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
193b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa'ang dka' ba bgyid pa lags te/sems can zhes bgyi 'am/sems can du gdags pa ni
193b5(nyi khri): gang yang mi dmigs na/de dag ni sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na//
193b6(nyi khri): skyes bu la la zhig nam mkha' gzhi ma mchis pa la ljang bu bskyed par 'tshal ba de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi slad du/rnam
193b7(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
194a1(nyi khri): gang sems can rnams kyi phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon
194a2(nyi khri): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can rnams sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel pa ni/dka' ba byed pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na/skyes bu la la
194a3(nyi khri): zhig ljang bu bskyed par 'dod la/skyes bu des ljang bu de'i rtsa ba ma dmigs/yal ga dang sdong bu dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu ma dmigs par ljang bu de'i sdong bu
194a4(nyi khri): bskyed de/dus dus su chus bran cing /de'i sdong bu de rim gyis yal ga phun sum tshogs par gyur/lo ma phun sum tshogs par gyur/me tog phun sum tshogs par gyur/
194a5(nyi khri): 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /de ljang bu de'i 'dab ma la spyod pa dang /me tog la spyod pa dang /'bras bu la spyod pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems
194a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyang /sems can rnams kyi phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste/de dag ri mau gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug
194a7(nyi khri): la spyod cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/de dag la lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
194b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor de la lo ma ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing /sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su dgrol ba'o//me tog ni byang chub sems
194b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brten cing /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba dang /rgyal chen
194b3(nyi khri): bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan
194b4(nyi khri): dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge
194b5(nyi khri): rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /ched med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min dang /nam
194b6(nyi khri): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye ba'o//'bras bu
194b7(nyi khri): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/sems can de dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god pa dang /lan cig phyir
195a1(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la rab tu 'god pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195a2(nyi khri): chen po de nyid la brten cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/de dag kyang sems can thams cad 'bras bu la
195a3(nyi khri): nye bar 'tsho ba bzhin nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /de la gang gis yin phul ba de dag gis kyang rim gyis/'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
195a4(nyi khri): 'am/theg pa chen po 'am/theg pa gsum po de dag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
195a5(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur yang /de la sems can du'ang mi 'dogs/sems can du gdags pa'ang med par sems can de dag kyang sems can du 'dzin pa las yongs su 'grel
195a6(nyi khri): pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang /gang gi don du bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
195a7(nyi khri): nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems can nam/sems can du gdags pa gang yang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
195b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
195b2(nyi khri): la brten na/sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//
195b3(nyi khri): mi khom pa dang /ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//dbul po thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//lam gyi rgyud dma' ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//'dod
195b4(nyi khri): pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//gzugs kyi khams thams cad rgyun tshong par 'gyur ro//gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//bcom
195b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rab
195b6(nyi khri): 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med na/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag
195b7(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur/dgra bcom pa rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /lan cig
196a1(nyi khri): phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur//
196a2(nyi khri): byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/gzugs kyi khams
196a3(nyi khri): thams cad dang /gzugs med pa'i khams thams cad kyang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de lta bas na gang 'di skad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
196a4(nyi khri): ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs
196a5(nyi khri): pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rang sangs rgyas su gdags
196a6(nyi khri): pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags pa thams cad du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis gzugs su gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis tshor ba dang /'du
196a7(nyi khri): shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes par gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis skye mched dang /khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar gdags pa dang /
196b1(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'phags/
196b2(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
196b3(nyi khri): pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams su gdags/
196b4(nyi khri): pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
196b5(nyi khri): brgyad du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gdags pa dang /de bzhin nyid gang gis 'das byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma byas
196b6(nyi khri): kyi khams kyi bar du gdags pa de dag thams cad kyang de kho na bzhin te/de bas na de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid de la
196b7(nyi khri): bslangs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/de bzhin nyid tshad mar byas te//
197a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
197a2(nyi khri): pos de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol
197a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la slob bo//chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bslabs shing /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs
197a4(nyi khri): su rdzogs par byed do//chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byed do//chos
197a5(nyi khri): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dbang du gyur pa thob par byas shing /sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la mkhas par byed do//dbang po la mkhas par byas shing /dbang
197a6(nyi khri): po yongs su bskang ba la mkhas pa thob par byed do//dbang po yongs su bskang ba la mkhas pa thob par byas shing /sems can rnams kyi las rang gi byas pa shes par
197a7(nyi khri): byed do//sems can rnams kyi rang gi las shes par byas shing /smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed do//smon pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byas shing //
197b1(nyi khri): dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byed do//dus gsum du ye shes rnam par dag par byas shing /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas sems can rnams kyi don byed do//
197b2(nyi khri): sems can rnams kyi don byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed
197b3(nyi khri): do||rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas shing /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing /sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do//sems
197b4(nyi khri): can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu bkod nas/phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
197b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yon tan dang /legs pa thams cad mthong nas/bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o///
197b6(nyi khri): gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug par bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
197b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar
198a1(nyi khri): 'os pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
198a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa de dag ni/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa'o//gsol pa//
198a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
198a4(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshul ba de'i bsod nams ji rtse mo zhig tu 'phel bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te
198a5(nyi khri): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/nyan thos kyi sa la gnas par gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur na/sems
198a6(nyi khri): can de dag gi bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das tshad ma mchis so//bde bar
198a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos
198b1(nyi khri): kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa'i bsod nams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams las
198b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs de la ni/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos
198b3(nyi khri): kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /brgya stong gi cha dang /brgya phrag
198b4(nyi khri): stong gi cha dang /bye ba'i cha dang /bye ba brgya'i cha dang /bye ba stong gi cha dang /bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
198b5(nyi khri): grangs dang /cha dang /bgrang ba dang /dpe dang /rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni gang zag nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi
198b6(nyi khri): theg pa pa rnams te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
198b7(nyi khri): gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa par gyur pa lta zhog go/gal te stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
199a1(nyi khri): kyi sems can de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i
199a2(nyi khri): bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dpe dang
199a3(nyi khri): rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs
199a4(nyi khri): rgyas las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi
199a5(nyi khri): yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa lta zhog go/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
199a6(nyi khri): can de dag thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gis bsod nams des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams
199a7(nyi khri): kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong go bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dpe dang rgyu'i
199b1(nyi khri): bar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las
199b2(nyi khri): byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mu yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i
199b3(nyi khri): sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad rigs kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag
199b4(nyi khri): gi bsod nams nges byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig
199b5(nyi khri): brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi chur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dpe dang rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rigs kyi sa la gnas pa rnams te/
199b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi sa las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rigs
199b7(nyi khri): kyis la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /
200a1(nyi khri): de dag gi bsod nams des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /brgya phrag stong
200a2(nyi khri): gi chu dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dpe dang rgyu'i byar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni brgyad
200a3(nyi khri): pa'i sa rnams te/brgyad pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
200a4(nyi khri): can thams cad brgyad pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas
200a5(nyi khri): par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i chur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /brgya phrag stong
200a6(nyi khri): gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi tshor yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dpe dang rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni mthong ba'i
200a7(nyi khri): sa rnams te/mthong ba'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
200b1(nyi khri): thams cad mthong ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bsrabs pa'i sA la gnas par
200b2(nyi khri): gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i chur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang brgya phrag stong gi cha dang bye ba
200b3(nyi khri): khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dpe dang rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni bsrabs pa'i sa
200b4(nyi khri): rnams te/ngasrabs pa'i sa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de
200b5(nyi khri): dag thams cad bsrabs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang
200b6(nyi khri): bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong
200b7(nyi khri): gi cha dang /brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de pe dang rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub
201a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' lngas byung ba ni/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas pa rnams te/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa'
201a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta
201a3(nyi khri): zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur kyang /de dag gi bsod nams des/
201a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha dang /brgya phrag stong gi tshe dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag
201a5(nyi khri): stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dpe dang rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa
201a6(nyi khri): rnams te/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
201a7(nyi khri): sems can thams cad byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad
201b1(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyod pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi cha
201b2(nyi khri): dang /brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dpe dang rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'
201b3(nyi khri): las byung ba ni/rang sangs rgyas rnams te/rang sangs rgyas las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma yin no//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
201b4(nyi khri): gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams
201b5(nyi khri): cad bang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur kyang /de dag ga bsod nams des byang chub sems dpa' rang byang chub tu zhugs pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i cher yang nye
201b6(nyi khri): bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi tshwa dang /brgya phrug stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//dpe dang rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//stong gsum
201b7(nyi khri): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa lta zhog gi/gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
202a1(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad byang chub tu zhugs par gyur kyang de dag gi bsod nams des/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
202a2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi brgya'i char yang nye byar mi 'gro'o//stong gi chu dang /brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar gyi
202a3(nyi khri): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//grangs su'ang mi bzod/char yang mi bzod/bgrang bar yang mi bzod/dper yang mi bzod/rgyur yang mi bzod do//gsol pa/bcom
202a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pas ci yid la bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
202a5(nyi khri): nyid yid lnga bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dngos po ji lta bu zhig mchis/dmigs pa ji lta bu zhig mchis/dbong sbyar
202a6(nyi khri): baji lta bu zhig mchis/rnam bya ji lta bu zhig mchis/mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad
202a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba ni/dngos po med pa mtshan nyid med pa/mtshan ma med pa/byed pa med pa/skye ba med pa/'byung ba med pa ste/rab 'byor gang yang 'di
202b1(nyi khri): skad du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ji lta bu zhig yod ces zer ba ni/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dmigs pa med pa ste/dran pas dbang
202b2(nyi khri): sgyusbyar ba dang /zhi ba'i rnam pa/mtshan nyid med pa yin te/rab 'byor 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa'o//'di ni dbang sgyur ba'o//'di ni rnam pa'o//'di
202b3(nyi khri): ni mtshan nyid do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'bra' zhig dngos po ma mchis pa lags sam/ma lags kyi/gzugs kyang dngos
202b4(nyi khri): po ma mchis pa lags/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang dngos
202b5(nyi khri): po ma mchis pa lags/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dngos po ma mchis pa lugs/'phags
202b6(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
202b7(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs
203a1(nyi khri): pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags/byams
203a2(nyi khri): pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po'ang dngos po ma mchis pa lpags/'dus byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang
203a3(nyi khri): dngos po ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'o//gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes
203a4(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'ang dngos po med pa'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang dngos po med pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong
203a5(nyi khri): pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dngos po med pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs
203a6(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
203a7(nyi khri): med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
203b1(nyi khri): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'o//byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po'ang dngos po med pa'o//
203b2(nyi khri): 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang dngos po med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med de/rab 'byor gang la
203b3(nyi khri): ngobo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
203b4(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med de/gang la 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i
203b5(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid do//rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i ngo bo
203b6(nyi khri): nyid do//rab 'byor 'di ltar yang chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mthu'i ngo bo nyid do//chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo
203b7(nyi khri): bo nyid do//rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar gal te chos thams
204a1(nyi khri): cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa thabs gang dang ldan pas/sbyin pa'i pha
204a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can+da rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha
204a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
204a4(nyi khri): dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bsam gtan dang po dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa dang /bsam gtan
204a5(nyi khri): bzhi pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang
204a6(nyi khri): snyoms la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam
204a7(nyi khri): shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med mini skye mched la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang //
204b1(nyi khri): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du spyod cing //
204b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin por bgyid pa lags/dran pa nye bar bzhags pa dang /yang dag par sbyong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi dang
204b3(nyi khri): pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems
204b4(nyi khri): can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam
204b5(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting
204b6(nyi khri): nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
204b7(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin
205a1(nyi khri): par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su 'dris par byed cing //
205a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang /sems can de dag kyang dngos po med pa'i
205a3(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid du shes pa de nyid/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
205a4(nyi khri): pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
205a5(nyi khri): pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi
205a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bor la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//dran pa nye bar bzhag
205a7(nyi khri): pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lom yan lag brgyad pa la
205b1(nyi khri): spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad myed pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
205b2(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge/
205b3(nyi khri): 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod cing //
205b4(nyi khri): byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod cing /byang chub kyi lam la yongs su 'dris par byed do//byang chub kyi lam de'ong
205b5(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rab tu shes te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan
205b6(nyi khri): par ma gyur pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen
205b7(nyi khri): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par ma gyur pa de'i bar du/byang chub kyi lam de la yongs su 'dris par byed do//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste/
206a1(nyi khri): lam dri la gnas shing /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/skad
206a2(nyi khri): cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//de'i tshe de'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang mi skye
206a3(nyi khri): bar spang bas yongs su spong bar 'gyur te/de sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rnam par lta na/dngos po med par yang mi dmigs
206a4(nyi khri): na/dngos po yod par lta smos kyang ci dgos/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/
206a5(nyi khri): de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos po yod pa 'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do//len pa la'ang mi rtog mtshan mar mi
206a6(nyi khri): byed de/dngos po yod pa 'am/dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do//gtong ba la'ang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos po yod pa 'am/dngos po med par yid la
206a7(nyi khri): mi byed do//byang chub kyi sems de'ang mi dmigs te/mtshan mar mi byed yul du mi byed par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
206b1(nyi khri): tshe/tshul khrims srung /bzod pa sgom/brtson 'grus rtsom/bsam gtan la goms par byed/shes rab sgom ste/de ltar shes rab bsgom yang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos
206b2(nyi khri): po yod pa 'am/dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do//gang shes rab de la sgom pa de'ang /mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos po yod pa'am/dngos po med par yang yid
206b3(nyi khri): la mi byed do//sems can gang gi don du shes rab dri la sgom pa de dag la'ang mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos po yod pa'am dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do//nang stong
206b4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /
206b5(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
206b6(nyi khri): por 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par
206b7(nyi khri): shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
207a1(nyi khri): 'dres pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de la me rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos po yong
207a2(nyi khri): pa 'am/dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du'ang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos po yod pa 'am/dngos
207a3(nyi khri): po med par yang yid la mi byed do//gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'ching
207a4(nyi khri): rgya bar bya ba de la'ang mi rtog mtshan mar mi byed de/dngos po yod pa 'am/dngos po med par yang yid la mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med
207a5(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid de/de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ma mdzod/rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang ma byas te/chos thams cad ni byed pa po med pa/byed pa po dang
207a6(nyi khri): bral ba'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/chos rnams chos rnams nyid dang bral ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
207a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor chos rnams ni chos rnams nyid dang bral ba'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das/gal te de ltar chos rnams chos rnams
207b1(nyi khri): nyid dang bral ba lags na/ji ltar chos kyis chos la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das dngos
207b2(nyi khri): po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar mi rung ste/dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos yongs su 'chil bar mi
207b3(nyi khri): rung ngo //dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung ngo //dngos po mchis pa'i chos kyis kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos 'tshal bar mi rung
207b4(nyi khri): ngo //de ltar chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal bar ma mchis pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta dngos po mchis pa 'am/dngos po ma mchis par sems par
207b5(nyi khri): yang ga la 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'jig rten
207b6(nyi khri): gyi kun rdzob nye bar bzung bas/dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/dngos po med ces bya bar ston te/don dam par ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci legs/'jig rten
207b7(nyi khri): gyi kun rjod kyang gzhan zhig la/don dam pa'ang gzhan zhig lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyang gzhan zhig la/
208a1(nyi khri): don dam pa 'du gzhan zhig yin zhes bya ba'ang myed de/'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi de bzhin nyid gung yin pa de nyid don dam pa'i de bzhin nyid yin yang //
208a2(nyi khri): de la sems can de dag phyin ci log tu gyur pas de bzhin nyid de mi shes mi mthong ste/de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob
208a3(nyi khri): kyis dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/dngos po med ces bya bar brjod do//rab 'byor 'di ltar yang sems can gang ji snyed cig phung po lnga la dngos po yod pa'i 'du shes
208a4(nyi khri): su gyur te/dngos po med par mi shes pa de dag gi don du chos rnams rab tu dbye ba nye bar bzung ste/dngos po med par yang ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhes te/de skad du
208a5(nyi khri): brjod do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
208a6(nyi khri): nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lho bcu bzhi pa'o///de nus tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor gyis/bauc+doM mu ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
208a7(nyi khri): 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi na/de skad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de/gang gi tshig bla dgas lags//
208b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba ni/de byang chub kyi don du spyod pas na/de'i phyir byang
208b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la spyod pa logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
208b3(nyi khri): pa/gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa
208b4(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/ci nas
208b5(nyi khri): kyang blo rnam po gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
208b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
208b7(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/bsam gtan dang po dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gton gsum pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /byams pa dang //
209a1(nyi khri): snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i
209a2(nyi khri): skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul
209a3(nyi khri): gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/'phags pa'i
209a4(nyi khri): bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
209a5(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mngon par shes pa
209a6(nyi khri): dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
209a7(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
209b1(nyi khri): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /spobs pa dang /yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/yi ge la 'jug pa dang /yi ge med pa la 'jug pa stong
209b2(nyi khri): pa zhes bya bar spyod/gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar spyod/'dus byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams stong pa zhes bya bar spyod de/ci nas kyang blo rnam pa gnyis su
209b3(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po drug cu gnyis pa//rab 'byor byang chub sems
209b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub tu spyod pa yin te/dri'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o//de skad ces bka'
209b5(nyi khri): stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi na/sangs rgyas
209b6(nyi khri): zhes bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor yang dag pa'i don ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/rab 'byor yang 'di ltar
209b7(nyi khri): des yang dag pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//yang dag pa'i don rab tu rtogs pas/de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes
210a1(nyi khri): bya'o//rab 'byor yang 'di ltar des chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//rab
210a2(nyi khri): 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub byang chub ces bgyi na/byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
210a3(nyi khri): stsol pa/rab 'byor byang chub ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshi ga bla dwags lags so//de ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so//'di ni ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang /
210a4(nyi khri): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla
210a5(nyi khri): dgas so//rab 'byor yang 'di ltar byang chub ces bya ba de ni/de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ste//
210a6(nyi khri): de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o//rab 'byor 'di ltar yang 'di lta ste/byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming dang ma chen ma tsam ste/de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o//rab 'byor
210a7(nyi khri): yang 'di ltar yang dag pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don to//rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad ming dang mtshan ma tsam du rtogs par byed pa ste/de'i phyir byang
210b1(nyi khri): chub ces bya'o//rab 'byor yang 'di ltar dbyer med pa'i don ni byang chub kyi don to//rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/de'i phyir
210b2(nyi khri): byang chub ces bya'o//rab 'byor yang 'di ltar de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na/de'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o//gsol
210b3(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa
210b4(nyi khri): dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
210b5(nyi khri): pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par
210b6(nyi khri): shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
210b7(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/'grib pa 'am/'gong ba 'am/'phel ba 'am/skye
211a1(nyi khri): ba'am/'gag pa'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/rab 'byor byang chub
211a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byang chub 'di la spyod pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad la spyod pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
211a3(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang //
211a4(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs
211a5(nyi khri): kyi sgo la spyod pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod pa dang /
211a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa de la/chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/'grib pa 'am/'gong ba 'am/'phel ba 'am/skye ba 'am/'grag
211a7(nyi khri): pa'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
211b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ni chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/'grib par bya ba'am/'grong bar bya ba 'am/'phel bar bya ba 'am/skye bar bya ba 'am/'gag
211b2(nyi khri): par bya ba 'am/kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba 'am/rnam par byung bar bya ba'i phyir de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar
211b3(nyi khri): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub no/chos gang yang tshogs su 'gyur ba 'am/'grib par bgyi ba 'am/
211b4(nyi khri): 'gong bar bgyi ba 'am/'phel bar bgyi ba 'am/skye bar bgyi ba 'am/'gag par bgyi ba'am/kun nas nyon mongs par bgyi ba 'am rnam par byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du//
211b5(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'o na de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
211b6(nyi khri): ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
211b7(nyi khri): dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la spyod par 'gyur/ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
212a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod par 'gyur/ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /
212a2(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod par 'gyur/ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs
212a3(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gonas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon/
212a4(nyi khri): par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo la spyod par 'gyur/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs
212a5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod par 'gyur/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu la spyod par 'gyur/ji ltar nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur/ji ltar
212a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la 'jug par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni gnyis su spyod
212a7(nyi khri): pa'i blo med de/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis kyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//gnyis kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
212b1(nyi khri): pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//gnyis kyis
212b2(nyi khri): narlung stong pa nyid la mi spyod do//gnyis kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do//gnyis kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul
212b3(nyi khri): gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lom yan lag brgyad pa la mi spyod do//gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam
212b4(nyi khri): gtan dang /ched med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
212b5(nyi khri): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo la mi spyod do//gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa
212b6(nyi khri): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chosnga ma 'dres pa la mi spyod do//gnyis kyis rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod do//gsol pa/bcom
212b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das gal te de ltar gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/gnyis kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
213a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/gnyis kyis stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub
213a2(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi spyod/gnyis kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
213a3(nyi khri): dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /
213a4(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo la mi spyod/gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
213a5(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa la mi spyod/gnyis kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi spyod na/'o na de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos
213a6(nyi khri): rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bas/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sems slad ma bskyed pa'i bar du dge pa'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/
213a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor su gang gnyis la spyod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byis
213b1(nyi khri): pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni gnyis la brten pa ste/de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par mi 'phel lo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnyis la mi spyod de/de ni sems
213b2(nyi khri): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sems phyi ma bskyed pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel te/dri ni lce dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi dge ba'i rtsa ba
213b3(nyi khri): gang gis nyams smad pas/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba 'am/mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gyis yongs su 'phrog par gyur cing /de dag gis yongs
213b4(nyi khri): su phrogs pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
213b5(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsamo gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /nang
213b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na/dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'brel ba dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang
213b7(nyi khri): dag par spong po dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na/dge ba'i
214a1(nyi khri): rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
214a2(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par
214a3(nyi khri): shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo la spyod na/dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /ma 'jigs pa dang /
214a4(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyod na/dge ba'i rtse ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod
214a5(nyi khri): na/dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par mi 'phel ba de ltar nyams smad par mi nus te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
214a6(nyi khri): pa la spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci legs/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
214a7(nyi khri): la spyod par bgyi 'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi phyir/shes
214b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//mi dge ba'i rtse ba rnams kyi phyir/yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/
214b2(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
214b3(nyi khri): pa nyid thob par mi nus so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang /dge
214b4(nyi khri): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
214b5(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/sangs
214b6(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa dang ched du brjod pa dang /gleng gzhi dang /'di ltar 'das pa dang /skyes
214b7(nyi khri): pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /chos rmad du byung ba dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /gtan la phab pa bstan pa gang ci gsungs kyang de dag thams cad yongs su 'dzin to//
215a1(nyi khri): yongs su bzung nas kyang tshig gis yongs su dris pa dang /yid kyis shin tu brtags pa dang /lta bas rab tu khong du chud par byas shing gzungs rab tu thob par byed
215a2(nyi khri): do//gzungs rab tu thob nas/so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu skyed do//so so yang dag par rig pa skyes pas/de tshe rnam par 'phos kyang /chos de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
215a3(nyi khri): nyid thob par gyur gyi bar du nam yang chud za bar mi 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing /dge/
215a4(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su bzung na/nam yang ngan song dang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur ro//dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang lus yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin te/lus
215a5(nyi khri): de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis yongs su bzung bas kyang /dge ba'i bshes
215a6(nyi khri): gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i legs pa ston pa dag
215a7(nyi khri): dang nam du'ang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/sangs rgyas bcom
215b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bgyur bar bya'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu
215b2(nyi khri): lnga pa las le'u lnga bcu lnga pa'o///de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
215b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur mi bgyid/dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang yongs su rdzogs par mi bgyid la/dge ba'i bshes gnyen
215b4(nyi khri): gyis kyang yongs su ma bzung bar gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
215b5(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang yongs su rdzogs
215b6(nyi khri): par ma byas la/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
215b7(nyi khri): 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur yang byas/dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang yongs su rdzogs par byas/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang brten pa byas kyang /da dung rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
216a1(nyi khri): pa nyid thob par mi nus na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur ma byas/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par ma byas/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la
216a2(nyi khri): ma brten pa rnams/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/de ni gnas med do//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
216a3(nyi khri): po byang chub sems dpa'i ming bden pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/sangs
216a4(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed par bya'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad
216a5(nyi khri): dubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyis/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten par bgyis
216a6(nyi khri): kyang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te/des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
216a7(nyi khri): de dag las thabs de dag thob par ma gyur pa'i phyir/dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu'ang ma bskyed/gang de la thabs ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bu dag la'ang ma brten pas de
216b1(nyi khri): ltar thob par mi 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i
216b2(nyi khri): thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sbyin pa'i
216b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos dang /mi dang mi
216b4(nyi khri): ma yin par gyur pa rnams la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dang ldan pas/sbyin pa la'ang sbyin pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur//
216b5(nyi khri): len pa la'ang len pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur/gtong ba la'ang gtong ba'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro//de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /chos
216b6(nyi khri): thams cad med pa dang /ma byung ba dang /yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /mngon par ma grub par mthong zhing /chos rnams kyis mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang /chos thams cad ni nus pa
216b7(nyi khri): gang yang med pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na dge ba'i rtse bas rnam par 'phel bar sbyin pa'i pha rol
217a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod de/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /gzhan
217a2(nyi khri): du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu gang 'khor bar
217a3(nyi khri): yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga bcu drug pa'o////rab
217a4(nyi khri): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
217a5(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/tshul khrims bsrung ste/de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib por mi 'gyur/zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur/gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur/bag la
217a6(nyi khri): nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur/kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 'gyur te/mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ser sna 'am/tshul khrims ngan pa
217a7(nyi khri): 'am/'khrug pa'i sems sam/le lo'i sems sam/brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam/g.yeng ba'i sems sam/shes rab 'chal pa'i sems sam nga rgyal lam/
