217b1(nyi khri): brnyas pa 'am che ba'i nga rgyal lam nga'i nga rgyal lam/nyan thos kyi sems sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar
217b2(nyi khri): chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /chos thams cad med pa dang /ma byung ba dang /yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/chos rnams kyi chos
217b3(nyi khri): kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang /chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/de thabs la mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas
217b4(nyi khri): na/dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed//
217b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
217b6(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
217b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems dang po bskyod pa nas nye bar bzung ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzong
218a1(nyi khri): pa bsgom ste/de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par mi 'gyur/zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur bag la nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur kun nas ldang ba
218a2(nyi khri): sgrib par mi 'gyur te/mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gang byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur pa/'di lta ste ser sna'am tshul khrims ngan pa 'am 'khrug pa'i sems sam/le lo'i sems
218a3(nyi khri): sam/brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam g.yeng ba'i sems sam shes rab 'chal po'i sems sam nga rgyal lam brnyas pa 'am/che ba'i nga rgyal lam nga'i nga rgyal lam/nyan thos
218a4(nyi khri): kyi sems sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /chos
218a5(nyi khri): thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang /yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang /chos thams cad ni nus pa
218a6(nyi khri): gang yang med pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar bzod pa'i pha rol
218a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod de/de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /gzhan du na
218b1(nyi khri): sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par bzod pa'i 'bras bu grang
218b2(nyi khri): 'khor brwa yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
218b3(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus rtsom ste/de la 'dod chags kyi sems
218b4(nyi khri): sgrib par mi 'gyur zhe sdang sgrib pa mi 'gyur gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur/bag lo nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur/kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 'gyur/mi dge ba'i chos gzhan
218b5(nyi khri): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste ser sna 'am tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/'khrug pa'i sems sam/le lo'i sems sam/brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam g.yeng
218b6(nyi khri): nga'i sems sam/shes rab 'tshal pa'i sems sam/nga rgyal lam brnyas pa 'am che ba'i nga rgyal lam/dra'i nga rgyal lam nyan thos kyi sems sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
218b7(nyi khri): dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba
219a1(nyi khri): dang yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang /chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang
219a2(nyi khri): med pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar brtson 'grus kyi pha
219a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /
219a4(nyi khri): gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/brtson
219a5(nyi khri): 'grus kyi 'bras bu gang /'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
219a6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/bsam gtan
219a7(nyi khri): rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste/de la 'dod chags kyi sems sgrib par mi 'gyur/zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur/bag la nyal ba sgrib par
219b1(nyi khri): mi 'gyur/kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 'gyur te/mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ser sna'am tshul khrims ngan pa 'am/'khrug pa'i
219b2(nyi khri): sems sam le lo'i sems sam brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam g.yeng ba'i sems sam shes rab 'chal pa'i sems sam/nga rgyal lam brnyas pa 'am che ba'i nga rgyal lam nga'i nga
219b3(nyi khri): rgyal lam nyan thos kyi sems sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong
219b4(nyi khri): par shes shing /chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang /yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang //
219b5(nyi khri): chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis 'jug ste/de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par
219b6(nyi khri): 'phel ba de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi
219b7(nyi khri): zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /gzhan du ni sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/bsam gtan gyi
220a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu glang 'khor byar yongs su smad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu la smon pa med do//
220a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems drang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
220a3(nyi khri): rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas shes rab bsgom ste/de la 'dod cha gos kyi sems sgrib par mi 'gyur zhe sdang sgrib par mi 'gyur
220a4(nyi khri): gti mug sgrib par mi 'gyur bag la nyal ba sgrib par mi 'gyur/kun nas ldang ba sgrib par mi 'gyur te/mi dge ba'i chos gzhan byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba
220a5(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ser sna 'am tshul khrims ngan pa 'am 'khrug pa'i sems sam le lo'i sems sam brtson 'grus chung ba'i sems sam g.yeng ba'i sems sam shes rab
220a6(nyi khri): 'chal pa'i sems sam/nga rgyal lam brnyas pa 'am che ba'i nga rgyal lam nga'i nga rgyal lam nyan thos kyi sems sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sems ngag kyang sgrib par mi 'gyur
220a7(nyi khri): ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes shing /chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang yongs su ma
220b1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa dang mngon par ma grub par mthong ste/chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid la 'jug na'ang /chos thams cad ni nus pa gang yang med pa'o zhes bya bar 'du byed med pa'i mtshan
220b2(nyi khri): nyid kyis 'jug ste/de thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pas na/dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par 'phel bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
220b3(nyi khri): la spyod cing /sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed kyang /gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su bslab pa dang /sems
220b4(nyi khri): can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma gtogs par/shes rab kyi 'bras bu gang 'khor bar yongs su spyad par bya ba de lta bu'i 'bras bu
220b5(nyi khri): la smon pa med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/le'u lnga bcu bdun pa'o////rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
220b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /bsam
220b7(nyi khri): gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyems par 'jug kyang de dag gi rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to//de
221a1(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin te/thabs mkhas pa des bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
221a2(nyi khri): de dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so//chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung ba dang /yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /mngon par ma grub par shes so//rab 'byor gzhan yang
221a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas mthong ba dang /bsgom pas spang ba'i lam la spyod kyang /rgyun
221a4(nyi khri): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/lan cig phyir 'ong bro'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par mi byed/rang byang chub thob par mi byed de//
221a5(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes/chos thams cad med pa dang /ma byung ba dang yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /mngon par ma grub par shes
221a6(nyi khri): te/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos de dag la spyod cing nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i
221a7(nyi khri): chos la bzod pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par 'jug/mthar
221b1(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug kyang /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
221b2(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub thob par mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par shes so//chos thams cad med pa dang ma byung
221b3(nyi khri): bar shes so//chos thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs par shes so//chos thams cad mngon par ma grub par shes so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
221b4(nyi khri): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su 'dris par byed/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su 'dres par byed/sangs rgyas kyi
221b5(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su 'dris par byed/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dris par byed kyang /nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa
221b6(nyi khri): dang /sems can yongs su smin par ma gyur gyi bar du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
221b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod kyang /rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin
222a1(nyi khri): pa ni/blo dam pa dang ldan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
222a2(nyi khri): de lta bu'i chos zab mo dag la spyod cing /rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni blo dam pa dang ldan pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
222a3(nyi khri): po ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//gastsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid gang las mi groyo ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dngos po med pa las mi g.yo ba yin te/ra
222a4(nyi khri): 'byor gang yang 'di skad du ngo bo nyid gang las mi geyo zhes zer ba ni/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//tshor ba drang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las
222a5(nyi khri): mr-i g.yo'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
222a6(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid lus
222a7(nyi khri): mi g.yo'o//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o///
222b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu
222b2(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//'phags pa'i
222b3(nyi khri): bden pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi groyo'o//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//rnam par
222b4(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//de bzhin
222b5(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen
222b6(nyi khri): po'i ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni/dngos po med pa ste/rab 'byor dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa
222b7(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das tsa legs/dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi
223a1(nyi khri): bar nus sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na dngos po ma mchis pas/dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
223a2(nyi khri): rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na dngos po mchis pas/dngos po mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par
223a3(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na dngos po ma mchis pas dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs
223a4(nyi khri): par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bar nus sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na gal te de ltar dngos po mchis pas dngos
223a5(nyi khri): po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur/dngos po ma mchis pas kyang /dngos po mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur/dngos po mchis pas kyang dngos po mchis pa
223a6(nyi khri): mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur/dngos po ma mchis pas kyang dngos po ma mchis pa mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur na/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du thob pa ma mchis shing //
223a7(nyi khri): mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa 'am gcig tu mi 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mngon par rtogs pa ni yong med pa ma yin te/bzhi pos mngon par
223b1(nyi khri): bsgrub pa de lta bus ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang la dngos po'ang med
223b2(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'ang ma yin pa de lta bu ni mngon par rtogs pa ste/de la spros pa de dag med pas/spros pa med cing spros pa dang bral ba ni mngon par rtogs pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan
223b3(nyi khri): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'
223b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
223b5(nyi khri): spros pa'o//gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bde
223b6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa'
223b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224a1(nyi khri): chen po'i spros pa'o//gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang
224a2(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba
224a3(nyi khri): ma yin no zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang /yongs
224a4(nyi khri): su shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba dang /mi rtag
224a5(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba dang /yongs
224a6(nyi khri): su shes par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spos po'o//sdug bsngal yongs su shes por bya'o zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa'
224a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /'gog pa mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba dang /lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems
224b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//nang stong pa nyid bsgom par
224b2(nyi khri): bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
224b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags
224b4(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi dang /
224b5(nyi khri): tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan
224b6(nyi khri): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224b7(nyi khri): chen po'i spros pa'o//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa dang /mthong bas bltas te/de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
225a1(nyi khri): spros pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub shes pa dang /mthong bas bltas te//
225a2(nyi khri): de las 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/byang
225a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o///
225a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//
225a5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes
225a6(nyi khri): bya ba dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems
225a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//bag chags
225b1(nyi khri): kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spros pa'o//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
225b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag ces bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag dang bdag med ces
225b3(nyi khri): bya ba dang /zhi ba dang ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
225b4(nyi khri): dang rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag dang bdag med ces bya ba dang /zhi ba dang ma zhi
225b5(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba dang /yongs su shes par bya ba dang /yongs su shes pa ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag pa dang /
225b6(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya ba dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang /zhi ba dang ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang /yongs su shes par bya ba dang /yongs su
225b7(nyi khri): shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag pa
226a1(nyi khri): dang /mi rtag ces bya ba dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /bdag dang bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang /zhi ba dang ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /yongs su shes
226a2(nyi khri): par bya ba dang /yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i
226a3(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon
226a4(nyi khri): par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
226a5(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub shes pa dang /mthong bas bltas te/de las 'dra' bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar
226a6(nyi khri): mi byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon mod pa la 'jug par bya'o zhes bya
226a7(nyi khri): bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//de
226b1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//byams pa chen po dang snying//
226b2(nyi khri): rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes bya bar
226b3(nyi khri): mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes bya bar mi spro ba 'phro bar mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo
226b4(nyi khri): nyid 'phro bar mi byed/dngos po med pa'ang dngos po med po 'phro bar mi byed/ngo bo nyid dang dngos po med pa ma gtogs par chos gzhan gang 'phro bar byed pa'am/gang la 'phro bar
226b5(nyi khri): bya ba de lta bu gang yang med de/rab 'byor de lta bas na/gzugs ni spror med pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o//skye mched dang
226b6(nyi khri): khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni spror med pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni spror
226b7(nyi khri): med pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
227a1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni /
227a2(nyi khri): med pa'o//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spror med pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid ni spror med pa'o//rang byed
227a3(nyi khri): chub ni spror med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni sbyor med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa ni spror med pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
227a4(nyi khri): bya ba dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba ni sprir med pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang //
227a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni spror mdo pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spror med pa'o//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
227a6(nyi khri): spang ba ni spror med pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos spror med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di
227a7(nyi khri): ltar yang gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med do//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel por 'byung
227b1(nyi khri): ba la ngo bo nyid med do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la ngo bo nyid med do//'phags pa'i bden pa
227b2(nyi khri): dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong
227b3(nyi khri): pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ngo bo nyid med do//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ngo bo nyid
227b4(nyi khri): med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do//rang byang chub la ngo bo nyid med do//byang chub sems
227b5(nyi khri): dpa'i sa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ngo bo nyid med do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /sems can rnams yongs su
227b6(nyi khri): smin par bya ba la ngo bo nyid med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
227b7(nyi khri): la ngo bo nyid med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do//gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni spror med pa ste/rab 'byor de'i phyir na/gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du
228a1(nyi khri): shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni sbyor med pa'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni spror med pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
228a2(nyi khri): dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni spror med pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i
228a3(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon
228a4(nyi khri): par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo ni spror med pa'o//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spror med pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i
228a5(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid ni spror med pa'o//rang byang chub ni spror med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni spror med pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa
228a6(nyi khri): ni spror med pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni spror med pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs
228a7(nyi khri): pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni spror med pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spror med pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar
228b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug go/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de
228b2(nyi khri): ltar chos thams cad gang+gA la'ang ngo bo nyid dmigs su ma mchis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi shul tam/rang sangs rgyas kyi shul tam/yang dag par
228b3(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul tam/chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub
228b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi la mo gyis/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi
228b5(nyi khri): 'jug/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug gi/rab 'byor 'di ltar
228b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lam thams cad la bslabs shing /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go//'di lta ste dper na/brgyad pa ni chos
228b7(nyi khri): thams cad la bslabs shing /yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug ste nam 'bras bu'i lam ma grub kyi bar du 'bras bu thob par mi byed do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
229a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lam thams cad la bsgrubs shing /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste/nam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thong/
229a2(nyi khri): par ma gyur gyi bar du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do//des ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/rnam pa
229a3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs
229a4(nyi khri): par bgyis te/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brgyad pa'i shul kyang gzhan/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i shul kyang
229a5(nyi khri): gzhan/lan cig phyir 'ong bar zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shul kyang gzhan/phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan/phyir mi 'ong
229a6(nyi khri): ba'i shul kyang gzhon/dgra bcom par zhugs pa'i shul kyang gzhan/dgra bcom pa'i shul kyang gzhan/rang sangs rgyas kyi shul kyang gzhan/de bzhin gshegs
229a7(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shul kyang gzhan te/bcom ldan 'das gal te shul de dag gzhan dang gzhan na/ji ltar byang chub sems
229b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis te/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
229b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag brgyad pa'i shul bsgrubs shing /brgyad
229b3(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ram/mthong ba'i shul bsgrubs shing /rgyun tu zhugs par mi 'gyur ram/bsgom pa'i shul bsgrubs shing /lan cig phyir 'ong bar zhugs pa 'am/lan cig
229b4(nyi khri): phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram/phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa 'am/phyir mi 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram/dgra bcom par zhugs pa 'am/dgra bcom par mi 'gyur ram/rang sangs
229b5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi shul bsgrubs shing /rang sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brgyad par gyur nas/byang chub sems
229b6(nyi khri): dpa'i skyon ma mi chis par 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/de ni gnas ma lags so//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par yang rnam pa thams
229b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bros bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra
230a1(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub thob nas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas ma mchis/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis
230a2(nyi khri): par ma chud par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shul
230a3(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par
230a4(nyi khri): chud nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba ji ltar 'tshal
230a5(nyi khri): bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad par 'gyur te/
230a6(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa 'am/rang
230a7(nyi khri): byang chub thob par gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs med de/de ni gnas ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
230b1(nyi khri): par ma chud par yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas med do//rab 'byor 'on kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po
230b2(nyi khri): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/shes pa dang mthong bas sa brgyad las yongs su 'da' ste/brgyad gang zhe na/dkar po rnam par mthong
230b3(nyi khri): ba'i sa dang /rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/sa bstan
230b4(nyi khri): pa brgyad po 'di dag las shes pa dang mthong ba las 'das nas/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
230b5(nyi khri): med par zhugs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo //rab 'byor de la brgyad pa'i
230b6(nyi khri): ye shes gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ye shes dang /spong ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de'ang /byang chub sems
230b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes dang /spong ba gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/phyir mi 'ong
231a1(nyi khri): ba'i ye shes dang spong ba gang yin pa de'ang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/dgra bcom pa'i ye shes dang spong ba gang yin pa de'ang byung
231a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /spong ba gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa chen po
231a3(nyi khri): ste/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye
231a4(nyi khri): shes kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis/bag chags kyi
231a5(nyi khri): mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo //rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas
231a6(nyi khri): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro///
231a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po drug cu gsum pa//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang nyan thos kyi shul dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi shul
231b1(nyi khri): dang sangs rgyas kyi shul de dag las/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi shul gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
231b2(nyi khri): chen pos/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya ste/de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ni rnam pa gong dang gang /tshul gang dang gang //
231b3(nyi khri): mtshan ma gang dang gang gis lam du brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /tshul de dag dang /mtshan ma de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
231b4(nyi khri): rgya bar bya ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ci nas kyang gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur ba dang /gzhan 'dul ba'i don du gzhan la brjod pa dang /bstan pa
231b5(nyi khri): dang /bshad pa dang /gdags pa dang /rnam par dgod pa ste/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra brnyan lta bur shes par bya ba'i don du/sgra skad dang
231b6(nyi khri): brdar bya ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra skad dang brda thams cad brjod par bya/yongs su bzung bar bya ste/rab
231b7(nyi khri): 'byor rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//lam thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
232a1(nyi khri): byas nas/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rig par bya ste/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba pa'i lam shes par bya'o///
232a2(nyi khri): rgyu shes par bya'o//'bras bu shes par bya'o//des kyang sems can dmyal ba'i lam bzlog par bya ste rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o byol
232a3(nyi khri): seng gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam shes par bya'o rgyu shes par bya'o 'bras bu shes par bya'o//des kyang byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam
232a4(nyi khri): bzlog par bya ste/rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o//gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i
232a5(nyi khri): lam shes par bya'o//rgyu shes par bya'o//'bras bu shes par bya'o//des kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam las kyang bzlog par bya'o//rgyu las kyang bzlog par
232a6(nyi khri): bya'o 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o//mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phyo chen po dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang /mi dang lha dang tshangs pa rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o//rgyu shes
232a7(nyi khri): par bya'o//'bras bu shes par bya'o//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang /'du shes med pa'i sems
232b1(nyi khri): can rnams dang /mi che ba'i lha rnams dang /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang /gya nom spang ba'i lha rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lam shes
232b2(nyi khri): par bya'o//rgyu shes par bya'o 'bras bu shes par bya'o//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang /cung zad med
232b3(nyi khri): pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o//rgyu shes par bya'o//'bras bu shes par bya'o//dran pa nye bar
232b4(nyi khri): bzhag pa bzhi shes par bya'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags
232b5(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes par bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes par bya'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi drang/
232b6(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
232b7(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po
233a1(nyi khri): shes par bya'o//lam de dag gis kyang sems can gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god/lan
233a2(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la 'god/gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
233a3(nyi khri): bu la 'god/gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god/gang rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/rang byang chub la 'god/gang byang
233a4(nyi khri): chub la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/byang chub la 'god do//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do//de dag la bslabs
233a5(nyi khri): shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug go/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la zhugs nas de bzhin du chos ston to//
233a6(nyi khri): des chos bstan pa de'ang 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des gzhan gyi dbang po shin tu shes par byas pa'i phyir te/de ni sems can rnams kyi
233a7(nyi khri): lam dang /lam ma yin pa dang /'chi 'pho dang /skye ba'ang rab tu shes so//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
233b1(nyi khri): spyad par bya ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir ni/byang chub kyi phyogs gang la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba 'am/nyan thos kyis bslab
233b2(nyi khri): par bya ba 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyis bslab par bya ba'i chos thams cad gang yang ma 'dus pa med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
233b3(nyi khri): gang lags pa dang /byang chub gang lags pa'i chos de dag thams cad ldan pa'ang ma lags mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/gzugs ma mchis pa bstan du ma mchis pa/thogs pa
233b4(nyi khri): ma mchis pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig na/ji ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams byang chub sgrub par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das ldan
233b5(nyi khri): pa'ang ma lags/mi ldan pa'ang ma lags la/gzugs ma mchis shing /bstan du ma mchis/thogs pa ma mchis/'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par/mtshan nyid gcig pa
233b6(nyi khri): ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa 'am/'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha' ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa'am 'jig par mi bgyid do//bcom ldan
233b7(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni/chos gang la'ang sgrub pa 'am 'jig par bgyid pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de
234a1(nyi khri): bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa'am 'jig par byed pa med do//rab 'byor sems can gang rang gi mtshan nyid
234a2(nyi khri): kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag gi don du 'di skad du/'di dag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos byang chub thob par byed pa'o zhes bshad kyi/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs gang
234a3(nyi khri): yin pa dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang yin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol
234a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
234a5(nyi khri): pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /dngos po med pa'i
234a6(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa gang
234a7(nyi khri): yin pa dang /byams pa gang yin pa dang /snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms
234b1(nyi khri): drug bkrung yin pa dang /rnam shes mtha' las skye mchod kyi/snyoms par 'jug pA dang /cung zad med pa'i skyo mchod kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du gas med 'jugs/
234b2(nyi khri): med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi gang yin pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /
234b3(nyi khri): stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lhag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /rnam pa
234b4(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
234b5(nyi khri): dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po gang yin pa
234b6(nyi khri): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni chos dang 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa
234b7(nyi khri): bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig kyang /de dag de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams bzung bar bya ba'i don du 'jig
235a1(nyi khri): rten gyi tha snyad kyis de skad du brjod de/don dam par ni ma yin no//de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang /mthong bas bslab par bya/
235a2(nyi khri): ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /mthong bas bslabs nas/chos la la ni mngon du bya'o//la la ni mngon du mi bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
235a3(nyi khri): gang ni shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs te mngon du bya'i/chos gang ni mngon du mi bya zhe na/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs
235a4(nyi khri): te mngon du mi bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon du bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
235a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos 'phags pa'i chos dang /'dul ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i chos dang /'dul
235a6(nyi khri): ba 'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba de ji tsam gyis na/'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul po zhes bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la nyan
235a7(nyi khri): thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
235b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnams ni/'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/bral ba'ang ma yin/zhe sdang dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/bral ba'ang ma yin/gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'o///
235b2(nyi khri): ma yin/'jig tshogs su lta ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/the tshom dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs snyems pa dang
235b3(nyi khri): ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan
235b4(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/ma rig pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/nga rgyal dang rgod pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/bsam gtan dang po dang ldan
235b5(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/bsam gtan gsum pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/bsam gtan
235b6(nyi khri): bzhi pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/byams pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/snying rje dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang ma
235b7(nyi khri): yin bral ba'ang ma yin/btang snyoms dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang
236a1(nyi khri): ma yin/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes
236a2(nyi khri): med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhog pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
236a3(nyi khri): dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
236a4(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
236a5(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ldan pa'ang ma
236a6(nyi khri): yin bral ba'ang ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
236a7(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/'dus byas kyi khams dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma
236b1(nyi khri): yin pas/de'i phyir de dag ni 'phags pa zhes bya ste/'di ni de dag gi chos dang 'dul ba yin pas/de'i phyir 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di
236b2(nyi khri): ltar chos de dag thams cad gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/de dag ni gzugs med pa dang /
236b3(nyi khri): gzugs med par ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//bstan du med pa dang bstan du med par ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//thogs pa med pa dang /thogs pa
236b4(nyi khri): med par ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//mtshan nyid med pa dang mtshan nyid med par ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
236b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa/mtshan nyid med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de la byang chub sems
236b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya'o//des de la bslabs na/chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
236b7(nyi khri): 'das 'o na gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bslob par mi bgyi 'am/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/skye mched
237a1(nyi khri): dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/
237a2(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha
237a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid la bslab
237a4(nyi khri): par mi bgyi 'am/bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mtshan
237a5(nyi khri): nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po'i mtshan nyid
237a6(nyi khri): la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /cung zad med
237a7(nyi khri): pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/dran pa nya
237b1(nyi khri): bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
237b2(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par zar
237b3(nyi khri): pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/de bzhin
237b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/
237b5(nyi khri): byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bsrab
237b6(nyi khri): par mi bgyi 'am/kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang
237b7(nyi khri): mthun pa dang /lugs dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi
238a1(nyi khri): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub
238a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang /'du byed kyi mtshan nyid lnga bslabs te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar
238a3(nyi khri): 'gyur/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma
238a4(nyi khri): mchis pa la ma zhugs na/ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
238a5(nyi khri): bar bgyi/chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor na/ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'om/theg pa chen pos sems can rnams 'khor ba las
238a6(nyi khri): sgrol bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te chos la la zhig la mtshan nyid yod na ni/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
238a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de la bslab par yang 'gyur na/chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med cing gzugs med/bstan du med thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar
238b1(nyi khri): mtshan nyid med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya/mtshan nyid med pa la'ang bslag//
238b2(nyi khri): par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sngon chad mtshan nyid med par gyur pa'am/phyis mtshan nyid yod par gyur pa ma yin gyi/rab 'byor chos 'di dag ni sngon chad kyang mtshan
238b3(nyi khri): nyid med la/da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pas na/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya/mtshan nyid med pa la'ang
238b4(nyi khri): bslab par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings
238b5(nyi khri): 'di ni de bzhin du gnas pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid ma mchis shing /mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags/mtshan
238b6(nyi khri): nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na/de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa mchis par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das
238b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis par ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar
239a1(nyi khri): mi nus so//nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/byang chub sems dpa'i
239a2(nyi khri): skyon ma mchis par 'jug par mi nus so//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs par ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la
239a3(nyi khri): bzod pa bskyed par mi nus so//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par ni mngon par shes pa bsgrub par mi nus so//byang chub sems dpa'i mngon por shes pa ma
239a4(nyi khri): bsgrubs par ni/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar mi nus so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
239a5(nyi khri): sems can yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni chos
239a6(nyi khri): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi nus so//chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar ni sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
239a7(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par mi nus so//rang byang chub la dgod par mi nus so//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
239b1(nyi khri): byang chub la 'grod par mi nus so//sems can rnams sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so//tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams
239b2(nyi khri): bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin
239b3(nyi khri): no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin/mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin no//gsol pa/de ltar
239b4(nyi khri): chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems
239b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin/mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin te/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med
239b6(nyi khri): pa bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gsol pa/de ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis po bsgom pa shes
239b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
240a1(nyi khri): pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/bcom
240a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam
240a3(nyi khri): par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rna ba
240a4(nyi khri): dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
240a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par
240a6(nyi khri): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam
240a7(nyi khri): par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa
240b1(nyi khri): bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid
240b2(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes
240b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
240b4(nyi khri): dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o///
240b5(nyi khri): sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /
240b6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes
240b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang
241a1(nyi khri): gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang /skye ba dang rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
241a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
241a3(nyi khri): phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum
241a4(nyi khri): pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol
241a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//nam mkha' mtha' yas
241a6(nyi khri): skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
241a7(nyi khri): dong /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes
241b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes
241b2(nyi khri): su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /'chi
241b3(nyi khri): ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
241b4(nyi khri): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang //
241b5(nyi khri): bdag gi 'du shes dang /sems can gyi 'du shes dang /srog gi 'du shes dang /skye ba'i 'du shes dang /gso ba'i 'du shes dang /skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /gang zag gi 'du
241b6(nyi khri): shes dang /shed can gyi 'du shes dang /shed bdag gi 'du shes dang /byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /mthong ba po'i
241b7(nyi khri): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o///
242a1(nyi khri): bde ba'i 'du shes dang /sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//dran pa nye bar
242a2(nyi khri): bzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang
242a3(nyi khri): chub kyi yan lag dang /lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rnam par
242a4(nyi khri): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom/
242a5(nyi khri): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
242a6(nyi khri): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//kun 'byung
242a7(nyi khri): ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
242b1(nyi khri): pa'o//sdug bsngal shes pa dang kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /'gog pa shes pa dang /lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
242b2(nyi khri): zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mi skye ba shes pa dang /chos shes pa dang /rjes su 'gro ba shos pa dang /kun rdzob
242b3(nyi khri): shes pa dang /'dris pa shes pa dang /sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam
242b4(nyi khri): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
242b5(nyi khri): pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//nang stong pa nyid
242b6(nyi khri): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
242b7(nyi khri): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//ting nge 'dzin thams cad
243a1(nyi khri): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
243a2(nyi khri): pa bsgom pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
243a3(nyi khri): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
243a4(nyi khri): phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang //
243a5(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
243a6(nyi khri): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//bag
243a7(nyi khri): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam por bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
243b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa
243b2(nyi khri): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
243b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na blang ba dang /dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na bsam gtan
243b4(nyi khri): dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms dang /nam
243b5(nyi khri): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug
243b6(nyi khri): pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sangs rgyas
243b7(nyi khri): rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /skyo ba
244a1(nyi khri): rjes su dran pa dang dbugs phyi nang du rgyub rjes su dran pa dang /'tsho ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus sngo rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
244a2(nyi khri): rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/rdo ltar ni mi d+h+r-ig pa'i 'du shes dang sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /dngos
244a3(nyi khri): po med pa'i 'du shes dang /bdag gi 'du shes dang /sems can gyi 'du shes dang /srog gi 'du shes dang /skye ba'i 'du shes dang /gso ba'i 'du shes dang /skyes bu'i 'du
244a4(nyi khri): shes dang /gang zag gi 'du shes dang /shed can gyi 'du shes dang /shid bdag gi 'du shes dang /byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /shes pa dro'i 'du
244a5(nyi khri): shes dang /mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /bde ba'i 'du shes dang /
244a6(nyi khri): sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /bdug gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
244a7(nyi khri): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam
244b1(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rtog pa dang bcas
244b2(nyi khri): dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi
244b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
244b4(nyi khri): lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /sdug bsngal shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /'gog pa shes pa dang /lam shes pa dang /zad pa shes pa dang /mi skye ba shes
244b5(nyi khri): pa dang /chos shes pa dang /rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /kun rdzob shes pa dang /'dris pa shes pa dang /sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
244b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo
244b7(nyi khri): pa lags/ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
245a1(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom
245a2(nyi khri): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
245a3(nyi khri): bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /ji ltar na bag tshogs kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
245a4(nyi khri): cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
245a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes
245a6(nyi khri): pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//blang ba dang dor ba dngos po yod ces
245a7(nyi khri): bya bar mi bsgom mo//bsam gtan dang po dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /byams pa dang /snying rje dang //
245b1(nyi khri): dga' ba dang /btang snyoms dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /cung zad med
245b2(nyi khri): pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//sangs rgyas rjes su
245b3(nyi khri): dran po dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /skyo ba rjes su
245b4(nyi khri): dran pa dang /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//mi rtag pa'i 'du
245b5(nyi khri): shes dang /sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang /bdag gi 'du shes dang /
245b6(nyi khri): sems can gyi 'du shes dang /srog gi 'du shes dang /skye ba'i 'du shes dang /gso ba'i 'du shes dang /skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /gang zag gi 'du shes dang /shed
245b7(nyi khri): can gyi 'du shes dang /shed bdag gi 'du shes dang /byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /mthong ba po'i 'du shes
246a1(nyi khri): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /bde ba'i 'du shes dang /sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod
246a2(nyi khri): ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
246a3(nyi khri): dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar me bsgom mo//rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i
246a4(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//sdug bsngal
246a5(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /sdug bsngal
246a6(nyi khri): shes pa dang /kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /'gog pa shes pa dang /lam shes pa dang /zad pa shes pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa dang /chos shes pa dang /
246a7(nyi khri): rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang /kun rdzob shes pa dang /'dris pa shes pa dang /sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//pha rol tu phyin
246b1(nyi khri): pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo
246b2(nyi khri): thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
246b3(nyi khri): brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
246b4(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon
246b5(nyi khri): mongs pa thams cad spong ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
246b6(nyi khri): med do//dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gautan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims
246b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do//dngos po'i 'du shes can la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i
247a1(nyi khri): bar du med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dngos po la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags te/sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod
247a2(nyi khri): pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /bag chags kyi mtshoms sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i bar la/'di ni bdag
247a3(nyi khri): go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pas/gang mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur po de la ni thar pa med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos po'i
247a4(nyi khri): 'du shes can la ni/sbyin pa'ang med/tshul khrims kyang med/bzod pa'ang med/brtson 'grus kyang med/bsam gtan yang med/shes rab kyang med//
247a5(nyi khri): bag chags kyi mtshamaso sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i bar du'ang yongs su shes pa med na/de thar par 'gyur ba lta ga las yod/gsol pa/bcom
247a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gnyis ni
247a7(nyi khri): dngos po yod pa'o//mi gnyis pa ni dngos po med pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gnyis zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
247b1(nyi khri): pa/rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing
247b2(nyi khri): 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so//blang ba dang dor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so//bsam gtan dang po dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan
247b3(nyi khri): gsum pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par
247b4(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes
247b5(nyi khri): med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so//sangs rgyas rjes su dran po dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
247b6(nyi khri): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs phyi nang du rgya ba rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes
247b7(nyi khri): su dran pa dang /lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so//mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes
248a1(nyi khri): dang /mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dang /bdag gi 'du shes dang /sems can gyi 'du shes dang /srog gi 'du
248a2(nyi khri): shes dang /skye ba'i 'du shes dang /gso ba'i 'du shes dang /skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /gang zag gi 'du shes dang /shed can gyi 'du shes dang /shed bdag
248a3(nyi khri): gi 'du shes dang /byed pa po'i 'du shes dang /tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /mthong ba po'i 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so//
248a4(nyi khri): rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /bde ba'i 'du shes dang /sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /bdag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
