279a6(nyi khri): du khyod kyi sbyin pa de lta bur/de ltar phan pa med pa/mi brtan pa yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer na/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
279a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di snyam du bdag la sems can 'di dag khyod kyi sbyin pa de ltar phan pa med pa/mi brtan pa/yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer mod kyi//
279b1(nyi khri): 'on kyang bdag gis sbyin pa yongs su btang bar bya'i/bdag gis sbyin pa mi sbyin par mi bya'o snyam nas/de sbyin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang
279b2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ci nas kyang yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe/gang sbyin pa dang /gang la sbyin pa dang /gang gis sbyin pa dang /su yongs su gtong ba dang /ci yongs
279b3(nyi khri): su gtong ba dang /su ci yongs su gtong ba dang /ci yongs su bsngo ba dang /gang la yongs su bsngo ba dang /gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang /su yongs su bsngo ba dang /ci yongs su bsngo ba dang /
279b4(nyi khri): gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i mtshan ma'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ste/de gang gtong ba dang /gang gi phyir btang ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
279b5(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu'i dngos po de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dngos po thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /phyi stong
279b6(nyi khri): pa nyid kyis stong /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo //des de ltar chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong na//
279b7(nyi khri): ci zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/gang la yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur te/de'i bsngo ba de lta bu ni bsngo ba'i dam pa yin/dug med
280a1(nyi khri): pa'i bsngo ba dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi bsngo ba yin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos
280a2(nyi khri): thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/sems can rnams yongs su smin par
280a3(nyi khri): byed de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
280a4(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub
280a5(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa
280a6(nyi khri): dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs
280a7(nyi khri): kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
280b1(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de thog ma nyid du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang rnam par smin pa yongs su mi 'dzin te/'on kyang de'i yo
280b2(nyi khri): byang bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub bo//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung
280b3(nyi khri): /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo //de yo byad de dag gis sangs
280b4(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la'ang bsnyen bkur byed lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang tshim par byas so//des sems can de dag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des
280b5(nyi khri): yang dag par bsdus te/thabs mkhas pas theg pa gsum la rab tu 'jog go/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
280b6(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
280b7(nyi khri): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /
281a1(nyi khri): byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed
281a2(nyi khri): pa nas nye bar bzung ste/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
281a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa
281a4(nyi khri): la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de la 'phags pa'i
281a5(nyi khri): tshul khrims zug pa med pa lam gyi khongs su chud pa/chos nyid kyis thob pa rab tu 'thob ste/de'i tshul khrims de ni ma zhig pa yin/ma god pa yin/ma 'dres pa yin//
281a6(nyi khri): rnyog pa med pa yin/ma nyams pa yin/rang dbang yod pa yin/shin tu rdzogs pa yin/mkhas pas bstod pa yin te/tshul khrims des gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am 'du
281a7(nyi khri): shes sam 'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar ram/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs
281b1(nyi khri): sam/bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/khyim bdag che zhing mtho bla'i rigs sam/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams sam/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtsho ma dang /dga'
281b2(nyi khri): ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs tshe nu dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /
281b3(nyi khri): cheng med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che ba dang /'du shes med pa'i lha rnams sim/mi
281b4(nyi khri): che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams sam/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye
281b5(nyi khri): mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mche de dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bros bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bros
281b6(nyi khri): bu'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang sangs rgyas sam/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang tshul khrims 'dis thob par bya'o zhes chos gang la'ang
281b7(nyi khri): snyems pa med do//gzhan du na tshul khrims de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mtshan ma med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang /
282a1(nyi khri): dmigs su myed pa dang /gnyis su med pa'i yongs su bsngo byas yongs su bsngo ste/de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du'i/don dam par ni ma yin no//de tshul
282a2(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa de dang /thabs mkhas pas/ro myang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo//de lha'i mig gi mngon par sgrub ste/lha'i
282a3(nyi khri): mig rnam par smin pa las byung ba des/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs/
282a4(nyi khri): shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/de'i mthong ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
282a5(nyi khri): chud za bar mi 'gyur ro//lha'i mig rnam par smin pa las byung ba des/lho dang nub dang byang dang /byang shar dang shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'ogra dang /steng
282a6(nyi khri): go phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med/grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
282a7(nyi khri): dang /chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/de'i mthong ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud zo bar
282b1(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro//de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsungs pa'i sgra thos te/de'i thos pa de'ang ji srid du thob pa des
282b2(nyi khri): bdag dang /gzhan gyi don byas par ma gyur gyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro//sems kyi rnam pa shes pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis rab tu shes
282b3(nyi khri): te/des sems kyi rnam pa shes pa de'ang ji srid du sems kyi rnam pa shes pa des sems can thams cad kyi don byas par ma gyur gyi bar du chud za bar mi 'gyur ro//de sngon gyi
282b4(nyi khri): gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas/sems can de dag gi 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams shes shing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sems can de dag la yang
282b5(nyi khri): dag par ston to//yang dag par bskul lo//yang dag par gzeng bstod do//yang dag par dga' bar byed do//de dag de ltar yang dag par bstan pa dang /yang dag par dga'
282b6(nyi khri): bi'i bar du byas pa rnams kyang khyad par du 'dod par 'gyur ro//zag pa zang po'i shes pas kyang sems can rnams/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/lan cig phyir
282b7(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go/rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/de bzhin du
283a1(nyi khri): sems can rnams dge ba'i chos gang dang gang la mthu yod pa de dang de la rab tu gzhog ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
283a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya
283a3(nyi khri): ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
283a4(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par
283a5(nyi khri): 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
283a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba
283a7(nyi khri): med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/'di lta ste/gnod pa la mi mjed
283b1(nyi khri): pa'i bzod pa dang /me skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gnyis sgom ste/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod pa la mo mjed pa'i bzod pa ni/de'i drung du sems can
283b2(nyi khri): thams cad yang dang yod 'ongs te gshe zhing mi snyan par brjod de/rdo ba dang /dbyig pas brdegs shing /mtshon gyis btab kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
283b3(nyi khri): pos 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o//des 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/de la gang spyo ba dang /mi snyan par smra bar bya ba dang /gdab cing
283b4(nyi khri): brdeg par bya ba gang yang med/gang lo gshe ba dang /mi snyan par brjod pa dang /brdeg pa dang /'debs po de'ang med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o//de la byang
283b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog na/chos nyid kyang mi
283b6(nyi khri): dmigs na/chos rnams kyi ring bzhin dmigos pa lta ga la yod de/ngas de ltar chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab
283b7(nyi khri): tu thob bo//ci'i phyir bzod pa zhes bya zhe na/nyon mongs pa mi skye ba dang /ye shes mi chod pa'i phyir bzod pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o//de bzod pa de gnyis la gnas shing
284a1(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
284a2(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang //
284a3(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so
284a4(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de 'phags pa'i chos zag
284a5(nyi khri): pa med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su
284a6(nyi khri): rdzogs par byed do//mngon par shes pa de dgra yongs su rdzogs nas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas te/lha'i mig gis shar
284a7(nyi khri): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med/dpag tu med pa dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa
284b1(nyi khri): de dag thams cad mthong ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo//de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de'ang nam bla na med pa yang dag
284b2(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad do//de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs
284b3(nyi khri): rgyas dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag thams cad la gnas te/'phags pa'i chos mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs
284b4(nyi khri): nas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la gnas te/lha'i mig gis lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang
284b5(nyi khri): dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med/tshad med/dpag tu med pa dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
284b6(nyi khri): bzhugs pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'thob bo//de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de'ang num bla na med pa
284b7(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun mi 'chad do//ngo lha'i rna ba mi las 'das pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
285a1(nyi khri): gsungs pa zos te/thos nas kyang 'dzin te/bzung nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed do//de bzhin nyid du nan tan byas nas kyang /de bzhin nyid du sems can
285a2(nyi khri): rnams la chos ston to//de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis rab tu shes so//'phags pa thams cad dang /nyan
285a3(nyi khri): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang rab tu shes so//de sems can thams cad kyi sems/sems kyis yongs su shes
285a4(nyi khri): par byas shing /de bzhin nyid du chos ston to//de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pas/sems can de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su shes par byas
285a5(nyi khri): shing /yang sems can de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par ston to//yang dag par bskul lo//yang dag par gzeng bstod do//yang dag par dga' bar byed do//de
285a6(nyi khri): zag pa zad pa shes te/zag pa zad pa shes pa des/sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de//
285a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya
285b1(nyi khri): ba med pa la/mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
285b2(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas//
285b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag
285b4(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/chos kyi 'khor lo
285b5(nyi khri): bskor ro//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/sems can rnams theg pa gsum gyis 'khor ba las yongs su 'grol to//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
285b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan mA med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon
285b7(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med pa la/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
286a1(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba
286a2(nyi khri): med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
286a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma meng ba dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /
286a4(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshon ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/sems kyi brtson
286a5(nyi khri): 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/de lus kyi brtson 'grus la gnas nas/bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan
286a6(nyi khri): gsum pa dang /bsnam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag cing /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed
286a7(nyi khri): do//nyi ma dang zla ba'i bar du lag pas byugs shing /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyi dbang sgyur te/de lus kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam
286b1(nyi khri): pa des/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med/grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa
286b2(nyi khri): de dag tu song zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la na bza' dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/na bza' dang /bsod
286b3(nyi khri): snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad mang po de dag kyang /nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar
286b4(nyi khri): du zad par mi 'gyur te/byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad mang pos/lha
286b5(nyi khri): dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bde bar 'gyur ro//yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur
286b6(nyi khri): ro//rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du song zhing chos nyan te/ji skad du thos pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
286b7(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chud za bar mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par
287a1(nyi khri): byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
287a2(nyi khri): chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas//
287a3(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa
287a4(nyi khri): med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus 'phags pa zag pa med pa/lam gyi yan lag gi khongs su
287a5(nyi khri): chud pa dang ldan pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
287a6(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmyigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang
287a7(nyi khri): bral po'i sems kyis/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/lus kyi las mi dge ba'i skabs ma 'byed/ngag gi las mi dge
287b1(nyi khri): ba'i skangs mi 'byed/yod kyi las mi dge ba'i skabs mi 'byed do/rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba 'am/bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/bdag ces
287b2(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am/zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am/dge zhes bya ba 'am/mi dge zhes bya ba 'am/'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/'jig rten las 'das
287b3(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/nyon mongs pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/kha na ma tho ba med ces bya ba 'am/zag pa
287b4(nyi khri): dang bcas zhes bya ba'am/zag pa med ces bya ba 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba 'am/'dus byas zhes bya ba 'am/'dus ma byas zhes bya/
287b5(nyi khri): bar sems pa med do//'dod pa'i khams sam/gzugs kyi khams sam/gzugs med pa'i khams sam zag pa dang bcas pa'i khams sam zag pa med pa'i khams sam/
287b6(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang po 'am/ngasam gtan gnyis pa'am/bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/byams pa 'am/snying rje 'am/dga' ba 'am/btang snyoms
287b7(nyi khri): sam/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dam/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dam/cung zad med pa'i skye mched dam/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dam/sbyin
288a1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan
288a2(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/nang stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ram/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang
288a3(nyi khri): dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
288a4(nyi khri): brgyad pa 'am/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa
288a5(nyi khri): rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/stong pa nyid dam/mtshan ma med pa 'am/smon pa med pa 'am/mngon par shes pa'am/ting nge 'dzin
288a6(nyi khri): ta ma/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po'am//
288a7(nyi khri): snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la'ang /rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya ba 'am/bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/bdag ces
288b1(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am/zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zho zhes bya ba 'am/dge zhes bya ba 'am/mi dge zhes bya ba 'am/'jig rten zhes bya ba 'am/'jig rten las 'das
288b2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/nyon mongs pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/kha na ma tho ba med ces bya ba 'am/zag
288b3(nyi khri): pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/zag pa med ces bya ba 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba 'am/rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba'am/'dus byas zhes bya ba 'am/'dus ma byas
288b4(nyi khri): zhes bya bar snyems pa med do//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur snyoms pa med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /
288b5(nyi khri): rang byang chub dang /byang chub sems dpa' nyid dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu snyems pa med do//rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba
288b6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang /dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang /rang sangs rgyaso zhes bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya ba dang /sangs rgyas zhes bya bar snyems
288b7(nyi khri): pa med do//sems can 'di dag ni mthong ba'i lam gyis brjod pa 'di dag ni bsrabs pa'i sas brjod pa/'di dag ni dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyis brjod pa/'di dag ni bla ma'i cha
289a1(nyi khri): can gyis brjod pa/'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis brjod pa/'di dag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis brjod pa/'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
289a2(nyi khri): nyid kyis brjod pa zhes bya bar yang snyems pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid gang gis brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/sems las byung ba'i brtson/
289a3(nyi khri): 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas mngon du gyur kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed de/sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su rdzogs
289a4(nyi khri): par byed de/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang mi dmigs
289a5(nyi khri): so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang mi dmigs so//de sems kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas/dge ba'i chos thams cad
289a6(nyi khri): yongs su 'dzin kyang de la chags pa med do//de tshogs pa med pa rnams kyi don byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o//'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig
289a7(nyi khri): rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gang dang gang gis rnam par 'phrul par 'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul de dang des rnam par 'phrul te/me tog gi char
289b1(nyi khri): dbab pa 'am/spos kyi ngang bkye ba 'am/'brug gri sgra bsgrag pa 'am/glu bro dang /sil snyan gyi sgra bsgrag pa dang /sa bskyod pa dang /snang ba bstan pa'am/rin po che sna bdun gyi
289b2(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams bstan pas rnam par 'phrul te/gang dang gang du gang dang gang sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdag gi lus las 'gyed de/sems can
289b3(nyi khri): rnams kyi don du bar 'ga' bdag 'gyed do//bar 'ga' dri zhim po 'gyed do//bar 'ga' srog gcod pa med pa'i mchod sbyin chen po byed do//bar 'ga' sems can mtha' yas
289b4(nyi khri): pa lam ma yin pa nas 'don te/srog gcod pa las ldog go/ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /phra ma smra ba dang /zhe gcod pa'i tshig dang /rdzun du
289b5(nyi khri): smra ba dang /tshig kyal pa dang /chags sems dang /gnod sems dang /log par lta ba las yongs su 'grol to//la la la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs la la la ni tshul khrims
289b6(nyi khri): kyis phan 'drogs la la'i don du yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ngo //la la'i don du ni bu dang /chung ma yongs su gtong ngo //la la'i don du ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong
289b7(nyi khri): ngo//la la'i don du ni bdag yongs su gtong ste/de ltar thabs gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed
290a1(nyi khri): do||rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed
290a2(nyi khri): pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
290a3(nyi khri): su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan mi med pa dang /
290a4(nyi khri): byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bsum gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na//
290a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs
290a6(nyi khri): su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
290a7(nyi khri): phyin pa la gnas shing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par/ting nge 'dzin gzhan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de 'dod pas dben sdig to mi
290b1(nyi khri): dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//bsam
290b2(nyi khri): gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa lnga nye bar bsgobs te gnas so//de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang /snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems dang /
290b3(nyi khri): dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems dang /btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas po/nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du
290b4(nyi khri): rgyas par bkang zhing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med
290b5(nyi khri): 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas so//de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas shing /rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugaso dang mthun pa dang /lugs dang
290b6(nyi khri): mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa ro 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
290b7(nyi khri): smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge
291a1(nyi khri): 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bya'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye
291a2(nyi khri): shes kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi khongs su ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud par byas shing /dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'da'o//dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa
291a3(nyi khri): las 'das nas/rigs kyi sa dang /brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /rang sangs
291a4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sa las 'da'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/sangs rgyas kyi
291a5(nyi khri): sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//des de dag la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma thob kyi bar du 'bras bu bar ma dor thob par mi byed de/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha
291a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi
291a7(nyi khri): zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/sangs rgyas kyi
291b1(nyi khri): zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed de/'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing sems
291b2(nyi khri): can rnams kyi don byed do//de la sems can la la ni sbyin pas yongs su sdud do//la la ni tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud do//la la ni ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do//la
291b3(nyi khri): la ni shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do//la la ni rnam par grol bas yongs su sdud do//la la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su sdud do//la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
291b4(nyi khri): 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go/la la ni rang byang chub la rab tu
291b5(nyi khri): gzhog go/la la ni bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/de de ltar dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis sems can rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de dang de la sbyor
291b6(nyi khri): te/de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon par sgrub bo//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob bo//rnam par smin pa las
291b7(nyi khri): byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob pa yin te/de nam yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro//nam yang 'dod pa la brten par mi 'gyur/
292a1(nyi khri): ro//sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i don du skye ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa'ang gang yang med do//skye ba'i nyes pas kyang yongs su gos par myi 'gyur ro//de
292a2(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad rab tu mthong /rab tu rig rab tu rtogs pas na de sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rig par byas shing /sems
292a3(nyi khri): can thams cad kyi don byed do//des sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rab tu rig pas/sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skye ste/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chos thams cad
292a4(nyi khri): sgyu ma lta bu la 'khor ba na sdug bsngal meng po nyams su myong bar gyur pa yin na/bdag gis 'di dag na ma zhig na sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la
292a5(nyi khri): dgod par 'gyur zhes snying rje chen po skye ste/de la'ang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa dmigs su med de des chos thams cad ma dmigs nus 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar
292a6(nyi khri): bzung ste/dmigs su med pa de nyid la sems can rnams 'god de/don dam par ni ma yin no//de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing /bsam gtan dang /rnam
292a7(nyi khri): par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la spyod de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam
292b1(nyi khri): du'ang ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
292b2(nyi khri): mngon par sgrub ste/de la gnas nas/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spang ngo //bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spangs nas/bdag gi don kyang
292b3(nyi khri): byed gzhan gyi don kyang byed de/des bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ri mo 'gro'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na
292b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba
292b5(nyi khri): med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
292b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /
292b7(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
293a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshon ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang //
293a2(nyi khri): 'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/yang dag pa'am yongs su grub pa'i chos
293a3(nyi khri): gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med de/gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam
293a4(nyi khri): par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/des gzugs kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshor
293a5(nyi khri): ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/gzugs kyi skye ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi
293a6(nyi khri): mthong /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des gzugs kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshor ba dang
293a7(nyi khri): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du
293b1(nyi khri): byed dang rnam par shes pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des gzugs kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes
293b2(nyi khri): pa'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/gzugs kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i tshogs yang dag par
293b3(nyi khri): rjes su mi mthong ste/gso ba nyid dang /gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi yang dag pa dang yongs su grub pa yang dag par
293b4(nyi khri): rjes su mi mthong ste/des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang /yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dgu
293b5(nyi khri): par rjes su mi mthong ngo //des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
293b6(nyi khri): des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gsob nyid dang /gsog
293b7(nyi khri): nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/gzugs kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs
294a1(nyi khri): so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin mi dmigs so//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad dngos po med po'i
294a2(nyi khri): rang bzhin du rtogs par byed de/de de ltar rtogs par byed cing /nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /dngos po
294a3(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs sam/tshor ba 'amo 'du shes sam 'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/skye mched dam khams sam//
294a4(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'am/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sam/stong pa nyid rnams sam/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sam/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/
294a5(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
294a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams sam/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa rnams sam/mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams
294a7(nyi khri): sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po'am/sangs
294b1(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar ram/chos gang la'ang mngon par chags pa med do//de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes
294b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
294b3(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa
294b4(nyi khri): rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
294b5(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi
294b6(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin to//de byang chub kyi lam rnam par
294b7(nyi khri): smin pa'i chos can la gnas pas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsi bdun yongs su rdzogs
295a1(nyi khri): pa dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas/sems can gang la sbyin pas ngan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang
295a2(nyi khri): sbyin pas phan 'dogs so//gang la tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang /tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so//gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya
295a3(nyi khri): ngo de dag la'ang bzod pas phan 'dogs so//gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so//gang la ting nge 'dzin gyis
295a4(nyi khri): phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so//gang la shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so//gang
295a5(nyi khri): la rnam par grol ngas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la'ang rnam par grol bas phan 'dogs so//gang la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas pan gdags par bya ba de
295a6(nyi khri): dag la'ang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas pa na 'dogs so//gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu
295a7(nyi khri): dgod do//gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
295b1(nyi khri): byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu dgod do//de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du mas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
295b2(nyi khri): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste/de 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag rin po che gang las 'dod pa'i rin po che de dag las grub par mngon par bsgrubs te/de
295b3(nyi khri): sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/des 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mthong nas ci 'dod par sangs
295b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te 'di ltar dper na gzhan phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi longs spyod dang /skyid pa de lta bu dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan btsal ba dang /bral ba dag dang
295b5(nyi khri): longs spyod dang skyid pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag der 'byung ste/de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brjod
295b6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phan pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon
295b7(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams dang /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing /chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob nas/
296a1(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob ste/gal te ji tsam du gzugs yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par
296a2(nyi khri): shes pa yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su bzung ba med pa dang /dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /'jig rten pa dang /
296a3(nyi khri): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su bzung ba med pa de bzhin du/bla na
296a4(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der longs spyod dang /skyid pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba med par 'gyur
296a5(nyi khri): ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bzung ba med pa ste/chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba med pa'i phyir yang sems can
296a6(nyi khri): rnams la chos ston to//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa
296a7(nyi khri): med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na
296b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang /byed pa med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /'byung
296b2(nyi khri): ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
296b3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug cu'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
296b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing /mtshan ma ma mchis la/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa lags na/ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol
296b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi
296b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang /ji ltar na tha dad du gyur par gda' ba lags/ji ltar shes rab
296b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin par/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
297a1(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
297a2(nyi khri): pa rnams kyi bar du 'dus pa lags/bcom ldan 'das de ltar mtshan nyid kyang tha dad la/'di lta ste/mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig par gyur pa de dag rnam pa ji lta/
297a3(nyi khri): bur gdags par 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
297a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //tshul khrims srung
297a5(nyi khri): ngo//bzod pa sgom mo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//shes rab sgom mo//sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /chu zla lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgra
297a6(nyi khri): brnyan lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //tshul khrims
297a7(nyi khri): srung ngo //bzod pa sgom mo//brtson 'grus rtsom mo//ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//shes rab sgom mo//de 'di ltar rtog ste/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste/mtshan
297b1(nyi khri): nyid med pa'o//nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /chu zla lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /dri za'i
297b2(nyi khri): grong khyer lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu ste/mtshan nyid med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rmi lam la rang bzhin gang yang med do//sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang mig yor dang /sgra
297b3(nyi khri): brnyan lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan dang /dri za'i grong khyer dang /sprul pa la rang bzhin gang yang myed do//gang la rang bzhin med pa de la mtshan nyid med de/grang mtshan nyid med
297b4(nyi khri): pa de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes bya bar rtogs par byed de/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/sbyin pa ni mtshan
297b5(nyi khri): nyid med pa'o//gtong ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o//len pa ni mtshan nyid mong pa'o zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/gang de ltar shes nas sbyin pa gtong ba de ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
297b6(nyi khri): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog go/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
297b7(nyi khri): pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir si ldog go/de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de
298a1(nyi khri): dag la gnas shing /byasam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//chad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bcu yongs su rdzogs/
298a2(nyi khri): par byed do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lta dang /
298a3(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//nong stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du
298a4(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar
298a5(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /so so yang dgu par rig pa rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs
298a6(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de 'phags
298a7(nyi khri): pa'i chos kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa/rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad maud grangs med//
298b1(nyi khri): dpag tu med pa dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing /na bza' dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun
298b2(nyi khri): gyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/longs spyod dang skyid pa thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do//de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba de
298b3(nyi khri): dag kyang sbyin pas yongs su sdud do//gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsngo ba de dag dang /gang bzod pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag dang /gang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag
298b4(nyi khri): dang /gang bsam gtan gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag dang /gang shes rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do//gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
298b5(nyi khri): kyi bar gyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//de ltar gang dang gang dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang //
298b6(nyi khri): dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do//de dge ba'i rtsa bya de dag dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas/'khor ba nye bar len kyang /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis
298b7(nyi khri): mi gos te/de sems can rnams kyi don du ma dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te/phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis/sems can rnams yongs su sdud do//de chos thams
299a1(nyi khri): cang mtshan nyid med par shes pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la mi gnas so//lan cig phyir 'ong bya'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
299a2(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la mi gnas so//rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar des chos thams cad shes par byas te/nyan thos dang /
299a3(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
299a4(nyi khri): ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par shes pas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug mtshan nyid med par shes so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtshan nyid med par shes so///
299a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar lon pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/sgyu ma lta
299a6(nyi khri): bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /chu zla lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye ba len
299a7(nyi khri): pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang nye bar len pa'i
299b1(nyi khri): phung po lnga rmi lam lta bur shes/sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /chu zla lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /dri za'i grong khyer
299b2(nyi khri): lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur shes nis/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa/ma zhig pa/ma ral pa/skyon med pa/rnyog pa med pa/nyams pa med pa/dbang du
299b3(nyi khri): gyur pa/mkhas pas bsngags pa/shin tu rdzogs pa/'phags par gyur pa/zag pa med pa/lam gyi khongs su chud pa/'jig rten las 'das pa/yongs su rdzogs par byed de/
299b4(nyi khri): de la gnas shing /yang dag par blang ba'i brda dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang /chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang /sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang /dmigs pa'i tshul khrims
299b5(nyi khri): dang /spyad pa'i tshul khrims dang /ma spyad pa'i tshul khrims bsrung ngo //de tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan yang /'dis bdag rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba
299b6(nyi khri): mnyam pa 'am/bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs drang /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/rgyal phran nam/'khor los sgyur ba'i
299b7(nyi khri): rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum mam/mtsho ma 'am/dga' ldan nem/
300a1(nyi khri): 'phrul dga' 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe 'am/lan
300a2(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/byang chub thob par bya'o zhes tshul khrims des snyems pa med do///
300a3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/'di ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gcig pas na mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi mtshan
300a4(nyi khri): nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo //mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo //mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis
300a5(nyi khri): kyang /mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thob par mi rung ngo //rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
300a6(nyi khri): cing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i
300a7(nyi khri): tshe/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob ste/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes po lnga rab tu thob nas/gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya
300b1(nyi khri): dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas
300b2(nyi khri): kyi zhing du 'gro ste/sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su 'dzin to//de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang /'khor ba'i las kyi rnam par
300b3(nyi khri): smin pas gos par mi 'gyur te/'di ltar dper na sprul pa ni 'gro ba 'am/sdod pa 'am/'dug pa 'am nyal ba byed kyang de la 'gro ba'am 'ong ba 'am/sdod pa 'am/'dug pa 'am/
300b4(nyi khri): nyal ba'ang mi dmigs te/de sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do//sems can dang sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so////shes rab kyi pha
300b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po drug cu drug pa//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu
300b6(nyi khri): zhi ba zhes bya ba/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/sems can tshad med pa theg pa gnyis kyis
300b7(nyi khri): yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas/des tshe'i
301a1(nyi khri): 'du byed spangs nas/sprul pa sprul pa mdzad de/phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//rab 'byor de ltar sprul pa
301a2(nyi khri): des bskal pa gcig lon nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
301a3(nyi khri): gyur to//yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am 'du shes sam 'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa'am/dngos po gang yang dmigs su med
301a4(nyi khri): de//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs la/sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do//
301a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mtshan nyid med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa
301a6(nyi khri): byed do//de yongs su rdzogs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad khongs su chud par shes so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
301a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /
301b1(nyi khri): sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te/mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
301b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams lnga gnas shing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
301b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa gnyis kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/gnyis gang zhe no/nyams su len+da pa'i bzod pa dang /chos khongs su
301b4(nyi khri): chung pa'i bzod pa'o//de la nyams su len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems
301b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i drung du/gal te sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs shing /gsho ba 'am/mi sbyin par brjod cing /ma klas pa'i tshig brlang ba zer bar gyur tam/rdo dbyig dang /
301b6(nyi khri): mtshon chas brdegs sam/btab kyang /de la byang chub sems dpa' snyems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/sems bskyed pa 'og 'atsam
301b7(nyi khri): yang 'khrug pa dang ldan pa 'am/gnod sems dang ldan pa bskyed par mi bya ste/phyir sems can de dag la kye mo sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar ba ste/
302a1(nyi khri): 'di dag la bdag gis sdig to'i sems mi bskyed kyi 'di ni bdag nyid kyis phung po dgrar gyur pa 'di rnams blangs pa'i lan to zhes/de dag lhag par snying rje bskyed
302a2(nyi khri): par bya'o//byams pa dang ldan te/snying rje bar gyur nas/rnam pa de ltar rtog pa 'di ni nyams su len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o//de ltar chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na//
302a3(nyi khri): sems can de dag kyang don dam par dmigs su med na/bdag la gsho ba 'am/mi snyan par brjod pa 'am/ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba 'am/rdo dbyig gis brdeg
302a4(nyi khri): cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod de/'du byed thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu/gsob/gsog/rag las pa/nam mkha' lta bu/badrag dang /sems can dang /srog dang /'gro
302a5(nyi khri): ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /shed bdag dang bral ba ste/rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin na/bdag
302a6(nyi khri): la gshe ba dang /mi ston par brjod pa dang /ma klas pa'i tshig brlang zer ba dang /rdo dbyig gis brdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa lta bu zhig yod de/bdag gi ngo bo nyid
302a7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/de ltar rnam par brtag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/de de ltar yongs su
302b1(nyi khri): rtog cing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo//rab 'byor gyis gsol
302b2(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/de spangs pa ni ci mchis/ye shes ni ci mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos
302b3(nyi khri): gang la rdul ci ma yang skye ba med pa de ni mi skye ba'o//de gang gis shes pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya ba ste/shes pa des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
302b4(nyi khri): nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags
302b5(nyi khri): pa'i bzod pa de dag la bye brag tu bgyi ba ci mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang
302b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod/
302b7(nyi khri): pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang //
303a1(nyi khri): spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang /spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub
303a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bye brag yin no//rab 'byor byang
303a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te/de rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i
303a4(nyi khri): mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de yongs su rdzogs pas/byang
303a5(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mi 'bral ba yin/de mngon par shes pa lnga dang mi
303a6(nyi khri): 'bral ba yin/de mngon par shes pa rnams dang mi 'bral bas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa yin/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin/de sems
303a7(nyi khri): can rnams yongs su smin par byas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
303b1(nyi khri): par byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mtshan nyid med pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
303b2(nyi khri): rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la
303b3(nyi khri): gnas/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus
303b4(nyi khri): rtsom mo//de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs te/phyogs dang phyogs mchims thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
303b5(nyi khri): 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /sems can rnams kyi don byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can rnams yongs
303b6(nyi khri): su smin par byas nas/theg pa gsum la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
303b7(nyi khri): mtshan nyid med pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de sems kyi brtson 'grus zag pa med pa lam gyi yan lag tu gyur pa lam gyi khongs su chud pas
304a1(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
304a2(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /bsam
304a3(nyi khri): gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
304a4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
304a5(nyi khri): brgyad yongs su 'dus pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de la spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/de
304a6(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs pas bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spang bar 'gyur ro//bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas/mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs
304a7(nyi khri): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//kun tu snang bar thob par byas nas/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du bskor ba bskor bar 'gyur ro//de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong
304b1(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba dang /rab tu g.yo ba dang /kun nas g.yo ba dang /'gul ba dang /rab tu 'gul ba dang /kun nas 'gul ba dang /ldeg pa dang /
304b2(nyi khri): rab tu ldeg pa dang /kun nas ldeg par 'gyur te/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs
304b3(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sgra gang du byung zhing dbyangs grags par gyur pa'i sgra de/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
304b4(nyi khri): gang ji snyed kyi thos pa de thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/rab 'byor de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
304b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//rnam pa thams
304b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bus nye bar len pa'i phung
304b7(nyi khri): po lnga la gnas/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /migo yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin
305a1(nyi khri): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/rmi lam lta bu'i
305a2(nyi khri): nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing /
305a3(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs
305a4(nyi khri): te gnas so//bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /bsam gtan gsum pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' bo dang /
305a5(nyi khri): btang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du
305a6(nyi khri): shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//stong pa nyid dang /mtshon ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//yang
305a7(nyi khri): dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo//rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par/nyan thos dang thun mong pa 'am/rang sangs
305b1(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin grang ji snyed pa dang /gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing /nye bar
305b2(nyi khri): bsgrubs te gnas kyang /ting nge 'dzin de dag dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro'ang myong bar mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
305b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzin de dag gi/mtshan nyid med pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas na/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyis ro myong
305b4(nyi khri): bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur/dngos po med pa'i chos kyang /dngos po med pa'i chos kyis ro myong bar byed par ga la 'gyur te/de ro myong bar byed pa med pas/ting nge 'dzin
305b5(nyi khri): gang gis dbang gis kyang gzugs kyi khams sam/gzugs med pa'i khams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des khams de gnyis kyang mi dmigs/gang
305b6(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang /gang gis snyoms par 'jug par yang mi dmigs so//de mi dmyigs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
305b7(nyi khri): par byed do//ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/byang
306a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su
306a2(nyi khri): 'da' bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gA/rab 'byor de ni ng+ge m+b+hi byang chub sems dpa' sa nas chen pos rbang stong ba nyid la shin tu bskabs pA dang /
306a3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir te/stong pa nyid 'di dag la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
306a4(nyi khri): 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang mi
306a5(nyi khri): dmigs te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de'ang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong ste/stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang
306a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su shin tu 'das nas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
306a7(nyi khri): skyon ni gang lags/skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
306b1(nyi khri): chen po'i skyon no//mi dmigs pa thams cad ni skyon med pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa ni gang lags/mi dmigs pa ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
306b2(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//rab 'byor tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems
306b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//mig dang gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//rna ba dang sgra dang sna dang dri dang lce dang ro dang lus drang reg
306b4(nyi khri): bya dang /yid dang chos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmigs pa'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
306b5(nyi khri): tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o//rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni dmigs pa'o//sa'i
306b6(nyi khri): khams dang chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmigs pa'o//ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang
306b7(nyi khri): ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi ni dmigs pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams
307a1(nyi khri): cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
307a2(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon
307a3(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
307a4(nyi khri): dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dmigs pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni dmigs pa ste skyon no//
307a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor skyon med pa ni gang la gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol
307a6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /'phags pa'i badren pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa
307a7(nyi khri): rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
307b1(nyi khri): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi
307b2(nyi khri): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang /
307b3(nyi khri): chos de dag gi brjod pa'ang dmigs su med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs la rang bzhin med de gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//tshor ba dang
307b4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rang bzhin
307b5(nyi khri): med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la rang bzhin med de/
307b6(nyi khri): gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
307b7(nyi khri): dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams
308a1(nyi khri): dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rang bzhin med do/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
308a2(nyi khri): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rang bzhin
308a3(nyi khri): med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rang bzhin med de/gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni brjod du med pa'o//rab 'byor
308a4(nyi khri): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon med par zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par zhugs pa
308a5(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de ni/ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye na/'dod chags sam/zhe sdang ngam/gti mug gis skye bar 'gyur zhing de
308a6(nyi khri): la gnas te/de'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang /las de mngon par 'du byas pas/'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/de ni gnas mod do//gzhan du
308a7(nyi khri): na sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la gnas shing /sems can thams cad kyi don byed de/sems can nam sgyu mar yang dmigs pa med do//de sems can dang sgyu ma mi dmigs
308b1(nyi khri): pas/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
308b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du ste/mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang /stong pa nyid
308b3(nyi khri): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos
308b4(nyi khri): thams cad rmi lam lta bur yongs su shes so//chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu mu lta bu dang /smyig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes so//gsol
308b5(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ji ltar na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
308b6(nyi khri): yongs su 'tshal ba lags/ji ltar na chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
308b7(nyi khri): yongs su 'tshal ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
309a1(nyi khri): rmi lam mi mthong ngo //rmi lam mthong ba mi mthong ngo //sgra brnyan mi thos so//sgra brnyan nyan pa mi mthong ngo //mig yor mi mthong ngo //mig yor mthong ba mi mthong
309a2(nyi khri): ngodongo/sgyu ma mi mthong ngo //sgyu ma mthong ba mi mthong ngo //smig rgyu mi mthong ngo //smig rgyu mthong ba mi mthong ngo //sprul pa mi mthong ngo //sprul pa mthong ba mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir/
309a3(nyi khri): zhe na/'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi rmi lam ni phyin ci log go/sgra brnyan ni phyin ci log go/mig yor ni phyin ci log go/sgyu mi ni phyin ci log go/smig rgyu ni phyin ci log
