339a5(nyi khri): spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas
339a6(nyi khri): po/rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/rus pa 'am ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas/phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o//
339a7(nyi khri): zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o//ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas//
339b1(nyi khri): phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o//shing bal gyi sgo nga ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o//phyag dang zhabs dang phrag pa dang mgur gyi lhan shin/
339b2(nyi khri): tu mtho bas bdun shin tu mtho ba'o//phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o//rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o//sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang ngas sku che
339b3(nyi khri): zhing drang ba'o//pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o//spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o//ri
339b4(nyi khri): dgas e Ne ya'i byin pa dang /smig ma dang /ldum bu dra ra ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams la/rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing /byin pa zlum pas ri dgas a Na ya'i byin pa lta bu'o//
339b5(nyi khri): brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la rig pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o//glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu
339b6(nyi khri): mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o//shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go/gser dang dngul
339b7(nyi khri): shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul gyis mi gos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o//shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su
340a1(nyi khri): med pas/s+phu rere nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o//me tog kun+da dang /zla ba dang 'o ma dang /ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las
340a2(nyi khri): kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas zhal mdzod smras brgyan pa'o//ro stong chu bas seng ge'i ro stong do//mgur dang rgyud legs par
340a3(nyi khri): 'brel cing /lhun zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o//gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o//rlung
340a4(nyi khri): drang mkhris pa dang /bad kan gyis ma nyams shing /rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go/sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zhing gab pa'o//
340a5(nyi khri): spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pas dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o//me tog ut+pal
340a6(nyi khri): dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha drog lhur 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o//tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping+ga lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs
340a7(nyi khri): so//'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o//me tog kun+da dang dung gi bcag 'phro
340b1(nyi khri): ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o//tshems la mtho dman med pas tshems mnyam pa'o//tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang
340b2(nyi khri): ba'o/bla 'og gyi gu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o//dkar gnag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma yog pas spyan dkar nag 'byes
340b3(nyi khri): pa'o//rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzer bas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o//de la bla ma la bsu bskyal dang chos mnyan pa la bstod pa dang /gtsug lag khang dang /
340b4(nyi khri): mchod rten la sogs pa la bsti stang du byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so//yi dam la brtan pas zhabs
340b5(nyi khri): shin tu gnas pa ste/de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so//sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pa dang /don spyod pa dang /don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas
340b6(nyi khri): pas/phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa ste/de ni myur du 'du ba'i sde ltas so//bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas/phyag dang zhabs
340b7(nyi khri): gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/de gnyis ni bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba 'thob pa'i snga ltas so//bcings pa bkrol
341a1(nyi khri): ba dang srog gi rim gro byas pa dang /srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang /rting pa yangs pa dang /sku che zhing drang ba ste/de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so//
341a2(nyi khri): dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang /bzung ba mngon par sprul cing 'grib par ma byas pas/zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang /yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/de ni mnyam pa'i
341a3(nyi khri): ches dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so//rig pa dang bzo'i gnas rim gror byas shing /gzhon byin pa dang /bdag gis blangs pas ri dgas e NA ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/de ni myur du
341a4(nyi khri): 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so//bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na mi 'god par gtong zhing /med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang dul
341a5(nyi khri): ba'i snga ltas so//'grogs pa dang mdza' bshes dang /gnyen pa ma phye ba dang /bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang /
341a6(nyi khri): gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so//stan dang gos dang khong pa dang gzhal med khang dang /gnas
341a7(nyi khri): bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/de gnyis ni gdan dang /na bza' dang /khang pa dang /gzhal med khang dang /gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i snga
341b1(nyi khri): lhas so//'du 'dzi spangs pa dang /mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /pha ma dang /phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas pA dang /btsun par byas pa dang /btsal/
341b2(nyi khri): brna la ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so//mi snyan par mi zer zhing mi smod la/
341b3(nyi khri): snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas/seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang /phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so//na ba rnams
341b4(nyi khri): la rtsi dang rime gro dang sman pa dang /nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang /rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang /ro bro ba'i mchog ste/de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so//
341b5(nyi khri): skyed mos tshal dang /'khor dang /btung ba dang rdzing bu dang /rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang /kha zas dang /phreng ba'i gnas dang /stegs dang /gtsug lag khang bya ba la
341b6(nyi khri): sogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing /bdag gis gzhan la byin pas/shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng grub pa dang /dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/de ni mnga' chen po
341b7(nyi khri): mnga' ba'i snga ltas so//yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang /nyams su bde bar smras pas/ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang /tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/de gnyis ni
342a1(nyi khri): yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so//gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing /rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang /
342a2(nyi khri): mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang /zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang /gtang mi phra zhing rnar snyan pa dang /ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o//yun ring po nas tshig kyal
342a3(nyi khri): ba spangs shing /dus su smra smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so//rim gror bya ba dang /brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba
342a4(nyi khri): yongs su dag pas/tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so//yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig sla smra bas/tshems
342a5(nyi khri): thags bzang ba dang /tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu chang ba ste/de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so//pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la ma chags mi sdang
342a6(nyi khri): ba dang /rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so//rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
342a7(nyi khri): pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par
342b1(nyi khri): 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'o/
342b2(nyi khri): thugs mnga' ba ste/sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/sen mo mtho ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
342b3(nyi khri): ni tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ste/sor mo zlum pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/sor mo rgyas pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
342b4(nyi khri): ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ser mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang gsung dang /sku'i phrin las dang /'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/
342b5(nyi khri): rtsa mi mngon pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol ba ste/rtsal mdud pa med pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben
342b6(nyi khri): pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/long bu mi mngon pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom
342b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge ste/seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas
343a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu
343a2(nyi khri): mchog ste/khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas
343a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/mdzes par bzhud pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/mi yo bar bzhud pa
343a4(nyi khri): yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/sku shin tu legs pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos
343a5(nyi khri): rnams shin tu sbyangs pa ste/sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
343a6(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni sku dang /gsung dang /thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa
343a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa ste/sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin//
343b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston
343b2(nyi khri): ba ste/sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/sku legs par mnyam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom
343b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/sku zhum pa
343b4(nyi khri): med pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu
343b5(nyi khri): bcom zhing zad pa ste/sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/yan lag dang nying lag
343b6(nyi khri): sba bar mdzes pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu dag pa ste/snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
343b7(nyi khri): tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/phyal zlum pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/phyal shin tu 'phyang ba dang
344a1(nyi khri): ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi be'u bcom pa ste/phyal ma zhom pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa
344a2(nyi khri): rnam par bzlog pa ste/phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/lte ba zab pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom
344a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge
344a4(nyi khri): 'dun mnga' ba ste/kun nas mdzes pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/kun tu spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/sangs rgyas
344a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' bste/sku la sme ba med pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar
344a6(nyi khri): rab tu yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phul la byams pas
344a7(nyi khri): dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/phyag gi ri mo zab po yin//
344b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha
344b2(nyi khri): ba ste/zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten du bkye ba ste/zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom
344b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ljags shin
344b4(nyi khri): tu srab pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ljags shin tu dmar ba yin//
344b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang /'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/glang po'i nga ro dang /'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom
344b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang /nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
344b7(nyi khri): rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan
345a1(nyi khri): pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
345a2(nyi khri): ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/tshems
345a3(nyi khri): mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/sangs
345a4(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du
345a5(nyi khri): yangs pa mnga' ba ste/spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/spyan rnam par dag pa yin/sangs
345a6(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/rdzi ma stug pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu
345a7(nyi khri): dang /na chung mchog gi mig dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma
345b1(nyi khri): ltar 'dug pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul/
345b2(nyi khri): bal mkhas pa ste/smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas
345b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis/sems can snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/smin ma sdum pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
345b4(nyi khri): ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/snyan legs shing snyan shal rang ba yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par
345b5(nyi khri): rgyal ba ste/snyan mnyam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs
345b6(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/zhal dpral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi
345b7(nyi khri): rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/zhal dpral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin//
346a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
346a2(nyi khri): mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/dbu stug pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs
346a3(nyi khri): su chud pa ste/dbu 'jam pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/dbu ma 'dzings pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
346a4(nyi khri): 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/dbu mi rtsub pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo
346a5(nyi khri): mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/dbu dri zhim pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang /bkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin//
346a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o//rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag
346a7(nyi khri): gzhan la bshad pa dang bstan pa dang /yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
346b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang /rmad du
346b2(nyi khri): byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
346b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin po drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
346b4(nyi khri): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems
346b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med
346b6(nyi khri): de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
346b7(nyi khri): po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud
347a1(nyi khri): do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/rab 'byor da ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
347a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/
347a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar pha rol
347a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i don mthun pas sems can rnams
347a5(nyi khri): sdud do//rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
347a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad 'doms shing 'di skad ston to//rigs kyi bu
347a7(nyi khri): khyod chur gshegs/yi ge mngon par bsgrub po la mangs par gyis shig/yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la
347b1(nyi khri): mkhas par gyis shig/yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/yi ge bzhi
347b2(nyi khri): bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi
347b3(nyi khri): ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces chos ston to//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang yi go gcig la mkhas pa yin/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar
347b4(nyi khri): la mkhas pa yin/yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la
347b5(nyi khri): mkhas pa yin te/de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa mkhas par bya ba la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/dper na
347b6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang /yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/chos la mkhas pa dang /yi ge la mkhas pas
347b7(nyi khri): yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang /rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba'ang ma yin te/rab 'byor du'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
348a1(nyi khri): rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang mad du byung ba chos te/gang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/
348a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/sems
348a3(nyi khri): can yang shin tu mi dmigs/chos kyang mi dmigs/chos kyi dngos po 'ang mi dmigs pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
348a4(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims
348a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod
348a6(nyi khri): pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge
348a7(nyi khri): 'dzin la spyod pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi
348b1(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu
348b2(nyi khri): rtswa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing /rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/de la ni
348b3(nyi khri): sems can mi dmigs te/sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so//sems can mi dmigs pas/gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas
348b4(nyi khri): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du
348b5(nyi khri): dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can mi dmigs pas/mi chen po'i mtshan
348b6(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su ma mchis so//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so//sems can dmigs su ma mchis pa la ni sems can ma mchis so//gzugs
348b7(nyi khri): ma mchis so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'ang byed dang /rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis so//rnam pa thams
349a1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so//mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom
349a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/byang chub kyi
349a3(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos rnams la dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin
349a4(nyi khri): no/rab 'byor de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//phyi stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//dngos po med pa'i
349a5(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o//phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rten cing
349a6(nyi khri): 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//
349a7(nyi khri): srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang skyes bu dang /gang zag dang shed can dang shad bdag dang byed pa po dang byed du 'jug pa po dang /slong ba po dang kun nas slong pa po dang /tshor ba
349b1(nyi khri): po dang tshor bar byed pa po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid du reg par bya'o//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul
349b2(nyi khri): gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam
349b3(nyi khri): btan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang /
349b4(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /
349b5(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi
349b6(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid
349b7(nyi khri): du rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//rab
350a1(nyi khri): 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/phyin ci
350a2(nyi khri): log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ji ltar stong pa nyid de dag la'ang mi 'jug po de ltar ston to//des de ltar mthong nas chos thams cad sgrib pa med par
350a3(nyi khri): shes te/chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed/gnyis su mi byed do//yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du'ang ston par byed do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs
350a4(nyi khri): pa'i sprul pa ni/sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /la la bzod pa'i pha
350a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/la la
350a6(nyi khri): bsam gton bzhi dang la la tshad med pa bzhi dpal la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sbyor/la la
350a7(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /la la rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /la la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /la la stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
350b1(nyi khri): dang /smon pa med pa dang /la la mngon par shes pa lha la sbyor/la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
350b2(nyi khri): bcu dang /la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /la la byams pa chen po dang /la la snying rje chen po dang /la la sangs rgyas kyi chos mi
350b3(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/la la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /la la dgra bcom
350b4(nyi khri): panyid dang /la la rang byang chub la sbyor/la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la sbyor na/rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du
350b5(nyi khri): phye ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni me lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
350b6(nyi khri): chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams la chos ston te/de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ma bcings ma grol
350b7(nyi khri): ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /
351a1(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin
351a2(nyi khri): pa de gzugs ma yin no//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams
351a3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par
351a4(nyi khri): dag pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
351a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs
351a6(nyi khri): so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
351a7(nyi khri): dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i
351b1(nyi khri): tshul gyis gnas te/'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ni gang yang gnas pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid
351b2(nyi khri): mi dmigs te/dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so//rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so//gzhon gyi dngos po la gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so//de ci'i phyir zhe na//
351b3(nyi khri): de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la'ang mi gnas so//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
351b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang
351b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
351b6(nyi khri): nyan thos rnams dang /'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
351b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de dag dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid de'i rjes su rtogs te/chos nyid de'i rjes su rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la
352a1(nyi khri): chos ston te/de'ang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do//de bzhin nyid dang yang dag par
352a2(nyi khri): mtha' ni 'da' ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di
352a3(nyi khri): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis/de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis na ci lags//
352a4(nyi khri): 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
352a5(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
352a6(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
352a7(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//gzugs kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin no//tshor
352b1(nyi khri): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//rnam pa
352b2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan
352b3(nyi khri): 'das gal te de ltar gzugs kyang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
352b4(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
352b5(nyi khri): yang gzhan la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma lags na/'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod cing
352b6(nyi khri): nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar
352b7(nyi khri): po ni lha dang mi dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams su myong ba/mi gnag cing dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi
353a1(nyi khri): gnag cing dkar ba ni/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang
353a2(nyi khri): byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi
353a3(nyi khri): bden pa tshad mar byas te/'bras bu rnam par dgod par bstan gyi don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos de ni
353a4(nyi khri): rnam par rtag tu med pa/brjod du med pa tha snyad med pa ste/'di ltar ming bden pa dang /gzugs bden pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas
353a5(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ste/'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do//gsol pa/bcom ldan
353a6(nyi khri): 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags kyi/don dam pa'i bden par ma lags na/byis pa so so'i skye bo de thams cad
353a7(nyi khri): kyang /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med
353b1(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/don dam pa'i bden
353b2(nyi khri): pa shes sam/gal te shes na ni de dag kyang /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/
353b3(nyi khri): rang byang chub bam/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyur na/rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la/lam yang med/lam rnam
353b4(nyi khri): par dgod pa'ang med/lam bsgom pa'ang med par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod po lta ga las 'od rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam
353b5(nyi khri): yang yod/lam bsgom pa'ang yod pas na/de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags//
353b6(nyi khri): lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/'bras bu thob par bgyi ba mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/lam bsgoms
353b7(nyi khri): pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/'bras bu thob par bya ba med do//rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa med de/lam gyis 'bras bu thob par bya ba'ang med
354a1(nyi khri): /do/lam la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thab par mi 'gyur te rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab tu pha rol tu
354a2(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa byed de/'dus byas kyi khams sam/'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad
354a3(nyi khri): cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod par mi byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras
354a4(nyi khri): bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /
354a5(nyi khri): gnod sems bsrabs pas/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//'og mo'i cha can gyis kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bla ma'i cha can gyis
354a6(nyi khri): kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do//gang ci'ang rung ste/kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo//bag
354a7(nyi khri): tshigs kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/bcom ldan 'das ris su btsong cing 'dus byas sas/
354b1(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa ma mchis na/gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
354b2(nyi khri): 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/bla na med pa yang
354b3(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o//bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma
354b4(nyi khri): bgyis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
354b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta
354b6(nyi khri): ste/mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/de'i tshe 'dus byas zhes sam/'dus ma byas zhes chos gang la'ang ris su gcod pa yod dam/gsol pa/
354b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
355a1(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bzung ste/sems can rnams la ris su bcad pas
355a2(nyi khri): chos mi ston to//de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
355a3(nyi khri): 'am/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan dang po 'am/bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/
355a4(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/byams pa 'am snying rje'am dga' ba 'am btang snyoms sam/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/rnam shes mtha'
355a5(nyi khri): yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
355a6(nyi khri): 'am/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub
355a7(nyi khri): kyi yan lag rnams sam/lam mam/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
355b1(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'am/mngon
355b2(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams sam/ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par
355b3(nyi khri): rig pa rnams sam/byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/chos gang la'ang
355b4(nyi khri): mngon par zhen pa med do//de mngon par zhen pa med pas gang la'ang chags pa med do//'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang /sbyin pa'i
355b5(nyi khri): 'bras bu la chags pa med/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
355b6(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
355b7(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang
356a1(nyi khri): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/gzhan du na sems can
356a2(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don du 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom mo//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang pha
356a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug dang /chos thams cad la spyod de/chos gang la'ang gnas pa 'am/chags pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan
356a4(nyi khri): nyid shin tu khong du chud do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mngon par sgrub pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u
356a5(nyi khri): skye drug cu gnyis pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
356a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang /
356a7(nyi khri): zhe sdang dang /gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do//bag la nyal ba dang kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do//phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//
356b1(nyi khri): zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//gzugs la yongs su spyod
356b2(nyi khri): pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa
356b3(nyi khri): med do//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yongs su spyod pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
356b4(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
356b5(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
356b6(nyi khri): la yongs su spyod pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po
356b7(nyi khri): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su spyod pa med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
357a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnams kyi
357a2(nyi khri): mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po drug cu dgu pa//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sprul
357a3(nyi khri): pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang /kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na'ang mi gda' na lam bsgom du ci mchis//
357a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur
357a5(nyi khri): ba 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/
357a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/'gro ba
357a7(nyi khri): lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
357b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/tshor ba dang /'du
357b2(nyi khri): shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o//tsher
357b3(nyi khri): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/tshor ba dang 'du
357b4(nyi khri): shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa la ni gzugs ma mchis/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par
357b5(nyi khri): shes pa ma mtshos/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/rnam par byung ba ma mchis pa gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ji ltar byang chub sems
357b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub
357b7(nyi khri): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/lha 'am/mi dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i
358a1(nyi khri): sems can gang yang dmigs sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de
358a2(nyi khri): de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar
358a3(nyi khri): des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so//mthong ngo rtogs so//sprul pa lta bur shes so mthong ngo rtogs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub
358a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/rtogs la/sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste/rtogs pa lags na/gang gi
358a5(nyi khri): don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
358a6(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa lags//
358a7(nyi khri): de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang /sems can
358b1(nyi khri): rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis/chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni///
358b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang
358b3(nyi khri): gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi shes pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do//sems can rnams//
358b4(nyi khri): yongs su smin par byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/sgra brnyan lta
358b5(nyi khri): bu smig rgyu lta bu/mig yor lta bu/sgyu ma lta bu/sprul pa lta bu legs na/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
358b6(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa la spyod tsong /sems can rnams gyen du skrod par bgyod/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'bor sems can rnams no mang
358b7(nyi khri): dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas pas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /de dag
359a1(nyi khri): ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du spyod do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ni gang lags/mtshan ma ni gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
359a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ming zhes bya ba 'am/mtshan ma zhes bya ba ni glo bur gyi ming gis sgro btags so//'di lta ste ming zhes bya ba 'am/mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/gzugs zhes bya ba
359a3(nyi khri): 'am/tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/'du byed ces bya ba 'am/rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/bud med ces bya ba 'am/skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/khye'u
359a4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/sems can dmyal ba pa zhes bya ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas pa zhes bya ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba'am/lho zhes
359a5(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/mi zhes bya ba 'am/'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba 'am/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
359a6(nyi khri): 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya
359a7(nyi khri): ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/rab 'byor ming thams cad ni ming gi don gyis btags pa ste/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i 'dus byas
359b1(nyi khri): thams cad ni ming tsam ste/de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas/ming thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa
359b2(nyi khri): las byung ba yin gyis/yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen
359b3(nyi khri): par mi byed do zhes skul ba byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can
359b4(nyi khri): rnams la chos ston pa yin no//rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/gnyis po 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ste/gnyis gang zhe
359b5(nyi khri): na/'di lta ste/gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang /gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o//rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i
359b6(nyi khri): gzugs rags pa 'am/phra ba 'am bzang ba 'am ngan pa 'am/rgyang ring ba 'am/thag nye ba grang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas bzung ba ste/'di ni gzugs
359b7(nyi khri): kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/gzugs med pa'i chos gang la'ang rung ste/mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags ni
360a1(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/'di ni gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o//de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
360a2(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing /mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o//'don
360a3(nyi khri): mtshan mo med pa'o zhes bya ba gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/rab 'byor de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
360a4(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol zhing /mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do//gsol pa/gal te chos 'di
360a5(nyi khri): dag thams cad ni de tsam du bas te/ming dang mtshan mar bas la btags pa tsam dungs te/yongs su btags pa las byung ba lags na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang
360a6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob la/gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyod
360a7(nyi khri): par 'thob pa la gzhog cing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis so nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/bcom
360b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
360b2(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i tshe/khyad par 'thob par yang mi 'gyur te/gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma'ang med/dngos po'ang med pas na//
360b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
360b4(nyi khri): su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha
360b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
360b6(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /
360b7(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /
361a1(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan
361a2(nyi khri): ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
361a3(nyi khri): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs
361a4(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
361a5(nyi khri): dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par
361a6(nyi khri): byas nas/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyis khyon cig mtshan ma
361a7(nyi khri): yod na'ang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos mtshan ma med pa/dran pa med pa/yid la byed pa med pa de
361b1(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos
361b2(nyi khri): thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/dran pa med pa yid la bya ba med pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
361b3(nyi khri): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing /dran pa ma mchis
361b4(nyi khri): te/yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so//'di dgra ni mi dge ba'i chos so//'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so//'di dag ni 'jig
361b5(nyi khri): rten las 'das pa'i chos so//'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so//'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so//'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so//'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos
361b6(nyi khri): so//'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so//'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so//'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so//'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so//'di dag ni byang chub
361b7(nyi khri): sems dpa'i chos so//'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/mtshan ma med pa'ang
362a1(nyi khri): gzhan la nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam
362a2(nyi khri): du sems/mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/mtshan
362a3(nyi khri): ma med pa'ang gzhan la/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
362a4(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//dgra bcom pa nyid do//rang byang chub bo//byang chub
362a5(nyi khri): sems dpa'i chos so//sangs rgyas kyi chos so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
362a6(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub
362a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid///
362b1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags
362b2(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad
362b3(nyi khri): dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
362b4(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po
362b5(nyi khri): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'
362b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par
362b7(nyi khri): thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o//mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan
363a1(nyi khri): ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o//mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag la slob par
363a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
363a3(nyi khri): yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa yin/nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/dran
363a4(nyi khri): pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
363a5(nyi khri): dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
363a6(nyi khri): par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /
363a7(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
363b1(nyi khri): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
363b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar la slob pa yin/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
363b3(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
363b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs rab tu shes te/gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang /gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin par rab tu shes so//
363b5(nyi khri): de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste dper na/lbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin tu gsong ldong dang /shin tu gas tshags dang /shin tu snying po med par rab tu
363b6(nyi khri): shes te/de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no//ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang /'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas//
363b7(nyi khri): gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song ba der shes pa ste/de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar
364a1(nyi khri): na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/mi 'gag 'ong ba med/'gro ba med/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par
364a2(nyi khri): byang ba ma yin/'bri ba ma yin/'phel ba ma yin te/phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin
364a3(nyi khri): nyid shes pa yin no//ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste dper na/chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin
364a4(nyi khri): no/ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang /'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/gang nas kyang mi 'ong /gang du'ang mi 'gro ba
364a5(nyi khri): ste/gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin
364a6(nyi khri): zhe na/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/mi 'gag/'ong ba med/'gro ba med/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin/'bri ba ma yin/'phel ba
364a7(nyi khri): ma yin te/phyin ci log ma yin zhing /de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//ji ltar na
364b1(nyi khri): 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste dper na/smig rgyu la chu shin tu myi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skyo ba dang 'jog pa shes
364b2(nyi khri): pa yin zhe na/'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar
364b3(nyi khri): shes pa ste/de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/'ong ba
364b4(nyi khri): med/'gro ba med/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin/'bri ba ma yin/'phel ba ma yin te/de phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/de'i
364b5(nyi khri): phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste/dper na/chu shing gi shun pa so sor
364b6(nyi khri): phye na/snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/'du byed ni gang nas
364b7(nyi khri): kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/gang gang nas kyang mi 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/de ltar na
365a1(nyi khri): 'du byed kyi skye ba dang /'jig pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/mi 'gag/
365a2(nyi khri): 'ong ba med/'gro ba med/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin/'bri ba ma yin/'phel ba ma yin te/phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas
365a3(nyi khri): pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma
365a4(nyi khri): byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes
365a5(nyi khri): po yin zhe na/rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/gang nas kyang mi 'ong /gang du'ang mi 'gro/gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang
365a6(nyi khri): ma song bar shes pa ste/de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no//ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/rnam par shes pa'i de
365a7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag pa 'ong ba med/'gro ba med/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam par byang ba ma yin/'bri ba ma yin/'phel ba ma yin/phyin ci log
365b1(nyi khri): ma yin zhing /de bzhin du gnas pa ste/de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o//de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/nang/
365b2(nyi khri): gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong /phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no//ji ltar na khams rnams
365b3(nyi khri): shes pa yin zhe na/mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mig gi rnam par
365b4(nyi khri): shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
365b5(nyi khri): chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes
365b6(nyi khri): te/de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no//ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang /de bzhin
365b7(nyi khri): du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang /chad pa med pa dang /rtag pa med pa dang /don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /'ong ba med pa
366a1(nyi khri): dang /'gro ba med pa dang /spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar na/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no//ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
366a2(nyi khri): shes pa yin zhe na/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang /'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin
366a3(nyi khri): te/ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/sdug bsngal shes pa yin/bden pa shes pa yin/'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/gnyis las
366a4(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no//de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang /'grog pa dang /'gog
366a5(nyi khri): par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no//ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin
366a6(nyi khri): zhe na/sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin/de
366a7(nyi khri): ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
366b1(nyi khri): sa gal tod kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'am/na rgyun pa dang pa'i rdzas dadag lta 'tshal na/das chos kyang dkyis rnam par dkrugs par/
366b2(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings sum gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni/rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te/rab 'byor
366b3(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so//gal te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de
366b4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa 'am/byang chub sems dpa' 'am/rang sangs rgyas sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma dmigs
366b5(nyi khri): so/de ltar ma dmigs pas chos kyis dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar brtags pa med do//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
366b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la
366b7(nyi khri): slob pas gang la bslab por 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni tshos
367a1(nyi khri): thams cad la bslab par 'gyur te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kya dbyangs so//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chas
367a2(nyi khri): thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /ma byung yang rung ste/dbyer
367a3(nyi khri): med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'di lta ste/dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang /'jig rten pa dang /
367a4(nyi khri): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang /'dus byas dang
367a5(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/chos kyi dbyings la slob
367a6(nyi khri): pas chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
367a7(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la bslab
367b1(nyi khri): par bgyi/ji ltar skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol
367b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
367b3(nyi khri): bgyi/ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi//
367b4(nyi khri): ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
367b5(nyi khri): la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar
367b6(nyi khri): pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa drug dang /ting nge 'dzin
367b7(nyi khri): thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
368a1(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dgu' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/
368a2(nyi khri): ji ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rgyal rigs tshe gong mtho dA'i rigs su
368a3(nyi khri): skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar rgyal chen
368a4(nyi khri): bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /
368a5(nyi khri): tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang tshad med snang ba dang kun snang dang ba dang dge ba dang chung dge dang tshad med dge ba
368a6(nyi khri): dang dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi bre la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba'i
368a7(nyi khri): slad du bslab par bgyi/ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam
368b1(nyi khri): shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ji
368b2(nyi khri): ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang drug pa dang bdun pa dang brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang /sems
368b3(nyi khri): bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa dang /sems can
368b4(nyi khri): yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs shing /chos thams cad rnam pa thams
368b5(nyi khri): cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
368b6(nyi khri): pas/gzugs la bslab par bgyi/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par
368b7(nyi khri): 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
369a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/dngos
369a2(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la bslab par bgyi/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam
369a3(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
369a4(nyi khri): pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par
369a5(nyi khri): bgyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /
369a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par
369a7(nyi khri): bgyi/dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bslab par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/byang
369b1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'am/mi spro ba smos par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags grang /bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/chos kyi dbyings la ni
369b2(nyi khri): rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/gzugs las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos
369b3(nyi khri): kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
369b4(nyi khri): te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang chos
369b5(nyi khri): kyi dbyings ma lags/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las gud na'ang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//chos kyi dbyings
369b6(nyi khri): nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang chos kyi dbyings ma
