462b3(nyi khri): te ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/
462b4(nyi khri): zag pa med pa 'am/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos gang la rmi lam dang 'dra ba ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten
462b5(nyi khri): las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang rmi lam lta bu ma lags pa de lta bu ma mchis so//
462b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ci rmi lam la rgyud lnga'i 'khor ba yod ngamau/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
462b7(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rmi lam la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam
463a1(nyi khri): bsgom pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das drin dngos po ma mchis pa ste/brjod pa dang /sgra dang /tshig dang //
463a2(nyi khri): yi ge thams cad kyis gdags su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/me long la gzugs brnyan snang ba de la gang
463a3(nyi khri): las mngon par 'du byed cing mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba
463a4(nyi khri): 'am/mi dang lhar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ni gzhan du na byis pa rnams la slu ba
463a5(nyi khri): ma gtogs par dngos por ma mchis pa ste/gzugs brnyan nyid kyang ma mchis na/gang mngon par 'du bgyid cing mngon par 'du bgyis pas/sems can dmyal bar
463a6(nyi khri): mchi ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/mi dang lhar 'gyur ba'i sug lngas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so//bcom
463a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de la lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur
463b1(nyi khri): ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das gzugs brnyan nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/lam bsgoms pas kun
463b2(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
463b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/nags stug po dang /ri dang /gcong rong dang /lung pa nas sgra brnyan byung na/sgra brnyan de la mngon par 'du byed cing mngon par 'du byas pas sems
463b4(nyi khri): can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/lha dang /mir 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/gsol pa
463b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan de nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis na/de la gang sug las mngon par 'du bgyid cing /mngon par 'du bgyis na
463b6(nyi khri): sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/lha dang mir skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba
463b7(nyi khri): 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun
464a1(nyi khri): 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /
464a2(nyi khri): dge rgyus dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi
464a3(nyi khri): lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
464a4(nyi khri): mched kyi lhar skye ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sgra brnyan gyi lam gang la bsgoms
464a5(nyi khri): pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
464a6(nyi khri): te/bcom ldan 'das sgra brnyan nyid kyang shin tu ma mchis pa lags na/lam gang sgom pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur
464a7(nyi khri): ba'i lam sgom pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/smig rgyu la chu mod par chu'i 'du shes
464b1(nyi khri): su gyur pa dang /klung med par chu klung gi 'du shes su gyur pa dang /grong khyer med par grong khyer gyi 'du shes su gyur pa dang /skyed mos tshal med par skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes su
464b2(nyi khri): gyur pa de la/'du shes kyi lam gang mngon par 'du byas pas/sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/byol song gi skyo gnas sam/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am
464b3(nyi khri): mi skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'om/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs
464b4(nyi khri): ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /
464b5(nyi khri): tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /
464b6(nyi khri): 'og min gyi lhang skye ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
464b7(nyi khri): mched kyi lhar skye bo de lta bu yod dme/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das smig rgyu la 'du shes phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /mig gis log par mthong ba ma gtogs par chu klung dang /
465a1(nyi khri): grong khyer dang /skyed mos tshal shin tu ma mchis na/sug las gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas sems can dmyal bar mchi ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas
465a2(nyi khri): samaTagashin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/mir skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsumo dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /
465a3(nyi khri): 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang //
465a4(nyi khri): tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che
465a5(nyi khri): ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes
465a6(nyi khri): mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te ma mchis so///
465a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'ongs kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/phyin ci log gi 'du shes de la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi
465b1(nyi khri): 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log gi 'du shes de
465b2(nyi khri): nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa lags na/lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i lamo bsgoms pa lta smos kyang ci
465b3(nyi khri): 'tshal te ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma sna tshogs/glang po'i tshogs sam/rta'i tshogs
465b4(nyi khri): sam/glang gi tshogs sam/dpung bu chung gi tshogs sam/bud med kyi gzugs sam/skyes pa'i gzugs mngon par sprul na/sgyu ma de dag la gang mngon par 'du byas
465b5(nyi khri): pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su 'gro ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/mir skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar
465b6(nyi khri): skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa
465b7(nyi khri): kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge
466a1(nyi khri): rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og
466a2(nyi khri): min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min
466a3(nyi khri): skye mched kyi lhar skye ba de lta bu'i dngos po yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mo lags te/sgyu ma de gang la gnas te/sug las de gang mngon par 'du bgyid
466a4(nyi khri): pa dang /sug los gang mngon par 'du bgyis pas/sems can dmyal ba 'am/byol song gi skye gnas su mchi ba 'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba 'am/
466a5(nyi khri): mi skye ba 'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /ma tshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /
466a6(nyi khri): tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge
466a7(nyi khri): dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya
466b1(nyi khri): nonam snang ba dang /'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med
466b2(nyi khri): 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba ni/skra'i rtse mo'i cha shos gzhag pa tsam yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du
466b3(nyi khri): sems/sgyu ma la gang lam bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom pa gang yang yod dam/gsol pa/
466b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis pa'i chos la nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/bcom ldan 'das
466b5(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa mdzad na/sprul pa de la las gang mngon par 'du byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro
466b6(nyi khri): ba'am/byol song gi skye gnos su 'gro ba'am/gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/mir skye ba'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skyo ba 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe
466b7(nyi khri): ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba
467a1(nyi khri): dang /rung // dang /chad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dag pa dang /rlung dag dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dag rgyus dang /chob dang /rlu
467a2(nyi khri): dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /bla nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lhar skye ba 'am/nam mkha' mtha'
467a3(nyi khri): yis skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mchod dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
467a4(nyi khri): dngos po yong dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa de la dngos po ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
467a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sprul pa de la lam gang bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur la/rnam par byung bar yang mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam bsgom
467a6(nyi khri): pa yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de la gang la la zhig kun nas
467a7(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar yang 'gyur ba yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
467b1(nyi khri): 'byor de de bzhin te/ji ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba gang yang med pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba yang med do//de ci'i phyir
467b2(nyi khri): zhe na/bdag dang bdag gir bya ba la gnas shing /sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/yang dag par mthong ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/
467b3(nyi khri): rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med do//ji ltar yang dag par mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par
467b4(nyi khri): byang ba med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/le'u drug cu dgu'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la
467b5(nyi khri): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa mthong ba la kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du yang dag
467b6(nyi khri): pa ma mthong ba la'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma mchis te/de ni chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid pas/bcom ldan 'das
467b7(nyi khri): dngos po ma mchis pa la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang bar ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba ma mchis te/
468a1(nyi khri): dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par byang bar gsungs pa de ji lta bu
468a2(nyi khri): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa du ni ngas rnam par byang bar gsungs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan
468a3(nyi khri): 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de/
468a4(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings nyid dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
468a5(nyi khri): byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/de bzhin du gnas pa'i chos kyi gnas nyid dang /dbyings 'di lta ste/chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni rab
468a6(nyi khri): 'byor rnam par byang ba ste/de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis brjod kyi de ni brjod du med cing smos su med pa ste/sgra dang tshig thams cad kyi lam las 'das pa'i chos so//gsol
468a7(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu sgra brnyan lta bu mig yor lta bu/smig rgyu lta bu/sgyu ma lta bu sprul pa lta bu lags na/ji ltar byang
468b1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /chos thams cad sprul
468b2(nyi khri): pa lta bu ste/dngos po ma mchis pa/rdzas ma mchis pa la bdag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i
468b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
468b4(nyi khri): pa dang /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
468b5(nyi khri): par bya'o//phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yongs su
468b6(nyi khri): rdzogs par bya'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam
468b7(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
469a1(nyi khri): bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon
469a2(nyi khri): par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgro thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
469a3(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//mi chen po'i mtshan
469a4(nyi khri): sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//'od chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
469a5(nyi khri): khams kyi sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes par byas te/dbyangs gcig gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs
469a6(nyi khri): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//zhes bgyi bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam
469a7(nyi khri): du sems/gang khyod kyis brjod pa'i chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu ma
469b1(nyi khri): yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag rmi lam lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu dang /mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu lags//
469b2(nyi khri): na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das rmi lam ni yang dag pa ma lags/sgra brnyan dang /
469b3(nyi khri): mig yor dang /smig rgyu dang /sgyu ma dang /sprul pa ni yang dag pa ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa ma lags pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /tshul
469b4(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
469b5(nyi khri): pa la spyad pa dang /nang stong pa nyid la spyad pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags
469b6(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas
469b7(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad
470a1(nyi khri): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
470a2(nyi khri): bco brgyud la spyad pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
470a3(nyi khri): 'byor deng bzhin no//de de bzhin te/yang dag pa ma yin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
470a4(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /nad stong pa nyid la spyad pa
470a5(nyi khri): dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyad pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam
470a6(nyi khri): gtan dang /chad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid
470a7(nyi khri): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
470b1(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyad pas bla na med pa yang dag par

470b4(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

470b6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshod med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
470b7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par
471a1(nyi khri): gos pang du ldan pa nas rgyu rnam smran da 'du sunan sa su sa /

471a3(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgyu'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mu lags s+ho///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
471a4(nyi khri): shu ga/bam po bdun cu lta ba//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thon med pa yang dag
471a5(nyi khri): ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
471a6(nyi khri): sbyi bye dang /bos ma gtan gyi pha rol tu sbyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub d+d+ha mngon par rdzogs par 'chad mi rgyu'o//
471a7(nyi khri): nong stong pa nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag /
471b1(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//

472a1(nyi khri): thams cad kyang 'dus byas pa/mngon par 'dus byas pa ste/'dus byas pa dang /mngon par 'dus byas pa'i chos kyis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nga //

472a3(nyi khri): skye ba dang /mi 'byung ba gang yin pa ni mtshan nyid meng pa'ang de yin te/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/dge

472b2(nyi khri): snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/dge ba'i chos gang dang gang rtsom pa de thams cad sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/sbyin pa'i pha rol

474b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jug ste/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
475a1(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sems can gang sems can med pa la sems can gyi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /bdag med pa la bdag gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /srog med
475a2(nyi khri): pa la srog gi 'du shes su gnas pa dang /'gro ba med pa la 'gro ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang /gso ba med pa la gso ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa dang/skyes bu med pa la skyes

475b1(nyi khri): 'god do//de la bkod nas rgyu ba 'di dag yongs su mi rgyu ste/bdag gi 'du shes sam/sems can gyi 'du shes sam/srog gi 'du shes sam/'gro ba'i 'du shes sam/gso ba'i

475b4(nyi khri): shes sam/mthong ba po'i 'du shes yongs su mi rgyu ste/de g.yo ba dang /rlom sems dang /'bar ba dang spros pa 'di dag btang nas/spros pa med pa'i sems kyis nye bar bsgrubs
475b5(nyi khri): shing mang du spyod de/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bdag nyid kyang chos gang la'ang mngon par
475b6(nyi khri): zhen pa med la/sems can thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa med pa la rab tu 'god de/de ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi don dam par ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan
475b7(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos grang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas sam/ma lags kyi don dam par mngon
476a1(nyi khri): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas s+ho zhes bya ba na/
476a2(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du brjod pa ste/de la chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba de lta bu gang yang mi dmigs te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta
476a3(nyi khri): ste/chos 'dis chos 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa ste/gnyis kyis ni gang yang thob pa 'am/mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba
476a4(nyi khri): med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ste gnyis kyis thob pa dang /mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis na/gnyis su ma mchis pas thob pa dang /mngon par
476a5(nyi khri): rtogs par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnyis kyis kyang thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med de/gnyis su med pas kyang thob pa dang
476a6(nyi khri): mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba med de/gang la gnyis kyang med la mi gnyis pa'ang med pa ni thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'di ni
476a7(nyi khri): thob pa'o//'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba ni spros pa ste/chos mnyam pa nyid la spros pa med de/spros pa med pa ni chos mnyam pa nyid do//gsol pa/bcom
476b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das chos dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams la chos kyi mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'ang gang zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang dngos po med pa dang
476b2(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'ang ma yin pa dang /ngo bo nyid med pa dang yongs su brjod pa med pa 'di ni chos mnyam pa nyid de/chos mnyam pa nyid po de ni brjod du med pa'o//chos mnyam pa
476b3(nyi khri): nyid ma gtogs par yang dmigs par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med de/chos mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad las rnam par 'das pa'o//chos mnyam pa nyid ni byis pa
476b4(nyi khri): 'am/'phags pa 'am/chos gang gis kyang shes par mi rung zhing yul ma yin pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos mnyam pa nyid po de dag la de bzhin gshegs
476b5(nyi khri): pa'i yul yang ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos mnyam pa nyid ni 'phags pa thams cad kyi yul ma yin pa ste/rgyun tu zhugs pa
476b6(nyi khri): 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/dgra bcom pa'am/rang byang chub bam/byang chub sems dpa' 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ma yin no//
476b7(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur ba ma lags sam/bcom ldan
477a1(nyi khri): na du du na su du du chu du/dun dun nan ku na ma zu gas smra
477a2(nyi khri): kyang gzhan zhig yin na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi yul la mnga' sgyur bar yang 'gyur na/rab 'byor
477a3(nyi khri): so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa
477a4(nyi khri): rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid gcig pa
477a5(nyi khri): ste/mnyam pa nyid dang mi mnyam pa nyid la bye brag gang yang med do//de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa dang /'phags pa thams cad kyi mnyam
477a6(nyi khri): pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/mnyam pa nyid gcig pa ste/mnyam pa nyid gcig pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o//'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba
477a7(nyi khri): dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'o//'di ni de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
477b1(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar gnyis su bya ba med de/rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam
477b2(nyi khri): pa nyid la/'di ni so so'i skye bo'o//'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang byang
477b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa de dag mi dmigs na/des so so'i skye bo rnams
477b4(nyi khri): dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems
477b5(nyi khri): dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
477b6(nyi khri): sprul pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang
477b7(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
478a1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang /rgyun tu
478a2(nyi khri): zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'
478a3(nyi khri): rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon
478a4(nyi khri): mchog dang /chos dkon mchog dang dge 'dun dkon mchog dang /dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
478a5(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la chos
478a6(nyi khri): mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/sangs rgyas dkon
478a7(nyi khri): mchog kyang gzhan la chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te/dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la/chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags kyis/bcom ldan 'das
478b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de/chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'
478b2(nyi khri): ma lags mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/gzugs ma mchis pa baspyan du ma mchis pa thogs pa ma mchis pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o//de ltar na chos
478b3(nyi khri): rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye ba'o//'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'o//'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang
478b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par dgod par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo//bcom
478b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo de ni de
478b6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
478b7(nyi khri): par sangs rgyas la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/chos rnams rnam par bkod par ma mdzad na sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam/byol song gi skye gnas
479a1(nyi khri): dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /mi yod par mngon nam/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam/sum cu rtsa gsum dang mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang /
479a2(nyi khri): 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung snang dang /tshad
479a3(nyi khri): med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang /chung che dang /tshad med che ba dang /'bras bu che ba dang //
479a4(nyi khri): mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams yod par mngon nam/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam
479a5(nyi khri): shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod
479a6(nyi khri): par mngon nam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
479a7(nyi khri): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam/byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam/nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam/dngos po med pa'i
479b1(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod par mngon nam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
479b2(nyi khri): dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
479b3(nyi khri): pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge
479b4(nyi khri): 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po
479b5(nyi khri): dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad ni yod par mngon
479b6(nyi khri): nam/sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /chos dkon mchog dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /theg
479b7(nyi khri): pa chen po yod par mngon nam/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang brgyad par yod par mngon nam/rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
480a1(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
480a2(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
480a3(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor de lta bas na/de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//gsol
480a4(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba de bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/
480a5(nyi khri): de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /brkyad pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi
480a6(nyi khri): 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das
480a7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo'o//chos mnyam pa nyid las mi
480b1(nyi khri): 'da'o//rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
480b2(nyi khri): dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni
480b3(nyi khri): so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang
480b4(nyi khri): chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/de nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /brgyad pa dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa
480b5(nyi khri): rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
480b6(nyi khri): chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos
480b7(nyi khri): skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de/de de las rnam par mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag gi chos nyid dang //
481a1(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang //
481a2(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te/de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang med do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de
481a3(nyi khri): ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /brgyad pa dang /rgyun tu zhugs
481a4(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
481a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na/bcom
481a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste/gzugs dang tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /skye mched dang /khams
481a7(nyi khri): dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med
481b1(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
481b2(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
481b3(nyi khri): stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams
481b4(nyi khri): dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags
481b5(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
481b6(nyi khri): kyi bar dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs
481b7(nyi khri): kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po
482a1(nyi khri): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /'dus byas kyi khams dang /
482a2(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi khams te/bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba/gcig las gcig 'das pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
482a3(nyi khri): de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/skye mched
482a4(nyi khri): dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan/gti mug gi chos nyid
482a5(nyi khri): kyang gzhan/lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
482a6(nyi khri): pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsom gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/nang stong pa nyid kyi
482a7(nyi khri): chos nyid kyang gzhan/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/yang dag par
482b1(nyi khri): spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos
482b2(nyi khri): nyid kyang gzhan/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par
482b3(nyi khri): thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams
482b4(nyi khri): dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par
482b5(nyi khri): rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
482b6(nyi khri): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i chos nyid kyang gzhan/'dus byas kyi khams dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i
482b7(nyi khri): chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba legs/chos rnam par dgod par ni ji ltar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
483a1(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags/chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
483a2(nyi khri): pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sa nas sar
483a3(nyi khri): 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags/ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs
483a4(nyi khri): par bgyid pa lags/ji ltar mngon par shes pos rnam par rtse zhing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
483a5(nyi khri): pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
483a6(nyi khri): rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /de dag la rnam par rtse bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur
483a7(nyi khri): bgyid pa lags/de dag tu'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lags/dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
483b1(nyi khri): su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gang 'di skad du de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi
483b2(nyi khri): chos mnyam pa nyid de/de nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /brgyad pa rnams dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang /lan cig/
483b3(nyi khri): phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /de
483b4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na/mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar
483b5(nyi khri): gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du
483b6(nyi khri): byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid
483b7(nyi khri): ma yin nam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
484a1(nyi khri): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa
484a2(nyi khri): nyid ma yin nam/nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong
484a3(nyi khri): pa nyid ma yin nam/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams
484a4(nyi khri): dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
484a5(nyi khri): dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin
484a6(nyi khri): pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /snying rje chen po dang //
484a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma
484b1(nyi khri): yin nam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid
484b2(nyi khri): gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
484b3(nyi khri): dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni stong pa nyid do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
484b4(nyi khri): stsal pa/'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam/skye mched dang /khams dang /
484b5(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
484b6(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam/nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam/dngos
484b7(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid dam/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med
485a1(nyi khri): pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
485a2(nyi khri): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi
485a3(nyi khri): 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan
485a4(nyi khri): nyid dam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi
485a5(nyi khri): mtshan nyid dam/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'
485a6(nyi khri): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs sam/gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das
485a7(nyi khri): de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de lta bas ni rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig pa bya ste/chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin
485b1(nyi khri): pa de la'ang so so'i skye bo med/so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'ang med/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las bud na'ang de med/de la'ang//
485b2(nyi khri): chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba med/chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med/de la brgyad pa'ang med/brgyad pa las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang rgyun tu zhugs pa myed//
485b3(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang lan cig phyir 'ong ba med/lan cig phyir 'ong ba las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang phyir mi 'ong ba med/phyir mi 'ong ba
485b4(nyi khri): las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang dgra bcom pa med/dgra bcom pa las gud na'ang do med/de la'ang rang sangs rgyas med/rang sangs rgyas las gud na'ang de med//
485b5(nyi khri): de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' med/byang chub sems dpa' las gud na'ang de med/de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa med/de bzhin gshegs pa las gud na'ang de med par rig
485b6(nyi khri): par bya'o//gsol pa/chos nyid de 'dus bgyis pa lags sam/'dus ma bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ni 'dus byas kyang ma yin/'dus
485b7(nyi khri): ma byas kyang ma yin te/'dus byas las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas dmigs su med do//'dus ma byas las gud na'ang 'dus byas dmigs su med de/rab 'byor de ltar
486a1(nyi khri): 'dus byas kyi khams gang yin pa dang /'dus ma byas kyi khams gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma smin mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/gzugs
486a2(nyi khri): med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gitsug po ste/'di lta ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//de'ang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
486a3(nyi khri): du brjod kyi don dam par ma yin te/don dam pa la/lus kyi 'du byed dam/ngag gi 'du byed dam/yid kyi 'du byed med de/lus kyi 'du byed dam/ngag gi 'du byed
486a4(nyi khri): dam/yid kyi 'du byed las gud na'ang don dam par dmigs su med do//'on kyang 'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don
486a5(nyi khri): dam pa ste/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/byang chub sems
486a6(nyi khri): dpa'i spyod pa'ang byed ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/le'u bdun nu'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
486a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam po nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/de'i slad du chos gang la'ang gang
486b1(nyi khri): yang ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis na/de ltar chos thams cad ci'ang bgyid pa ma mchis shing /ci'ang ma lags pa la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
486b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la/sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang don bgyi ba dang don mthun pas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don
486b3(nyi khri): bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gang la'ang
486b4(nyi khri): ci'ang byed pa med ci'ang mi byed pa'ang med de/gal te sems can 'di dag bdag cag nyid kyis stong pa nyid shes na ni/de ltar stong pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/sems can
486b5(nyi khri): rnams kyang bdag gi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /bdag gi 'du shes dang phral nas stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel ba dang /sems can gyi 'du shes dang /srog gi/
486b6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /gso ba'i 'du shes dang /skyes bu'i 'du shes dang /gang zag gi 'du shes dang /shed can gyi 'du shes dang /shed bdag gi 'du shes dang /byed pa po'i
486b7(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /tshor ba po'i 'du shes dang /shes pa po'i 'du shes dang /mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /mthong ba po'i 'du shes dang phral nas stong
487a1(nyi khri): pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /gzugs kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba
487a2(nyi khri): las 'brel pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes dang phral
487a3(nyi khri): nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /rten cing 'brel
487a4(nyi khri): par 'byung ba'i 'du shes dang phral nas/stong pa nyid kyis 'khor ba las 'grel pa dang /'dus byas kyi khams kyi 'du shes dang bral bar byed cing /'dus byas kyi khams
487a5(nyi khri): kyi 'du shes dang phral nas/'dus ma byas kyi dbyings stong pa yin yang 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings su 'god pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthor mi 'gyur
487a6(nyi khri): ro/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de cis stong pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/rab 'byor la la
487a7(nyi khri): zhig gis sprul pa zhig sprul ni/de la gang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//
487b1(nyi khri): sprul pa de la gang stong pa nyid ma lags pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang ma mchis te/stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /sprul pa gang lags pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang //
487b2(nyi khri): legs/mi ldan pa'ang ma lags te/de gnyis ka'ang stong pa nyid kyis stong na/de ci'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid do//'di ni sprul pa'o zhes bgyi bar rnam par bcab pa
487b3(nyi khri): mdzad/de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di lta ste/stong pa nyid dang /sprul pa gnyis ka'ang stong pa nyid la dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
487b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa gang sprul pa ma yin pa de lta bu yod dam/gang sprul pa de ni stong pa'o//
487b5(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'jig rten pa'i chos sprul pa lags kyang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang
487b6(nyi khri): dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
487b7(nyi khri): dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
488a1(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
488a2(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /de dag gi 'bras bu gang gis gang zag
488a3(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
488a4(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes gang thog rnam par dgod pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lta bu lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
488a5(nyi khri): sprul pa ste/de la la la ni nyan thos kyis sprul pa'o//la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o//la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o//la la ni de bzhin gshegs
488a6(nyi khri): pas sprul pa'o//la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o//la la ni las kyis sprul pa'i//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad sprul pa'o//gsol pa/bcom
488a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das gang spangs pa zhes bgyi ba/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid
488b1(nyi khri): dam/rang sangs rgyas kyis 'am/sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa'i chos de dag kyang sprul pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das rgyas
488b2(nyi khri): bka' stsal ba/rab 'byor bskyed pa'am/'gag pa'i chos gang ci'ang rung ste/de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang ma sprul pa'i chos dgang
488b3(nyi khri): lpags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos gang la skye ba'ang med/ga pa'ang med pa de ni mal ba'o//glosol pa/di gang lags/bcom ldan 'a
488b4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das bya ste/chos de ni ma stsal pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/stong pa nyid las kyang min ma
488b5(nyi khri): la/gnyis su'ang mi dmigs te/chos glang yang stong pa nyid ma yin pa de lta bu med do zhes bka' stsalnga pa ltar na bcom ldan 'das mi minyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das byas
488b6(nyi khri): la bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/de dag ni nyan thos
488b7(nyi khri): kyis ma byas/rang sangs rgyas kyis ma byas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
489a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyis ma byas te/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i/
489a2(nyi khri): gang zag gis ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi na ji ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ci
489a3(nyi khri): sngon dngos po yod par 'gyur la/phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba yod dam/rab 'byor 'di la dngos po yod pa'ang med/dngos po med pa'ang med/ngo bo nyid
489a4(nyi khri): kyang med/gzhan gyi dngos po'ang med no/de la gang yongs su shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba lta yod par 'gyur re skan/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
489a5(nyi khri): stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/chos nyid mi 'gyur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig go///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga po//
489a6(nyi khri): bam po bdun cu drug pa//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
489a7(nyi khri): dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'tshal bso/gzugs la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/tshor ba dang /'du
489b1(nyi khri): shrIs dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/mig gi skye mchod dang /rna ba'i skye mchod dang /sna'i skye mchod dang /lho'i skye mched dang /lus kyi skye mched dang //
489b2(nyi khri): yid kyi skye mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/gzugs kyi skye mched dang /sgra'i skye mched dang /dri'i skye mched dang /ro'i skye mched dang /reg bya'i skye mched dang /chos kyi skye
489b3(nyi khri): mched la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i
489b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
489b5(nyi khri): khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes
489b6(nyi khri): pa'i khams la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched dang /rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i skye mched la ji ltar bslab
489b7(nyi khri): par bgyi/ma rig pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang /
490a1(nyi khri): len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang rga shi la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /
490a2(nyi khri): 'gog pa'i bden pa dang /lam gyi bden pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/gzugs dang chos la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/gzugs med pa dang /snang ba dang bcas pa dang /snang ba
490a3(nyi khri): med pa dang thogs pa dang bcas pa dang /thogs pa med pa dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang /zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /
490a4(nyi khri): kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /bsten par bya ba dang /bsten par mi bya ba dang /bzang po dang ngan pa dang nang gi dang phyi'i dang mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /shes pa dang rnam par shes
490a5(nyi khri): pa dang /'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar gyi dang /dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung ston pa dang lung ma bstan pa dang /'dod par rtogs pa dang /gzugs su rtogs pa dang
490a6(nyi khri): gzugs med par gtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa dang /slob pa dang mi slob pa dang /slob pa'ang ma yin/mi slob pa'ang ma yin pa dang /'dod chags dang /khong khro ba
490a7(nyi khri): dang nga rgyal dang /ma rig pa dang /lta ba dang the tshom la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/sbyin pa dang /ser sna dang /tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ngan pa dang /bzod pa dang
490b1(nyi khri): gnod sems dang /brtson 'grus dang le lo dang bsam gtan dang /g.yeng ba dang shes rab dang /shes rab ngan pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/stong pa nyid dang rnam par rtogs pa dang
490b2(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang /mtshan ma dang smon pa med pa dang /log pa'i smon lam dang /mi dge ba'i chos dang /mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /bdag med pa la ji ltar
490b3(nyi khri): bslab par bgyi/nyon mongs pa dang nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang /byang chub dang /sangs
490b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa
490b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob par 'dod pas gzugs ming tsam du zad par
490b6(nyi khri): bslab par bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ming tsam du zad pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du ming tsam du zad par bslab par bya'o//
490b7(nyi khri): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe gzugs zhes bgyi bar ming du
491a1(nyi khri): brjod pa 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi bar ming du brjod pa 'di dngos po dang
491a2(nyi khri): bcas par dmigs pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du ming du brjod pa 'di dngos po dang bcas par dmigs te/'di ltar 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma de dang de dag la brten
491a3(nyi khri): nas dngos po dang bcas par dmigs na de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs ming tsam du bas par bslab par bgyi/tshor ba dang /'du shes
491a4(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ming tsam du bas pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du mid tsam du bas par bslab par bgyi/ming de ni dngos po ma mchis na//
491a5(nyi khri): gang 'di gzugs so zhes bgyi ba'i ming tsam po de'ang mi rigs so//gang 'di tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming
491a6(nyi khri): tsam po de'ang mi rigs pa nas/gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyi ming tsam po de'ang mi rigs/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
491a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la ming blo thabs su
491b1(nyi khri): btags pa'o//gang 'di tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming bla thabs su btags pa nas/gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i
491b2(nyi khri): bar du ming bla thabs su btags pa'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
491b3(nyi khri): gang gi slad du des 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po ming gi gzugs so zhes bya ba'i ming de la yid ches khong du chud so sor rig par 'gyur te/gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming des kyang
491b4(nyi khri): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la yid ches par khong du chud pa dang /so sor rig par 'gyur na de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gang 'di gzugs
491b5(nyi khri): so zhes ming bla thabs su btags par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
491b6(nyi khri): par shes pa zhes bgyi ba nas/bcom ldan 'das gang gis slad du 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar gyis yid ches pa dang khong du chud pa dang /
491b7(nyi khri): so sor rig par 'gyur/tshor ba zhes bgyi ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de dag dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar gyi ming de dag gis
492a1(nyi khri): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dag la yid ches pa dang khong du chud pa dang /so sor rig par 'gyur na/de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag
492a2(nyi khri): la gang 'di ni gzugs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'o zhes pa nas/gang 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du ming de dag
492a3(nyi khri): bla thabs su btags par 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris//
492a4(nyi khri): khyod nyid kyis ji ltar nus pa de ltar lan thob cig/byams pa de ji snyam du sems/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming de las
492a5(nyi khri): gzhi ma blangs ma brten mi gnas par 'du byed kyi mtshon ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la 'di ni gzugs so zhes bya bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lags
492a6(nyi khri): so//byams pa de ji snyam du sems/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes
492a7(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba de/byams pa de ji snyam du sems/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la/gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bor du ming du btags pa de
492b1(nyi khri): dag las gzhi ma blangs ma brten mi gnas par 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs
492b2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar du de ltar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//byams pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o//
492b3(nyi khri): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni med
492b4(nyi khri): thabs su btags pa'o//'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar du ming bla thabs su btags pa'o//byams pa de ji snyam
492b5(nyi khri): du sems/'du byed kyi mtshan mo'i dngos po de dang de dag la ming dang brda dang /tha snyad dang /gdagos pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nye bar spyod pa 'am/tha snyad du bya ba 'am
492b6(nyi khri): gdags pa 'am/mngon par zhen par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'gyur ro//byams pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis de 'di ltar rig par
492b7(nyi khri): bya'o//'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa
493a1(nyi khri): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba gang yin pa'i bar du de dag ni ming bla thabs su btags pa'o//ci 'di la 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dag nyid la
493a2(nyi khri): cig la 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de las gzhan pa dag gi 'du shes sam/gdags pa 'am/ming ngam tha snyad dam/mngon par zhen par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/
493a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'gyur ro//byams pa gzhung 'dis kyang khyod kyis de 'di ltar rig par bya'o//'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gzugs
493a4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam por shes pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar du de dag ni ming bla thabs su btags pa'o///
493a5(nyi khri): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de lta na/gang 'du byed kyi mtshan
493a6(nyi khri): ma'i dngos po gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ram/gang lo brten nas ming dang /'du shes dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad du 'gyur ba dang /gzugs
493a7(nyi khri): dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar du de dag dmigs pa nyid du
493b1(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ram/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la
493b2(nyi khri): ming dang /'du shes dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad du gzugs zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ji snyam du sems/ngo bo nyid dam/rang bzhin nam 'on te btags pa tsam du zad//
493b3(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas so//'o na byams pa khyod ji ltar 'di snyam du gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa nyid do snyam du sems so//byams pa 'du
493b4(nyi khri): byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la ming dang /'du shes dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi
493b5(nyi khri): ches zhes bya ba'i bar du gang yin pa de dag ji snyam du sems/ngo bo nyid dam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
493b6(nyi khri): bar du btags pa tsam du zad/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das btags pa tsam du bas so//'o na byams pa khyod ji ltar 'di snyam du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
493b7(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du dmigs pa nyid du sems/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
494a1(nyi khri): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ste/gzugs ming dang /'du shes dang /brda dang gdags pa dang /tha snyad tsam lags
494a2(nyi khri): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de ste tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du ming dang /'du shes dang /brda dang /
494a3(nyi khri): gdags pa dang /tha snyad tsam lags te/de ltar gyur na gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ram/de ltar gyur na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /
494a4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du ming dang /'du shes dang /brda dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad tsam zhes bgyi ba de'i ngo bo nyid dmigs pa nyid du mi
494a5(nyi khri): 'gyur ram/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa de ji snyam du sems//
494a6(nyi khri): gang gzugs zhes bya ba de ming dang /'du shes dang /brda dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad tsam mam/'on te de la skye ba 'am/'jig pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs
494a7(nyi khri): pa 'am/rnam par byang ba yod/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/'o na byams pa khyod ji ltar 'di snyam du gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid yod
494b1(nyi khri): par sems/byams pa de ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du gang yin pa de dag ming dang //
494b2(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /brda dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad tsam mam/'on te de la skye ba 'am/'jig pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba yod/gsol pa/
494b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//'o na byams pa khyod ji ltar 'di snyam du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar
494b4(nyi khri): du ngo bo nyid yod par sems/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci
494b5(nyi khri): lags/gzugs rnam pa thams cad dang /mtshan nyid thams cad du ma mchis pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /
494b6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad dang /mtshan nyid thams cad du ma mchis pa lags sam/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
494b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa nga ni gzugs rnam pa thams cad dang /mtshan nyid thams cad du med do zhes
495a1(nyi khri): mi smra'o//byams pa nga ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad dang /mtshan nyid
495a2(nyi khri): thams cad du med do zhes mi smra'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das/
495a3(nyi khri): gzugs ji lta bur mchis bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du ji lta bur mchis/de skad
495a4(nyi khri): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//byams pa gzugs ni 'jig rten gyi brda dang /tha snyad
495a5(nyi khri): du yod kyi don dam par yod pa ma yin no//byams pa tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi brda
495a6(nyi khri): dang /tha snyad du yod kyi don dam par yod pa ma yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
495a7(nyi khri): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/dbyings 'di ni don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa'o//
495b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ste don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings lags na bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de la ji ltar gzugs zhes bgyi ba'i ming bla thabs//
495b2(nyi khri): su gdags/'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang lags pa de la/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du ji
495b3(nyi khri): ltar ming bla thabs su gdags/de bas na don dam par ma mchis so//de ste don dam par ma mchis na/de ji ltar 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po brjod du ma mchis par
495b4(nyi khri): 'gyur/de bas na brjod du ma mchis pa'i dbyings zhes bgyi ba mi rigs so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la
495b5(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/de bas na byams pa khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar nus pa lan thob cig/byams pa de ji snyam du sems/nam khyod brjod du med pa'i dbyings la shes
495b6(nyi khri): rab spyod pa de'i tshe/'du byed kyi mtshon ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi
495b7(nyi khri): chos kyi bar du gang la ming bla thabs su gdags par bya ba de dag khyod kyis yod par dmigs sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
496a1(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/byams pa gzhung 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o//'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang ma yin/'du
496a2(nyi khri): byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar du ming
496a3(nyi khri): blo thabs su gdags pa de dag las brjod du med po'i dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin no//byams po de ste 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po brjod du med pa'i dbyings yin par
496a4(nyi khri): gyur na ni/byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa 'am/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro//byams pa de ste/
496a5(nyi khri): 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan zhig yin na ni brjod du med pa'i dbyings gang la/brjod du med pa'i dbyings rab tu chud par bya ba de'i mtshan
496a6(nyi khri): ma'ang dmigs su med par 'gyur ro//byams pa gzhung 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o//'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de brjod du med pa'i dbyings kyang
496a7(nyi khri): ma yin/gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i bar du ming bla thabs
496b1(nyi khri): su gdags pa de dag las brjod du med pa'i dbyings gzhan pa'ang ma yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
496b2(nyi khri): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ste byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang nye bar 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa na/'du byed kyi mtshan
496b3(nyi khri): ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ming bla dgas
496b4(nyi khri): su gdags pa gang lags pa de dag dmigs su ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das de ci logs/mchis pa las dmigs su mchis sam/'on te ma mchis pa lags/de
496b5(nyi khri): skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rang dbang du yod pa
496b6(nyi khri): nyid dam/med pa nyid du 'gyur ba gang yang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa khyod gang gi tshe/'du byed kyi mtshon ma'i dngos po de la rnam par rtog pa de'i tshe 'du
496b7(nyi khri): byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de rnam par rtog pas gzung ba ma yin nam/gang gi tshe brjod du med pa'i dbyings dang nye bar 'brel pa'i shes rab kyi spyod pa la gnas shing /rnam
497a1(nyi khri): par mi rtog pa de'i tshe na'ang /rnam par mi rtog pas zin par ma gyur tam/bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//byams pa de ltar na 'du byed kyi mtshan
497a2(nyi khri): ma'i dngos po gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ces bya bar ming bla dgas
497a3(nyi khri): su gdags pa gang yin pa de dag rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad pa ma yin nam/de rnam par rtog pa tsam du zad na'ang /rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la gnas shing /rnam
497a4(nyi khri): par rtog pa bsal ba na/yod par dmigs pa gang la gzugs zhes bya ba dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes po nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar
497a5(nyi khri): du yod par dmigs pa de gang yin/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
497a6(nyi khri): 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /chos rab tu 'byed mkhas pa la gnas pas gzugs rab tu dbye ba rnam pa dus gdags pa 'tshal bar
497a7(nyi khri): bgyidatshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba rnam pa dus gdags par 'tshal bar bgyi/de skad
497b1(nyi khri): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /chos rab tu 'byed mkhas pa
497b2(nyi khri): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa gsum gyis gzugs rab tu dbye ba gdags pa rjes su shes par bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes
497b3(nyi khri): pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba gdags pa rjes su shes par bya ste/'di ltar 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs 'di
497b4(nyi khri): ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so//'di ltar 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i tshor ba/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba/'di ni chos nyid kyi tshor ba'o//'di ltar 'di ni yongs su
497b5(nyi khri): brtags pa'i 'du shes/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes/'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du shes so//'di ltar 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i 'du byed/'di ni rnam par brtags
497b6(nyi khri): pa'i 'du byed/'di ni chos nyid kyi 'du byed do//'di ltar 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa/'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa/'di ni chos
497b7(nyi khri): nyid kyi rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba nas/'di ltar 'di dag ni yongs su brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos/'di dag ni rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos/'di
