498a1(nyi khri): dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas
498a2(nyi khri): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs gang lags rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang lags/chos nyid kyi gzugs gang
498a3(nyi khri): lags/bcom ldan 'das yongs su brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das yongs su
498a4(nyi khri): brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos gang lags/bka' stsal pa/
498a5(nyi khri): byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la gzugs so zhes ming dang 'du shes dang tha snyad du bya ba la brtan nas/gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su brtags
498a6(nyi khri): po gang yin pa 'di ni yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs so//byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag la tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
498a7(nyi khri): par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du ming dang 'du shes dang /gdags pa dang tha snyad du bya ba la brten nas/tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /'du shes
498b1(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su brtags pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni/yongs su brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //
498b2(nyi khri): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du 'di dag ni yongs su brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos so//'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de dang de dag
498b3(nyi khri): la rnam par rtog pa'i chos nyid tsam du gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa la brten nas/mngon par smra ba gang la 'di ni ming dang /'du shes dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad kyi
498b4(nyi khri): gzugs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du'o zhes bya ba gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i
498b5(nyi khri): gzugs so//'di ni rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba rnam par brtags pa'i 'du shes rnam par brtags pa'i 'du byed/rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa nas//
498b6(nyi khri): rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du'o//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /chos nyid dang chos kyi
498b7(nyi khri): gnas nyid kyi dbyings 'di dag ni gnas pa nyid de/brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa des/rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de rtag cing rtag pa'i dus brtan zhing brtan pa'i
499a1(nyi khri): dus su ngo bo nyid med cing chos bdag med pa dang /de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa 'di ni chos nyid kyi gzugs so//'di ni chos nyid kyi
499a2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
499a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gzugs 'di gsum las gzugs gang rdzas ma mchis par blta
499a4(nyi khri): bar bgyi/gang rdzas mchis pa lags/gang rdzas mchis pa'ang ma lags/rdzas ma mchis pa'ang ma lags la/don dam pas rab tu phye ba lags/bcom ldan 'das
499a5(nyi khri): tshor ba 'di gsum dang /'du shes 'di gsum dang /'du byed 'di gsum dang /rnam par shes pa 'di gsum nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di gsum gyi bar du sangs
499a6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos gang rdzas ma mchis par blta bar bgyi/gang rdzas mchis par blta bar bgyi/gang rdzas ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/rdzas mchis pa'ang ma lags par
499a7(nyi khri): blta bar bgyi zhing don dam pas rab tu phye ba lags/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams
499b1(nyi khri): pa yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rdzas med par blta'o//rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa rdzas yod pa'i phyir rdzas yod par lta'i/
499b2(nyi khri): rang dbang du 'jug pa ni ma yin no//chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de ni rdzas med pa'ang ma yin rdzas yod pa'ang ma yin te/don dam pas rab tu phye ba yin par blta'o//
499b3(nyi khri): yongs su brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa nas/yongs su brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar du
499b4(nyi khri): 'di dag ni rdzas med par blta'o//rnam par brtags pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas rnam par brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gang
499b5(nyi khri): yin pa'i bar du rnam par rtog pa rdzas yod pa'i phyir rdzas yod par lta'i/rang dbang du 'jug pa ni ma yin no//byams pa chos nyid kyi tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
499b6(nyi khri): byed dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa nas/chos nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar du de dag ni rdzas med pa'ang ma yin rdzus yod pa'ang ma yin te/don dam pas
499b7(nyi khri): rab tu phye ba yin par blta'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
500a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar gzugs zhes bgyi ba gnyis su ma mchis par brtsis 'di ltar tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par
500a2(nyi khri): shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du de dag gnyis su ma mchis par brtsis te/de ltar gzugs rab tu dbye ba mdzad/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
500a3(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du rab tu dbye ba mdzad na/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs nas 'di ltar gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ltar gzugs
500a4(nyi khri): zhes bgyi ba 'di gnyis su ma mchis par brdzis/'di ltar tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du gnyis
500a5(nyi khri): su ma mchis par brtsis te bstan/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa de ji snyam
500a6(nyi khri): du sems/yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs la rdzas med pa de gzugs sngam/'on te gzugs ma yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//
500a7(nyi khri): gang yang de la ming dang /'du shes dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad tsam gyi gzugs zhes bya ba de ci gzugs yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lags
500b1(nyi khri): so//byams pa rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o//yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyang ma yin/gzugs med pa'ang ma yin/
500b2(nyi khri): gzugs kyang ma yin/gzugs med pa'ang ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/ngas 'di la dgongs nas 'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba 'di gnyis su med par brtsi
500b3(nyi khri): bar gsungs so//byams pa de ji snyam du sems/rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs rdzas yod pa de la brten nas ming dang /'du shes dang /gdags pa dang /tha snyad du
500b4(nyi khri): 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ci gzugs yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//byams pa de ji snyam du sems/rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs de nyid la
500b5(nyi khri): yongs su brtags pa'i gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid med pa dang /de'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa gang yin pa de ci gzugs yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//
500b6(nyi khri): byams pa gzhung des kyang khyed kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o//rnam par brtags pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de gzugs kyang ma yin/gzugs med pa'ang ma yin no//gzugs
500b7(nyi khri): kyang ma yin/gzugs med pa'ang ma yin pa gang yin pa de'ang gnyis su med pa ste/ngas de la dgongs nas 'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba 'di gnyis su med par brtsi bar
501a1(nyi khri): gsungs so//byams pa de ji snyam du sems/chos nyid kyi gzugs gzugs bdag mod par rab tu phye ba de ci gzugs yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
501a2(nyi khri): 'das ma lags so//chos nyid kyi gzugs de'i gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de'adi ci gzugs yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//byams
501a3(nyi khri): pa gzhung des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya'o//chos nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/gzugs med pa'ang ma yin no//gang gzugs kyang ma
501a4(nyi khri): yin gzugs med pa'ang ma yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa ste/ngas de la dgongs nas 'di ltar gzugs de gnyis su med par brtsi bar gsungs so//de bzhin du tshor ba
501a5(nyi khri): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du sbyar bar bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang
501a6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar gzugs gnyis su
501a7(nyi khri): med pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas shing /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du de ltar gnyis su med pa'i
501b1(nyi khri): mtshan nyid la mkhas pas mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pas ji ltar mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa dang /ji ltar mtshan nyid spang ba dang /ji ltar mtshan nyid
501b2(nyi khri): mngon du bgyi ba dang /ji ltar mtshan nyid bsgom pa blta bar bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/
501b3(nyi khri): byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis spangs nas/de ltar dbu ma'i lam la rab tu zhugs pas gang gzugs yongs su
501b4(nyi khri): shes pa'ang ma yin/yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa
501b5(nyi khri): nas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du gang yongs su shes pa'ang ma yin/yongs su mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i yongs su shes pa'o//gang gzugs spong ba'ang ma
501b6(nyi khri): yin mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du
501b7(nyi khri): gang spong ba'ang ma yin/mi spong ba'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i spong ba'o//gang gzugs spong ba mngon sum du byed pa'ang ma yin mngon sum du mi byed pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid
502a1(nyi khri): de'i mngon sum du byed pa'o//gang gzugs spong ba'i lam bsgom pa'ang ma yin/mi sgom pa'ang ma yin pa de nyid de'i sgom pa'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang ///
502a2(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar du sbyar ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
502a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yongs su shes
502a4(nyi khri): pa dang /spong ba dang /mngon du byed pa dang /bsgom par ldan pa de'i mya ngan las 'das pa gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
502a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa ni zab bo//rab tu zab bo//de skad ces bka'
502a6(nyi khri): stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya
502a7(nyi khri): ngan las 'das pa de ltar zab cing rab tu zab pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las
502b1(nyi khri): 'das pa ni gang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin mya ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma yin te/de bas na de zab cing rab tu zab ces bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang/
502b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa de mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi lags/mya
502b3(nyi khri): ngan las ma 'das pa'ang ma lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa gzhan gyi don las brtsams te/'khor ba yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir mya ngon
502b4(nyi khri): las ma 'das pa'o//bdag gis don las brtsams te/mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dong /
502b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ste byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi don las brtsams te//
502b6(nyi khri): 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong na/'khor ba yongs su ma btang bas des ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa btang bar mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de ste byang chub sems dpa'
502b7(nyi khri): bdag gi don las brtsams te/mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong na/des ji ltar 'khor ba yongs su btang bar mi 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
503a1(nyi khri): stsal pa/byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/'khor ba la 'khor bar rnam par mi rtog/mya ngan las 'das pa
503a2(nyi khri): la'ang mya ngan las 'das par rnam par mi rtog ste/de de ltar rnam par mi rtog na 'di ltar 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis mtshungs mnyam par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe
503a3(nyi khri): na/'di ltar de 'khor ba la 'khor bar rnam par mi rtog na mya ngan las 'das pa bzhin du 'khor bar mi skyo'o//mya ngan las 'das pa la mya ngan las 'das par rnam par mi rtog na//
503a4(nyi khri): 'khor ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la zhen par mi 'gyur ro//de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyis la gnas pa de rigs pa 'dis 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba
503a5(nyi khri): dang /mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
503a6(nyi khri): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la rab tu gnas pas ji ltar
503a7(nyi khri): 'khor ba ma btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma legs so//mya ngan las 'das pa ji ltar mi btang ba de ltar blangs pa'ang ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das de ste ma blangs
503b1(nyi khri): na ji ltar btang ba ma lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa nga ni de ltar 'khor ba blang ba 'am/mi blang bar mi smra'o/byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
503b2(nyi khri): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa'i dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis sems dbang du gyur pa/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed du
503b3(nyi khri): thab so mkhas pas 'khor ba bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong bar nga smra'o//stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa la
503b4(nyi khri): gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su ma gtong ba rang smra'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol
503b5(nyi khri): to//bcom ldan 'das rnam par mi rtog pa la mtshan nyid thams cad ji ltar blta bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa gzugs gang yin pa dang /
503b6(nyi khri): tshor ba gang yin pa dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i bar dang /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa nas sangs
503b7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin po'i bar du chos de dag dang stong pa nyid de dag sgom pa dang /dngos po gnyis su med pa dang /rab tu spros pa med pa 'di ni byams pa
504a1(nyi khri): thams cad kyi mtshan nyid thams cad du blta'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol
504a2(nyi khri): to//bcom ldan 'das ci lags/nyan thos thams cad phyogs gcig pa 'am/shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
504a3(nyi khri): pa/byams pa de ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa 'jig rten pa 'di dag ni khams sna tshogs pa khams du ma pa ste/khams sna tshogs khams dum pa'i
504a4(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa de dag la sems can gyi rigs dang /rang bzhin rab tu mang po yod de/byams pa sems can gyi rus dang /rigs dang po nas bzang po'i khyad par 'dod
504a5(nyi khri): cing bzang po'i khyad par nyid thob pa de lta bu'ang yod do//sems can gyi rus dang /rigs gang dang po nas khyad par ngan pa 'dod cing ngan pa nyid 'thob ste/de nyid kyis
504a6(nyi khri): mgu bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'ang yod do//rus dang rigs gang thog ma nas ngan pa'i bye brag 'dod cing ngan pa nyid 'thob ste/ngan pa thob nas de tsam gyis mgu bar mi
504a7(nyi khri): 'gyur zhing /de nas phyis gong du bzang po'i khyad par 'dod cing bzang po 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu dag kyang yod do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan
504b1(nyi khri): 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang sems can gyi rus dang rigs gsum pa de dgra bcom pa thob nas/bla na ma mchis pa
504b2(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i skye ba'ang ma mchis par lung bstan te/skye ba ma mchis na ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur//
504b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byams pa de'i skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin par ming mi 'dogs kyi/de'i skye ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa mya
504b4(nyi khri): ngan las 'das par 'gyur bar gdags so//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcomo
504b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa rgya che ba dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa mthu che ba gang la dang po nyid du bzang po'i khyad par 'tshal zhing bzang po'i
504b6(nyi khri): khyad par nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba de ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rgya che ba de dag gang lags/'di ltar byang chub sems
504b7(nyi khri): dpa' rnams de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang /mi 'dzin pa'i bde ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong par 'dod cing bla na med pa
505a1(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ltar 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir te/'di ni de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mthu chen po
505a2(nyi khri): yin par blta'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang
505a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
505a4(nyi khri): mi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos thob par 'tshal bas/bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o//
505a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la rab tu phye ba'i le'u ste/bdun cu gnyis pa'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po
505a6(nyi khri): bdun cu bdun pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rigs kyi bu pho 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
505a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'tsho la 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu pho 'am/rigs kyi bu mo des rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ji ltar btsal
505b1(nyi khri): zhing de ltar sgra dbyangs mi zad par klog pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung na/tshangs par spyod pa de ltar btsal bar bya'o//de
505b2(nyi khri): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe drang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
505b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ltar btsal/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
505b4(nyi khri): bka' stsal to//rab 'byor rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshol ba na/lus mi 'phangs pa
505b5(nyi khri): dang /srog la mi lta ba dang /rnyed pa dang bkuri sti dang /grags pa la mi gnas pas btsal to//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshal ba na/dgon pa nu 'dug
505b6(nyi khri): pa'i tshe bar snang las 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shwar phyogs su song zhig dang /de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro//ci nas kyang lus ngal ba'i yid la
505b7(nyi khri): byed pa mi skye ba dang /rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /zas kyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /skom gyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /mtshan mo'i
506a1(nyi khri): yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /nyin par gyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /grang ba'i yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skye ba de ltar song /
506a2(nyi khri): zhig/phyi rol dang nang gong la'ang sems ma 'jog cig/rigs kyi bu g.yon du lta zhing ma 'gro zhig/g.yos su ma lto zhig/nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang /bla dang
506a3(nyi khri): 'og dang mtshams rnams su lta zhing ma 'gro zhig/rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang 'jig tshogs la mi g.yo ba dang /gzugs la mi g.yo ba dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes
506a4(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la mi g.yo ba de ltar song zhig/gang de la g.yos pa de ni 'gal bar gnas so//gang las 'gal bar gnas she na/sangs
506a5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos las 'gal bar gnas so//gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las 'gal bar gnas pa de 'khor ba na spyod do//gang 'khor ba na spyod pa des shes rab kyi pha
506a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa mi rnyed do zhes zer ba'i sgra thos par gyur to//sgra des de skad ces smras pa dang /rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra de'i
506a7(nyi khri): lan 'ad skad smras so//de ltar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi snang ba byed par 'dod cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub par 'dod pa'i
506b1(nyi khri): phyir ro//de skad ces smras pa dang /sgra des rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad smras so//rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rigs kyi bu
506b2(nyi khri): legs so//legs so//de nas yang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i sangs rgyas
506b3(nyi khri): kyi chos la khyod kyis mos pa bskyed de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bya'o//mtshan ma spangs pa dang /dngos po spangs pa dang /sems can du lta ba khyod kyis spong
506b4(nyi khri): bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po rnams spong bar bya'o//gang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /
506b5(nyi khri): ma byung ba dang /ma skyes pa dang /dngos po med pa dang /ma 'gags pa'i chos 'chang ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag bsnyen par bya/bsten par bya/bsnyen bkur bya'o//
506b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du gyur pa 'am/chos smra ba'i dge slong las ring po mo thogs par thos par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi
506b7(nyi khri): bu khyod kyis gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//khyod kyis drin du gzo ba dang /byas pa dran par bya'o//'di ni bdag gi
507a1(nyi khri): dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/'di las bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so//gang thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
507a2(nyi khri): myur du slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar 'gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
507a3(nyi khri): dang mi 'bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba dang /mi khom pa rnams spangs par 'gyur ba dang /dal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
507a4(nyi khri): phan yon 'di dag yongs su brtag cing chos smra ba'i dge slong la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'i/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems
507a5(nyi khri): kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong la bsnyen par mi bya'o//khyod kyis chos don du gnyer ba dang /chos la gus pas chos smra ba'i dge slong gi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o//khyod kyis
507a6(nyi khri): bdud kyi las rnams kyang shes par bya ste/rigs kyi bu bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg
507a7(nyi khri): pa dag bsnyen pa dang /bsten pa dang /spyad pa'i phyir khyer te 'ong ba dag kyang yod do//de dag kyang zil gyis mnan nas/thabs mkhas pas so sor bsnyen bsten
507b1(nyi khri): yongs su spyod do//de la'ang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra ba la sems ma dad pa mi bskyed pa 'di ltar sems bskyed do//bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de rab tu mi shes kyi/'di na
507b2(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pas rab tu shes so//'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di rnams so sor bsnyen bsten spyod
507b3(nyi khri): par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la'ang chags pa 'am sgrib pa med do//de'i tshe'ang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa
507b4(nyi khri): tshul so sor brtag par bya'o//rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul yang gang zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang
507b5(nyi khri): ba med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo //chos thams cad ni sems can med pa/srog med pa/gang zag med pa ste/sgyu ma lta bu
507b6(nyi khri): rmi lam lta bu brag cha lta bu gzugs brnyan lta bu'o//rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor rtog cing chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang na/ring po mi
507b7(nyi khri): thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las gzhan dag kyang shes par bya ba ni rigs kyi bu gal te chos smra ba
508a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la gshe zhing mi lta na/de la'ang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis slar bkyal bar mi bya'i/gzhan du na chos
508a2(nyi khri): don du gnyer ba dang /chos la gus pa dang /sems mi skyo bas chos smra ba'i dge slong gi rjes su 'byung bar bya'o//de nas rtag par rab tu ngu bo'i byang chub sems dpa'
508a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos sgra nga las gdams pa 'di lta bu thos nas/shar phyogs kyi phyogs ga la ba dAr song ngo //song nas ring po ma lon par yang de la 'di snyam du gyur
508a4(nyi khri): to//bdag gis sgra de las bdag ji srid du 'gro dgos zhes ma dris so snyam nas/des phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/ngu zhing 'bod pa dang /mya ngan byed smre sngags 'don
508a5(nyi khri): cing 'di snyam du sems so//sa phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam/gosum mam bzhi 'im lnga 'am drug gam nyin zhag bdun 'das par byas te/shes
508a6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos kyi bar du lus ngal ba'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed/rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi yid la byed pa mi bskyed/bza' ba'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed//
508a7(nyi khri): btung ba'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed/mtshan mo'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed/nyin par gyi yid la byed pa mi bskyed/brang ba'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed do snyam du sems
508b1(nyi khri): so/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig bu gcig pa zhig dus las 'das te sdug bsngal dang /yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur te/de bu'i mya ngan gyis bu'i mya ngan las
508b2(nyi khri): gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi 'byung ba de bzhin du rab 'byor rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang de'i tshe/nam zhig bdag gis shes rab kyi pha
508b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa de thos par 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan po'i yid la byed pa mi 'byung ngo //rab 'byor de nas rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
508b4(nyi khri): ltar phongs shing 'dug pa'i mdun du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo byung nas/rigs kyi bu khyod de skad smra ba legs so/legs so zhes/legs pa byin te/sngon gyi de
508b5(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji
508b6(nyi khri): ltar da ltar khyed 'tshol ba de bzhin du btsal to//de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus de nyid dang /spro ba de nyid dang /don du gnyer ba de nyid dang /mos pa de nyid kyis
508b7(nyi khri): rgyun chags por shar phyogs su song zhig dang /'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na/spos can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig yod de rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ra ba bdun
509a1(nyi khri): rim gyis bskor ba/'obs bdun rim gyis bskor ba/shing ta lA'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba/chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis
509a2(nyi khri): 'byor cing dAr ba/bde zhing skyid pa/nyams dga' ba/mi mang pos gang ba/srang gi tshod khang ri mo la bris pa lta bu mnyam pa lnga brgya yod pa/khyogs dang bzhon pa mi dog
509a3(nyi khri): par 'gro ba'i zam pa dang bcas pa/grong khyer de'i kho ra khor yug gi rtsig pa'ang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/rin po che sna bdun gyi rtsig pa de dag gi rib ma'ang 'dzam+bu na da'i
509a4(nyi khri): gser les byas pa/tshad dang ldan zhing 'phong mtho ba/rib ma de dag re re las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing /'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams skyes te/'bras bu de
509a5(nyi khri): dag thams cad las kyang rin po che las byas pa'i srang bus sbrel ba'i shing gzhan dag dang ldan pa sha stag go/grong khyer de thams cad kyang gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas g.yogs
509a6(nyi khri): te/gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba de dag rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba chags par 'gyur ba dag 'byung ste/dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rnga rol mo mkhan
509a7(nyi khri): mkhas pa rnams/tshegs pas brdungs pa'i sgo snyan cing yid du 'ong la/chags par 'gyur pa'i sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du/dril bu'i dra ba de dag rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra
509b1(nyi khri): snyan nang yong du 'ong ba chags par 'gyur ba 'byung ngo //sems can de dag kyang skad dag gis kyo zhing dga' ba dang yongs su spyod par byed do//grong khyer smos can de'i khor
509b2(nyi khri): yug gi 'obs kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing rgyun tu 'bab ste/ha cang yang mi krang ha cang yang mi dro ba'i chu de la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru
509b3(nyi khri): sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba/de dag tu sems can de dag zhugs nas/rtse zhing dga' ba dang /yongs su spyod pa byed do//chu dag
509b4(nyi khri): thams cad kyang ut+pal dang /pad+ma dang ku mu dra dang /puN+Da ri kas khebs/gzhan yang me tog rigs che zhing bsung zhim pa dag gis yongs su khebs te/stong gsum gyi stong
509b5(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/me tog go rigs gang dang gang yod pa de dag thams cad spos can gyi grong khyer na med pa gcig kyang med do//grong khyer de'i kho ra khor yug na skyed
509b6(nyi khri): mochos tshal lnga brgya yod de/de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/bzang zhing blta no sdug pa sha stag go//skyed mos tshal de rerI na'ang rgyang grags
509b7(nyi khri): gcig pa'i mtsho lnga brgya yod de/mtsho de dag thams cad na'ang /rin po che sna bdun gyi ut+pal dang /pad+ma dang ku mu da dang /puN+Da ri ka mdzes shing blta na sdug pa rnams
510a1(nyi khri): kyis khebs par 'khod do//ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /puN+Da ri ka de dag thams cad kyang zheng shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam sha stag ste/mthing ga
510a2(nyi khri): la kha dog mthing gar 'dug pa/mthing ga 'dra zhing mthing gar snang ba/ser po la kha dog ser po/ser po 'dra zhing ser por snang ba/dmar po la kha dog dmar po/
510a3(nyi khri): dmar po 'dra zhing dmar por snang ba/dkar po la kha dog dkar po/dkar po 'dra zhing dkar por snang ba sha stag go/mtsho de dag thams cad na bya ngang mo dang /ka ran+da ba
510a4(nyi khri): dang /khrung khrung dang /sa ra sa dang /ngur pa'i sgras khyab par sgrogs so//skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi ba med/yongs su gzung ba med pa/sems
510a5(nyi khri): can de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba ste/'di ltar yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /chos zab mo la rab tu mos pa'i rnam
510a6(nyi khri): par smin pa las byung ba sha stag go//rigs kyi bu spros can gyi grong khyer gyi lam srang gi mdo'i dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i
510a7(nyi khri): khyim kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa/rin po che bdun las byas pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/lta na sdug pa/ra ba bdun dang /shing ta la'i
510b1(nyi khri): 'phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba'o//khyim de na khyim gyi longs spyod du skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/rtag par rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba dang /
510b2(nyi khri): mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /me tog mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal lo//skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang mtsho'u brgyad brgyad yod de/bzang mo zhes bya ba dang /bzang
510b3(nyi khri): mo'i mchog ces bya ba dang /dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /dga' ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang /bde ba zhes bya ba dang /bde ba can zhes bya ba dang /nges pa zhes bya ba dang /rnam par mi
510b4(nyi khri): 'bab pa zhes bya ba ste/mtshe'u nga rnams kyi dris gcig ni gser las byas/ngos gnyis pa ni dngul los byas/ngos gsum pa ni bai DUr+ya las byas/ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas/
510b5(nyi khri): nang gi gzhi ni ka ra ke da na las byas shing gzhi gser gyi bye ma bkram pa'o//mtshe'u de re re la'ang 'bab stegs khri 'phang can brgyad brgyad yod de/'bab stegs kyi ngos kun rin
510b6(nyi khri): po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan cing /'bab stegs kyi bar thams cad nas 'dzam bu na nga'i gser gyi chu shing dag skyes so//mtshe'u de dag thams cad na me tog ut+pa la dang /
510b7(nyi khri): pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /puN+Da ri ka sna tshogs kyis khebs shing /bya dang mo dang /sa ra sa dang /ngur pa'i sgra sgrogs so//mtshe'u de dag gi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi
511a1(nyi khri): shing rnam pa sna tshogs skye'o//me tog gi shing de dag rlung gis btab pa'i me tog rnams kyang mtshe'u'i nang du lhag go/mtshe'u de dag thams cad kyi chu'ang tsAn+dan
511a2(nyi khri): gyi bsung can la kha dog dang dri dang /ro dang /reg pa phun sum tshogs pa'i//de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rtse ba'i sa yod de/
511a3(nyi khri): de 'khor dang bcas pa/bud med stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor pas/de na rtse dga' yongs su spyod do//grong khyer de
511a4(nyi khri): na gnas pa'i sems can skyes pa'am/bud med gang yin pa de dag kyang rtag par rab tu dga' zhing skyed mos tshal dang /mtshe'u rnams su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing
511a5(nyi khri): 'byor pas rtse dga' yongs su spyod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'ang /'khor dang bcas par tha gi tsam zhig rtse zhing dga' ba
511a6(nyi khri): yongs su spyad nas/de'i 'og tu dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad do//grong khyer spros can de na 'khod pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag kyang grong khyer
511a7(nyi khri): gyi lam mdo'i dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i chos kyi khri 'dzugs te/rkang pa gser las byas pa 'am/dngul los
511b1(nyi khri): byas pa 'am/bai DUr+ya las byas pa 'am/shel las byas pa'i steng /shing bal gyi stan+da nam/'gau li ka'i spyan nam/khong 'tshungs can gyi stan nam ka shi ka'i gos
511b2(nyi khri): bting ba/'phang du rgyang grags phyed tsam yod pa/steng gi bar snang las kyang mu tig gis brgyan pa'i bla re bres/sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu'ang me tog kha dog rnam pa
511b3(nyi khri): lngas 'thor/mngon par 'thor/rab tu mngon par 'thor ro//bdug spos bsung zhim po sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de bdug par byed do//de 'di ltar chos la gus
511b4(nyi khri): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang la 'dug nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa la/bsung can na 'khod pa'i
511b5(nyi khri): sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la de lta bu'i chos la gus pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa ni srog
511b6(nyi khri): chags brgya phrag mang po/srog chags stong phrag mang po/srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po rnams lhags par gyur te/mI dang lha rnams gang nyan pa de dag las kha cig ni
511b7(nyi khri): klog slob/kha cig ni kha ton slob/kha cig ni yongs su chud par byed/kha cig ni 'dzin/kha cig ni 'chang /kha cig ni zlos/kha cig ni 'dri/kha cig ni tshul bzhin
512a1(nyi khri): yid la byed pa'i rjes su 'gro'o//sems can de dag thams cad kyang ltung ba'i chos can ma yin la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
512a2(nyi khri): mi ldog pa sha dag go//rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du song zhig dang /de las khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
512a3(nyi khri): phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro//de ni rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa'o//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu bskul ma 'debs
512a4(nyi khri): pa/gzeng stod pa rab tu spro bar byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar khyod 'tshol ba bzhin du btsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du
512a5(nyi khri): nga la bso ba'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed par song zhig dang /ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
512a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rtag pa ro rab tu ngu ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'di thos nas/dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga'/mos shing yid bde bar gyur pa ni 'di lta ste dper na//
512a7(nyi khri): mi zhig dug dang bcas pa'i zug rngus zug na/nam zhig bdag gis zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa gang /bdag gi zug rngu 'di 'byin cing /gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las
512b1(nyi khri): thar bar byed pa nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'ang /gang bdag la
512b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing chos gang bdag gis thos nas/dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de na ma mthong bar 'gyur snyam
512b3(nyi khri): pa las gzhan pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/chos thams
512b4(nyi khri): cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to//de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu dang /tshe rabs snga ma la goms pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa ni 'di lta ste//
512b5(nyi khri): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad la ye
512b6(nyi khri): shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad la tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mi 'gyur bar mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
512b7(nyi khri): 'dzin dang /chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mi shes
513a1(nyi khri): pa 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /me tog mngon par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
513a2(nyi khri): chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar rab
513a3(nyi khri): tu snang ba mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad kyi sgra 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad mngon par dga'
513a4(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sgra dang tshig dang 'bru sna tshogs mngon par 'byin
513a5(nyi khri): pab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ma mnan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rang bzhin gyi tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa
513a6(nyi khri): thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams
513a7(nyi khri): cad rnam par mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mi sgrib pa'i mtha'
513b1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzugs kyi rgyal po nye bar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
513b2(nyi khri): dang /rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos kyi dbyings las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
513b3(nyi khri): dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
513b4(nyi khri): dang /rdul dang rnam par bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /pad+mo'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
513b5(nyi khri): the tshom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i
513b6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang /mngon par shes pa dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting
513b7(nyi khri): 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /le lo thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos zab mo'i 'od byed ces
514a1(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bdud kyi 'khor 'jig par byed pa zhes
514a2(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /khams gsum la mngon par ma zhon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od zer 'o byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
514a3(nyi khri): mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas par gyur nas/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med
514a4(nyi khri): pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rab tu ston pa rnams mthong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
514a5(nyi khri): kyang /de la legs pa sbyin zhing dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/shes rab
514a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal te/ting nge 'dzin 'di dag rab tu thob pa ni gang de ltar khyod kyis thob pa'o//ting nge 'dzin de dag rab tu thob nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
514a7(nyi khri): phyin pa rtogs par gyur to//phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur to/nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid la bltas na/snyoms
514b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa 'am/ldang ba 'am/gang byang chub tu spyod pa 'am/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang ma mthong
514b2(nyi khri): ngo//rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang la'ang sems pa med do//rigs kyi bu nged kyis sems pa med pa la gnas pas lus gsar gyi kha dog lta bu 'di
514b3(nyi khri): lta bu dag rab tu thob/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /'od 'dom gang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa
514b4(nyi khri): rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang de bzhin gshegs
514b5(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang tshad gzung ba 'am/mtha' bstan par mi nus na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
514b6(nyi khri): lta smos kyang mi dgos pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag rab tu thob bo//de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang chos 'di dag nyid la gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya'o///
514b7(nyi khri): lhag par don du gnyer ba dang /mos par bya ba bskyed par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang /mos par byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag por
515a1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi dkon no//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang gus pa rab tu bskyed cing dga' bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
515a2(nyi khri): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//
515a3(nyi khri): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bodag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
515a4(nyi khri): gang lags/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu khyod
515a5(nyi khri): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas yun ring po nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas/shes
515a6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /thabs mkhas pa la'ang bslabs te/de ni rigs kyi bu khyod la phan 'dogs pa yin/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no//
515a7(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i byas pa gzungs su bzung ngo //gal te rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de/
515b1(nyi khri): bskal pa gcig gam/bskal pa gnyis sam/bskal pa brgya'am/bskal pa stong ngam/de bas kyang lhag par ras kyi thod bzhin du mgo la khyer ram/bde ba'i yo byad thams
515b2(nyi khri): cad byin nam/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/gzugs dang /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byin yang de tsam gyis rigs
515b3(nyi khri): kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan len par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par gyur/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
515b4(nyi khri): mkhas pa thos par gyur/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/byang chub sems
515b5(nyi khri): dpa' rtag par rab tu ngu bas/ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po thob pa'i le'u ste/bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o////de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
515b6(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'ang ting
515b7(nyi khri): nge 'dzin de rnams las langs par gyur te/langs nas kyang de 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gnas byon/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam
516a1(nyi khri): sems par gyur to//des de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong ba dang /mi dga' zhing gdung ba chen por gyur te 'di snyam du sems par gyur to//'phags
516a2(nyi khri): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de gzungs rab tu thob la/lnga mngon par shes pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa ste/bdag la phan
516a3(nyi khri): 'dogs pa/bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te yun ring por des bdag gi don byas pas/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
516a4(nyi khri): gar bzhud ces bya ba'i don de bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du nye bar song ste/dri bar bya'o snyam du
516a5(nyi khri): sems par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa
516a6(nyi khri): de la dga' ba dang /dang ba dang /rdzas dang /gus pa bskyed nas sngar 'di snyam du bsams so//bdag gis bsti stang ji lta bu zhig gis 'phags pa byang chub sems
516a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la bsnyen par bya/bdag kyang dbul bas bdag la gos sam/rin po che'am/gser ram/mu tig gam/bai
516b1(nyi khri): DUr+ya 'am/dung ngam/shel lam/byu ru 'am/dngul lam/me tog gam/bdug pa 'am/spos sam/phreng ba dang /byug pa 'am/gdugs gang gis 'phags pa byang
516b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de la bsti stang du bya bar 'os pa de lta bu cung zad kyang med/bdag de bzhin du 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'o/
516b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du 'gro bar yang mi rigs la/bdag dga' zhing mgu bar yang mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
516b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu thub de lta bur bla ma la gus shing rim gror bya ba'i don yid la byed pas/mthar gyis song song nas/grong khyer gcig cig tu phyin te/der
516b5(nyi khri): tshong dus kyi dbus su phyin pa dang /'di snyam du bsams so//bdag gau lus 'di btsongs te/de'i rin gyis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
516b6(nyi khri): chos kyis 'phags po la mchod pa bya'o//yun ring mo zhig tu bdag gi lus stong tsam zhig par gyur/dengs par gyur/btsongs rmog med par gyur te dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bar yang
516b7(nyi khri): dang yang du 'khor ba na/dpag tu med pa'i sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal myong bar gyur te/de yang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang
517a1(nyi khri): 'dod pa'i gzhi'i phyir gyi/chos 'di lta bu'i phyir ram/byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu dag la mchod pa'i phyir ni ma yin no snyam mo//de nus byung
517a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/tshong 'dus kyi dbus su mi su nyo mI su nyo zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste bos so//de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du
517a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen po chos kyis
517a4(nyi khri): 'phags pa la mchod pa byas nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
517a5(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub myur du rdzogs par 'gyur/thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu thob par 'gyur/bdud dang bdud kyi ris su gtogs po'i lha rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/yon tan
517a6(nyi khri): thams cad kyi mthar phyin par 'gyuraro zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pas yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/des kyang sems can mang po'i don byed par
517a7(nyi khri): 'gyur de dag kyang bdag gi spyod yul las 'das par 'gyur la/sems can gzhan dag kyang bdag gi spyod yul las 'das nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
517b1(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyis/de'i phyir bdag gis de'i bar chad bya'o snyam du bsams so//de nas bdud sdig to can gyis bram ze dang /khyim bdag de
517b2(nyi khri): rnams la ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas mi su nyo mi su nyo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pa de mi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bur zil gyis mnan
517b3(nyi khri): to/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba bdag nga nyo ba ma rnyed pa dang /phyogs gcig tu song ste ngus nas 'di snyam du e ma'o bdag gi
517b4(nyi khri): lus nyo ba'ang med de/rnyed pa rab tu ma rnyed do snyam du sems so//de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di
517b5(nyi khri): chos 'dod pa'i phyir/yang dag pa'i bsam pas bdag gi lus yongs su gtong ngam/'on te ma yin pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam du sems so//de nas brgya byin
517b6(nyi khri): lha'i dbang po bram ze'i khye'u zhig tu mngon par sprul nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /byang chub sems
517b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir yid mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed la ngu zhing 'dug/rtag par rab tu ngu bas bram ze'i
518a1(nyi khri): khye'u la 'di skad smras so//bram ze'i khye'u bdag ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir/bdag gi lus btsongs te chos la mchod par 'dod na/bdag nyo ba ma rnyed de de la
518a2(nyi khri): bdag 'di snyam du gang bdag gi lus btsongs nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya zhing /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
518a3(nyi khri): kyis 'phags pa la'ang /bkur stir bya ba de lta bu'i lus nyo ba'ang ma rnyed pa de/e ma'o bdag bsod nams re chung snyam du sems so//de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang
518a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu bdag la mi ni mi dgos kyi/bdag mchod sbyin zhig byed pas/der mo'i
518a5(nyi khri): snying dang /khrag dang rus pa dang /rkang dgos na de nyor sbyin nam/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gang shes rab kyi pha
518a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir/khye'u 'di la bdag gi lus dang /snying dang khrag dang /rus pa dang /rkang nyo ba rnyed pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog rab tu rnyed//
518a7(nyi khri): bdag gos lus kyang don yod par gyur to snyam du sems te/de dga' mgu rab tu dga' ba'i sems su gyur nas/khye'u de la 'di skad smras so//khye'u khyod lus 'di gang
518b1(nyi khri): gi phyir dgos pa de sbyin no//des de la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod la rin ci zhig sbyin/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas khye'u de la 'di
518b2(nyi khri): skad smras so//khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de byin cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te dpung
518b3(nyi khri): pa g.yas pa phug nas khrag phyung ngo //brla g.yas pa'ang bcad nas sha med par byas de/rtsig pa zhig gi drung du rus pa gcog tu song ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig
518b4(nyi khri): khang thog na 'dug pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/brla'i sha med par byas nas/rtsig pa'i drung du rus pa gcog tu song ba mthong ba dang /
518b5(nyi khri): de 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir bdag gis bdag la gnod par byed/de bdag gis rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam du sems so//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang
518b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba gang na bo der song ste/der phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba lo 'di
518b7(nyi khri): skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar bdag la bdag gnod par byed/khrag dang rus po dang rkang de dag gis kyang ci zhig bya/rtag par rab tu ngu bas bu mo
519a1(nyi khri): de la 'di skad smras so//'di dag khye'u de la btsongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod cing /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
519a2(nyi khri): po chos kyis 'phags pa la'ang rami gror bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la tshong dpon gyi bu mo des 'di skad smras so//rigs
519a3(nyi khri): kyi bu khyod kyi snying dang /khrag dang rus pa dang rkang btsongs te/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror byas na yon tan
519a4(nyi khri): cizhig yod/des bu mo de la 'di skad smras so//bu mo rigs kyi bu don gang la nged kyis bsgrubs na/sems can thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang /
519a5(nyi khri): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
519a6(nyi khri): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /'od 'dom gang ba dang /'od zer mtha' yas pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang
519a7(nyi khri): snyoms chen po dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
519b1(nyi khri): bco brgyad dang /nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang /tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab
519b2(nyi khri): pa dang /shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
519b3(nyi khri): chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /gang sems can thams cad la bgor yod pa/bla na med pa'i chos rin po che rab tu thob par 'gyur ba/de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
519b4(nyi khri): pa la thabs mkhas pa/bdag la ston te de la bdag slob bo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la tshong dpon gyi bu mo des 'di skad smras
519b5(nyi khri): so/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yongs su bsgrags pa'i chos rgya chen po de dag ni ngo mtshar che ste/rigs kyi bu chos de lta bu re re'i phyir yang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus kyang
519b6(nyi khri): yongs su btang bar 'os na/gcig lta smos kyang ci dgos/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/sems can thams cad la
519b7(nyi khri): phan pa dang /bde bar 'gyur ba 'di dag yongs su bsgrags so//rigs kyi bu khyod ci dgos pa gsar ram/dngul lam/bai DUr+ya 'am/nor bu rin po che'am/mu tig
520a1(nyi khri): gam/me tog gam/bdug pa 'am/spos sam/phreng ba 'am/byug pa 'am/phye ma 'am/gos sam/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan gang
520a2(nyi khri): gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de la rim gror bya bar 'gyur ba de dag bdag gis pha ma las bslangs te sbyin gyis/bdag la
520a3(nyi khri): bdag 'di lta bu'i gnod pa ma byed cig/bdag kyang chos de rnams 'dod de/bdag kyang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa
520a4(nyi khri): gang na ba der khyod dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o//bdag kyang 'di ltar chos de lta bu de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do//de nas lha'i
520a5(nyi khri): dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i lus mi snang bar byas nas/bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i mdun du 'dug
520a6(nyi khri): nas 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu 'di lta bur yi dmau la brtan pa legs so//legs so//rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
520a7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/chos don du gnyer ba'i tshul 'di lta bus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
520b1(nyi khri): la thabs mkhas pa bcol cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen la yongs su dris nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rigs kyi bu
520b2(nyi khri): bdag la ni snying dang /khrag dang rus pa dang rkang mi dgos kyis khyod la nyams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis/rigs kyi bu khyod la mchog ji tsam zhig sbyin par bya ba'i mchog
520b3(nyi khri): slongs shig/rtag par rab tu ngu bas brgya byin la smras pa/brgya byin bdag la bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos byin cig/brgya byin gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu yul
520b4(nyi khri): 'di ni bdag gis spyod yul ma yin gyi/yul 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis spyod yul lo//de bas na mchog gzhan zhig slongs shig/byang chub
520b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/lha'i dbang po 'o na khyod thugs khral chung ngu gyis la bzhugs shig/bdag gis lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
520b6(nyi khri): bdag rang bden pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
520b7(nyi khri): lung bstan cing /bdag la sgyu med pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yod par bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya'o//lha'i dbang po bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag
521a1(nyi khri): gi lus snga ma bzhin du gyur cig/de nas skad cig de dang /thang cig de dang /yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su
521a2(nyi khri): dag pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i lus snga ma bzhin du gnas par gyur to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med par
521a3(nyi khri): gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la de las gzhan lan 'debs ma nus nas/gnas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshong dpon
521a4(nyi khri): gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu bdag gi khyim gang na ba der bzhud kyis tshur spyon/bdag gi
521a5(nyi khri): pha ma las nor bslangs te/khyod chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchod pa dang /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis
521a6(nyi khri): 'phags pa de la rim gror bya ba'i nor de khyod la sbyin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang lhan cig tu de'i
521a7(nyi khri): khyim gang na ba der dong ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du song nas/pha ma la 'di skad smras so//yab yum bdag la nor mang po stsal du gsol/gser
521b1(nyi khri): dang /dngul dang /rin po che dang /nor bu dang /gos dang /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan
521b2(nyi khri): rnams dang sil snyan gyi bye brag rnam pa mang po rnams bdag la stsal du gsol/khyed kyis bdag la 'khor du stsal ba'i bu mo lnga brgya po 'di rnams dang /lhan cig tu bdag kyang byang chub
521b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchod cing /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags
521b4(nyi khri): pa la rim gro bgyid du mchi bar ci gnang /des bdag cag la chos bshad na/sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bu mo de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bu mo de la
521b5(nyi khri): 'di skad smras so//bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba zhes bya ba de su zhig/da lta ga la 'dug/bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu de'o skol gyi
521b6(nyi khri): chab sgo'i drung na mchis te/rigs kyi bu de'ang lhag pa'i bsam pas/bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu zhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/sems can thams
521b7(nyi khri): cad dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs las thar bar 'tshal ba'i slad du/dam pa'i chos 'tshol bas/bdag gi lus btsongs te dam pa'i chos kyi tshul
522a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gro bgyi bar 'tshal na/de'i lus nyo//
522a2(nyi khri): ba'ang ma rnyed nas de sdug bsngal bar gyur yid mi dga' sems khongs su chud/yi chad nas ngu zhing 'dug pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi lus su sprul nas//
522a3(nyi khri): de la nyams bskyed pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' ba dang /sems khongs su chud de yi chad nas/ci'i phyir ngu zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang /des
522a4(nyi khri): de la bdag ni bdag gi lus 'tshong na/de nyo ba'ang med do zhes smras so//brgya byin khye'u'i lus su bsgyur bas smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag gi lus 'tshong /rtag
522a5(nyi khri): par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa dang /'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror ba
522a6(nyi khri): ba'i phyir ro//de'ang 'di ltar chos 'dod pa'i phyir te/de la bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi reg lus so//khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur ba'i brgya byin gyis smras pa/rigs
522a7(nyi khri): kyi bu bdag la mi ni mi dgos kyi/bdag mchod sbyin zhig byed pas/der bdag la mi'i snying dang /khrag dang rus pa dang rkang dag dgos so//de nas rigs kyi bu de sems
522b1(nyi khri): ma zhum par gyur nas/de'ang sbyin no zhes smras te/de mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te/bdag gi dpung pa phug ste khrag phyung ba rla'ang sha med par byas nas/rtsig pa zhig gi drung du rus pa
522b2(nyi khri): gcog tu song ste/rus pa dang /rkang sbyin no snyam pa las/de khrag zag cing 'dug pa bdag gis khang thog nas mthong ba dang /de la bdag 'di snyam du mi 'di ci byed po zhig/'di
522b3(nyi khri): ltar bdag la bdag gnod par byed snyam nas/de'i drung du bdag mchis te 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag la bdag khrag 'byin/de nas rigs kyi bu des bdag
522b4(nyi khri): lnga 'di skad smras so//bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang snying dang rus pa dang rkang sbyin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag ni dbul bas nor gzhan cung zad kyang med do//de la bdag
522b5(nyi khri): gis 'di skad smras so//nor des khyod la ci zhig bya/des bdag la 'di skad smras so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod cing chos 'dod pa'i phyir/'phags pa
522b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror bya'o//de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod de las yon tan gyi rigs dang /
522b7(nyi khri): yon tan gyi bye brag ci zhig 'byung /des bdag la 'di skad smras so//de ni bdog la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston par 'gyur
523a1(nyi khri): zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dpag tu med pa mi 'phrogs pa de lta bu'i chos rnams de las thob par 'gyur ro//de bdag gis thob pa dang /dga' zhing
523a2(nyi khri): mgu ba chen po skyes shing /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos pa dang bdag 'di snyam du gyur to//gang 'di lta bu dag byed nus pa ni/rigs kyi bu 'di dka'
523a3(nyi khri): ba spyod pa ste ngo mtshar che'o//rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gis lus yongs su gtong na/bdag cag gis ci'i phyir chos 'di mchod par mi bya/'di
523a4(nyi khri): lta bu dag gi gnas su ci'i phyir smon lam mi gdab/bdag cag lo longs spyod rgya chen po rab tu mang du yod do snyam nas/bdag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la 'di skad smras so//
523a5(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu khyod bdag la gnod pa 'di lta bu ma byed cig/bdag gis nor mang po phra ma las bslangs te sbyin no//des khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /'phags
523a6(nyi khri): pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gro byos shig/bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
523a7(nyi khri): chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ste/bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bya'o//bdag kyang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen
523b1(nyi khri): pa'i bar du gang khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes smras so//de bas na yab yum nor mang po phal cher bdag la stsal te/bdag rigs
523b2(nyi khri): bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa bgyid du mchi bar ci gnang ///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
523b3(nyi khri): stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po bdun cu brgyad pa//de nas bu mo de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bu mo de la 'di skad smras so//bu mo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu de'i gtam byas pa ni rab tu dka'o//
523b4(nyi khri): 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa'i chos gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de 'di lta bu'i dka' ba nyams su len pa'i chos dri dag kyang shin tu bsam
523b5(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab bo//de bas na bu mo khyod nged kyis gnang ngo //nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de blta ba
523b6(nyi khri): dang /mchod pa byed du 'dong gis stobs byin cig/de nas bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa dang /bkur stir byed du 'dong
523b7(nyi khri): 'dod pa'i pha ma gnyis la 'di skad smras so//bdag ni su la'ang dge bo'i bar chad mi bgyid do//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang de'i pha ma la sogs pas/shing rta lnga brgya brgyan//
524a1(nyi khri): bu mo lnga brgya po de'ang brgyan nas/me tog sna tshogs rnams thogs/gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang chos gos
524a2(nyi khri): dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams thogs/gser gyi me tog dang /dngul gyi me tog rnams thogs/rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang /gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang /
524a3(nyi khri): baiDUr+ya dang /dung dang shel dang byu ru rnams thogs/bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /btung ba mang po thogs nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba
524a4(nyi khri): drang lhan cig tu shing rta gcig la zhon/bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta lnga brgya la zhon pas yongs su bskor/mdun du byas nas 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs
524a5(nyi khri): kyi phyogs gang na ba de logs su dong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba mthar gyis song song na/rgyang ring po zhig nas spyos can gyi grong
524a6(nyi khri): khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa mdzes shing lta na sdug pa/rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba bdun gyis bskor ba/rta babasra bdun dang ldan pa/'obs bdun dang /
524a7(nyi khri): shing rta la'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba/chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/zheng du'ang dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/phyug cing dar ba/bde zhing skyid pa/mi mang
524b1(nyi khri): pos rgyas pa/tshong 'dus kyi srang ri mo la bris pa lta bu lnga brgya dang ldan pa/bzhon pa lhan cig tu gshibs te 'gro ba'i zam pa dang bcas pa de lta bu mthong ngo //lam gyi mdo'i dbus
524b2(nyi khri): na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan gyi steng na/'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas chos 'chad
524b3(nyi khri): cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //des mthong ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i bde ba thob pa ni dper na/bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhugs pa'i dge slong sems rtso gcig tu bzhag pa de lta
524b4(nyi khri): bu'i bde ba thob par gyur to//mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag shing rta la zhon bzhin du 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i drung du 'gro
524b5(nyi khri): nga ni mi rigs so snyam du bsams nas/de shing rta las babs so//tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs po bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta de dag las babs so//de nas byang chub
524b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor/mdun du byas nas dpag tu med pa'i rgyan rnams
524b7(nyi khri): thogs te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ngo //de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags
525a1(nyi khri): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma rin po che sna bdun las byas pa zhig byas te/tsan+dan dmar pos brgyan pa/mu tig go dra ba bres pa/
525a2(nyi khri): brtsegs khang gi grwa bzhir me mar gyis snang ba bya ba'i phyir/nor bu rin po che 'od gsal ba rnams bkod do//dngul gyi pog por bzhi'ang bar snang las 'phyang du bcug ste/de na a
525a3(nyi khri): kA ru nag po gtsang mu'i bdug pa rnams 'thul ba ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa'i phyir ro//brtsegs khang de'i nang nu rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i
525a4(nyi khri): khri bzhag ste/de'i steng du ran po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag go/de'i nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUr+ya mthing gzhun mis bris pa bzhugs
525a5(nyi khri): so//brtsegs khang de'ang me tog dang dar sna tshogs kyi phreng ba rnams kyis dpyangs pas rab tu brgyan to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par
525a6(nyi khri): rab tu ngu ba de/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khung pa brtsegs ma de dpag tu med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo //lha stong phrag du ma rnams kyang
525a7(nyi khri): mthong /lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dang /lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang /lha'i dngul gyi phye mas khang pa brtsegs ma de dag la kun tu
525b1(nyi khri): 'thor/mngon par 'thor/rab tu mngon par 'thor ba dang /lha'i sil snyan dag sgrog pa thos nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/lha'i
525b2(nyi khri): dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad smras so//lha'i dbang po khyod ci'i phyir lha stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs ma 'di la me tog man+ta ra ba dang /tsan+dan gyi phye ma la
525b3(nyi khri): sogs pas 'thor/mngon par 'thor/lha'i sil snyan 'di dog kyang bar snang las lha rnams ci'i phyir sgrogs/de skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub
525b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod mi shes sam/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/byang chub sems dpa'
525b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces pa'i yum/skyed par mdzad pa bskrun pa/gtso mo yin te gang la bslabs na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan
525b6(nyi khri): thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
525b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad smras so//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
526a1(nyi khri): rnams kyi gces pa'i yum skyed par mdzad pa/bsnun pa gtso mo de gang na bzhugs/brgya byin gyis smras pa/'on+da lha khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang na/gser
526a2(nyi khri): glegs bu la bai DUr+ya mAthing gA zhun mas bris pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches kyis 'phags pas/rgya bdun gyis btab ste bzhag pas/de bdag cag
526a3(nyi khri): gis khyed la bsnyen du mi rung ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa/bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu
526a4(nyi khri): tshogs pas/me tog dang phreng ba dang /gos dang rin po che dang bdug pa dang /spos drang byug pa dang /phye ma dang /chos gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
526a5(nyi khri): ba dan dang /gser dang /dngul gyi me tog bdag cag gis khyer te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/de dag las kha cig ni
526a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhag go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu
526a7(nyi khri): bos/me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang gos dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs
526b1(nyi khri): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ngo //song nas kyang byang chub sems
526b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang /gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /ba
526b3(nyi khri): dan dang tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /gser dang dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir kun tu gtor/mngon par gtor/rab tu mngon par gtor to//de nas me tog
526b4(nyi khri): de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i steng du me tog gi brtsegs khang du gnas par gyur to//gser dang dngul gyi me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa de
526b5(nyi khri): dag kyang nam mkha' la gzhal yas khang du gnas par gyur to//chos gos dang /gos rin po che de dag kyang bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin lta bur gnas par gyur to//
526b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang /tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mchod pa
526b7(nyi khri): byas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems
527a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /de ltar mthu che ba dang /de ltar gzi brjid che ba ngo mtshar che'o//rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems
527a2(nyi khri): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang /de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dag rnam par sprul na/nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur na/lta smos
527a3(nyi khri): kyang ci dgos/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la dga' ba dang /gus pa
527a4(nyi khri): skyes nas de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs
527a5(nyi khri): po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang chos gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
527a6(nyi khri): po chos kyis 'phags pas thob pa'i chos de dag nyid thob par gyur cig/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de ji ltar shes rab
527a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed pa de ltar bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
527b1(nyi khri): kyis 'phags pa 'di ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la rab tu ston pa de ltar bdag cag kyang 'gro ba mang po la rab tu ston par gyur cig/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
527b2(nyi khri): po 'dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par
527b3(nyi khri): gyur cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam dag kyang btab bo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtog par rab tu dra ba dang /tshong dpon gyi bu mo lnga sogs pa bu mo lnga
527b4(nyi khri): brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la'ang bkur sti byas nas/byang
527b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/rjes dang bcas rim gro dang bcas/thal mo sbyar nas phyogs
527b6(nyi khri): gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
527b7(nyi khri): chos kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshal ba na/dgon pa zhig nas sgra thos pa/rigs kyi bu shar phyogs
528a1(nyi khri): su song zhig dang /de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro//de nas bdag gis sgra de thos pa dang /shar phyogs gang na ba de
528a2(nyi khri): logs su song song ba las/bdag 'di snyam du bdag gis sgra de la bdag ji srid cig tu 'gro dgos pa dang /su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos shing thob par 'gyur
528a3(nyi khri): ba ma dris so snyam du bsams so//de ltar bdag yid mi dga' ba dang mya ngan chen por gyur cing /sa phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag bdun lon te/bdag ji srid cig tu 'gro/
528a4(nyi khri): dgos/su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan du yod ces sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa'i mya ngan las gzhan pa kha zas
528a5(nyi khri): bza' ba'i sems kyang ma skyes so//de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas/des bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu 'di nas
528a6(nyi khri): dkra tshad lnga brgya nA/spos can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig yod de/der song zhig dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas shes
528a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa de khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro//de nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus bka' stsal pa bzhin du shar phyogs gang na ba
528b1(nyi khri): de logs su song song ba las/rgyang gis 'phags pas chos 'chang cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong ma thag tu'ang dper na/bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge slong gi
528b2(nyi khri): bde ba de lta bu thob par gyur to//bdag dga' zhing bde ba des khyab par gyur nas/sa phyogs de nyid nas ma g.yos par khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang cing 'dug pa thos so//
528b3(nyi khri): de thos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya phrag du ma skyes par gyur to//bdog de na 'dug pa'i tshe yang phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad cing rigs kyi bu
528b4(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba yin pas legs so//legs so//nged kyis kyang de dag la gnas nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su
528b5(nyi khri): rdzogs par byas so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to//bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di
528b6(nyi khri): snyam du gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gar gshegs snyam mo//de nas yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/'phags pa
528b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas
529a1(nyi khri): /pa la bslabs pa yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag /glang nas smyon pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag klung du bzhud pa d+ma bdag la ston tosnyam mo//da nga
