529a2(nyi khri): na rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du dashud pa bdag 'dre yis/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegasu
529a3(nyi khri): dedag ga las byon pa dang /gar bzhud pa ci nas kyang bdag cag gis shes par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bdag la ston cig
529a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i le'u ste/bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o///de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
529a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
529a6(nyi khri): pa rnams ni blang nas kyang ma byon/gang du'ang ma bzhud do//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mi g.yo ba'o//de bzhin nyid glang yin pa de/de bzhin gshegs
529a7(nyi khri): pa'i//rigs kyi bu skye ba med pa ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med de/skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong
529b1(nyi khri): ba'am 'gro ba med de/yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med de/stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
529b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu ji lta ba nyid la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la
529b3(nyi khri): ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/'gog pa gang yin
529b4(nyi khri): pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i dbyings la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/nam mkha'i dbyings gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rigs
529b5(nyi khri): kyi bu chos 'di rnams las gzhan pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no//rigs kyi bu chos 'di rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
529b6(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste/rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la ni rnam pa gnyis su med do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ni gcig ste/gnyis ma yin gsum
529b7(nyi khri): ma yin te/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin nyid na med pa'i phyir bgrang ba las 'das pa'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/mi zhig dpyid zla tha chung gi nyi ma'i gung la dpyid
530a1(nyi khri): kye nyi ma tsha bas gdungs pa na/smig rgyu g.yo ba mthong ba dang /de de dang de dag tu rgyug cing 'dir khrus bya'o//'dir chu btung ngo snyam du sems na/rigs kyi bu de
530a2(nyi khri): snyam du sems/chu gang nas 'ongs/sher phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po 'am/lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs kyi rgya mtshor 'gro 'am gang du 'gro/rtag
530a3(nyi khri): par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/rigs kyi bu smig rgyu ba la chu yod pa ma yin na/de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba lho ga la yod/rigs kyi bu dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa'i mo de ni smig
530a4(nyi khri): rgyub chu med pa la tshur 'du shes bskyed pas byis pa'i rigs/shes rab rtul po'i rigs te/de na chu'i ngo bo ni yod pa ma yin no//chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa rags
530a5(nyi khri): kyi bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin to/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam sbyar mngon par zhen nas/de dag
530a6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang /bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rigs/shes rab rtul po'i rigs so zhes brjod par bya ste/dper na mi zhig chu
530a7(nyi khri): med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o//rigs kyi bu chos nyid la
530b1(nyi khri): ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba myed de/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do//rigs kyi bu dper na/sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po che'i
530b2(nyi khri): tshogs sam/rta'i tshogs sam/shing rta'i tshogs sam/rkang thang gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am/'gro ba med de/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang
530b3(nyi khri): byon pa 'am bzhud pa med do//rigs kyi bu dper na mi zhig gi rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhi 'am/lnga 'am/bcu 'am/nyi shu 'am/
530b4(nyi khri): sum cu 'am bzhi bcu 'am/lnga bcu 'am/brgya 'am/stong ngam/brgya phrag stong ngam/dre bas kyang mang ba mthong nas sad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/
530b5(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud/rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa/rigs kyi bu rmi lam
530b6(nyi khri): gyi chos ni gang yang yongs su grub pa med de/rmi lam ni brdzun pa ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'o//chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmi
530b7(nyi khri): lam dang 'dra'o zhes/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/rigs kyi bu gang su'ang rung /chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes/de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa legs
531a1(nyi khri): par mi shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi tshogs sam/gzugs kyi tshogs su mngon par zhen pas/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa
531a2(nyi khri): dang /bzhud par rtog ste/'di ltar chos nyid rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa 'am/bzhud par 'dod pa de dag thams cad ni
531a3(nyi khri): byis pa so so'i skye bo ste/de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar dong 'dod 'dong bar 'gyur ro//de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thag ring /de dag
531a4(nyi khri): thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang thag ring ngo //rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes bshad pa legs par shes
531a5(nyi khri): pa de dag ni/chos gang yang 'ong ba 'am 'gro bar mi rtog go//gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
531a6(nyi khri): byang chub tu nye bar gyur to//de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//de dag ni de bzhinani gshegs pa'i slob ma ste/grong khyer gyi bsod snyoms don yod par
531a7(nyi khri): za'o//de dag 'jig rten pa'i sbyin gnas so//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che rnams ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/lho phyogs dang /
531b1(nyi khri): nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /mtshams rnams dang /steng dang 'og dang /phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/'on kyang sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus
531b2(nyi khri): rgya mtsho chen por rin po che rnams 'byung ste/de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang mo yin gyi/rgyu dang rkyen rnams la rag lus pa/rten cing 'brel pa las 'byung ngo //rin po che de dag rang
531b3(nyi khri): por 'gyur ba na'ang phyogs bcu gang du'ang mi 'pho ste dong ba med mod kyi/'on kyang rkyen gang rnams yod pa lngas/rin po che de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen rnams med par gyur
531b4(nyi khri): pa las rin po che de rnams med par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma
531b5(nyi khri): byon/gang du'ang mi bzhud ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin gyi sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la rag
531b6(nyi khri): lus pa rgyu las kun tu byung ba sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sems can gyi dmigs pa dang ldan pa las snang ste/phyogs bcu gang na'ang yod pa ni ma yin gyi rgyu dang rkyen
531b7(nyi khri): gang rnams yod pa las sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa'i rgyu dang rkyen de rnams med pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/pi bang
532a1(nyi khri): gi sgra 'byung ba'i tshe/gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/'gag pa'i tshe gang du'ang mi 'gro gang du'ang 'pho ba med la/brten cing yang 'byung ba rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus so//
532a2(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/pi bang gi khog pa dang /pags pa dang /yu ba dang /rgyud dang blang ba dang sbreng shing dang mi'i rtsol ba la brten nas pi bang gi sgra 'byung ste/sgra de'ang khog pa
532a3(nyi khri): las kyang ma byung /pags pa dang /yu ba dang /rgyud rnams dang /sbreng shing las kyang ma byung /blang ba dang /mi'i rtsol ba las kyang ma byung mod kyi/'on kyang thams
532a4(nyi khri): cad 'dus shing ldan pa las sgra 'byung ngo //'gag pa na'ang sgra de gang du'ang mi 'gro/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs
532a5(nyi khri): pa'ang /rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las yongs su rdzogs pa'o//rgyu gcig las ma byung /rkyen gcig las ma byung /dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig
532a6(nyi khri): las sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba ma yin no//rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin te/rgyu dang rkyen du ma tshogs pa las byung ba de gang nas kyang ma byon/rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med
532a7(nyi khri): na'ang gang du'ang mi bzhud do//rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon pa dang /bzhud pa blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams
532b1(nyi khri): cad kyi/chos nyid kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med par rab tu
532b2(nyi khri): shes na/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa la'ang nges par spyod par 'gyur ro//
532b3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang /bzhud pa med pa ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
532b4(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul to//bdud kyi gnas thams
532b5(nyi khri): cad kyang 'khrugs/nyams par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/rtsi shing dang /sman dang nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang
532b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na bya de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to//dus ma yin pa'i me tog rnams kyang byung bar gyur/steng gi bar
532b7(nyi khri): snang las kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bab par gyur/rnga'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang steng gi bar snang las grag par gyur to//rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya
533a1(nyi khri): byin gyis kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dang /lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /lha'i me tog dang /
533a2(nyi khri): phye ma gzhan dag gis kyang gtor/mngon par gtor/rab tu mngon par gtor nas/tshig 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yon tan gyis deng bdag cag rnams kyis kyang //
533a3(nyi khri): don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba/'jig tshogs la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma yin pa bshad pa thos so///
533a4(nyi khri): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad smras so//sa chen po
533a5(nyi khri): 'di g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang yin/rkyen gang yin/chos kyis 'phags pas smras pa/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa med pa dang /bzhud pa med
533a6(nyi khri): pa bshad pa 'di khyod kyis dris/ngas bshad pa na/srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur/srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par
533a7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/srog chags stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni rdul med cing dri ma med par gyur nas/chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur pa'i
533b1(nyi khri): phyir ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/bdag gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
533b2(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa'i chos bshad pa 'di yongs su dris pa las/sems can 'di snyed cig gi don byas pa ni/bdag gis
533b3(nyi khri): rnyed pa rab tu rnyed do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni de nyid kyis tshig go//de phyi ni chad ni bdag la bla na
533b4(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu the tshom mi 'byung /bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba la dgos pa
533b5(nyi khri): med do snyam nas de dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba dang /yid bde ba de nyid dang ldan pas/shing ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/shring ta la bdun tsam gyi nam
533b6(nyi khri): mkha' la gnas te/'di snyam du bdag 'di ltar bar snang la 'dug pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la cis mchod snyam du bsams
533b7(nyi khri): pa dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba nam mkha' la 'phags pa mthong nas de sems la yongs su rtog
534a1(nyi khri): pa sems kyis shes te lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag de la byin nas 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod me tog 'di dag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'
534a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa byos shig/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus dang sems can stong phrag mang po rnams kyi don byas par gyur pa'i phyir
534a3(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu khyod la nged kyis phan gdags so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar spro bar byas pa de lta bur/gang sems can thams cad kyi don du bskal pa tshad med grangs
534a4(nyi khri): med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de lta bu dag rab tu dkon no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog man+da ra ba dag
534a5(nyi khri): blangs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la gtor/mngon par gtor/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis
534a6(nyi khri): 'phags pa la bdag gi lus kyis kyang bkab nas tshig 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod la deng phan chad g.yog bya ba'i phyir bdag gi lus kyang 'bul lo zhes nas//
534a7(nyi khri): de bar snang las babs te bdag phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/de nas tshong dpon gyi
534b1(nyi khri): bu mo dang bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag cag kyang 'di ltar lus 'bul
534b2(nyi khri): lo/bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag nyid thob par gyur cig/phyin chad kyang khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa
534b3(nyi khri): byed par gyur cig/khyod dang lhan cig tu gnas par gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga
534b4(nyi khri): brgya po de dag la 'di skad smras so//bu mo khyod snying nas de'i bsam pa dang mthun par byed cing /snying nas nga la lus 'bul na ni nga'ang khyed len to//bu mo de dag gis smras pa
534b5(nyi khri): bdag cag khyod la snying nas bsam pa dang mthun par byed cing /khyod ci dgos po bya ba'i phyir snying nas lus 'bul lo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
534b6(nyi khri): po rtag par rab tu ngu byas/tshong dpon gyi bu mo de la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya rnams rgyan thams cad kyis klubs/shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyang rgyan gyis brgyan nas/
534b7(nyi khri): thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la phul te/rigs kyi bu khyod la bu mo 'di rnams dang /shing rta lnga brgya po 'di rnams yongs
535a1(nyi khri): su spyad par bya ba'i phyir dbul lo zhes smras so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la rigs kyi bu legs so/legs so zhes nas/legs
535a2(nyi khri): pa byin te/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o//gtong ba'i sems de lta bu dag gis
535a3(nyi khri): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//chos smra ba la de ltar mchod pa
535a4(nyi khri): byas na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa nyan nus par 'gyur ro//sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
535a5(nyi khri): de rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/gtong ba de lta bu la gnas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu bsgrubs//
535a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa'ang yongs su dris so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas/byang chub sems
535a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams dang shing
535b1(nyi khri): na / na du gas bad sa shA na//da chub sa mams na rnam sa 'phags pa na
535b2(nyi khri): na sna drug gi khyim du song ngo //nyim 'ang nub par gyur //de nas byung tshun sam+b+has dang sas dpa chen po rnag pa ba tu du ba 'di snyam du gyur te//ba ga chos
535b3(nyi khri): 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la/'dug pa'am/nyal ba ni legs pa ma yin lo/bdag krIrgyu ma yin gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags
535b4(nyi khri): pa bdag gi ma nus chos 'argya ba'i phyir ma byung gi bar du 'phreng ba'am/chag pa'i snod lam gnyis kyis bsrid du stsa pa ma//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
535b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po/chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun du rnams par zhugs pa gcig la gnas te/byang chub sems dpa'i ting ngange 'dzin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs
535b6(nyi khri): mkhas pa las byung ba stong phrag blangs med tshod med pa las gnas par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rkyen po rtak+Sha par rab tu du ba'ang lo bdun du 'dod pa'i
535b7(nyi khri): rnam par rtog pa mi bskyed/gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang /rol chags pa mi bskyed kyi/gzhan du ni byang chub sems dpa'
536a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rigs kyi bu de gang la 'dug nas chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan gding bar bya na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
536a2(nyi khri): chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di langs pa ji tsam na mthong snyam pa dang /sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa/shes rab
536a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa 'chad pa'i sa phyogs de'ang phyag dar byas shing chag chag gis btab la/me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu gtor to snyam pa las bsam
536a4(nyi khri): pa gzhan med do//tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob cing
536a5(nyi khri): spyod lam gnyis po de nyid kyis sdod cing 'khod do//bya ba thams cad kyang de dang rjes su mthun par byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
536a6(nyi khri): kyis 'phags pa zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ste/langs nas kyang grong khyer gyi dbus su chos 'chad do zhes zer ba'i sgra nam mkha' las byung ba/byang chub sems
536a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas thos so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas sba de thos nas/dga' mgu yi
536b1(nyi khri): rangs rab tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po rnams dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de byi dor byas nas/chos kyi stan rin po
536b2(nyi khri): che sna bdun las byas pa'ang bting ngo //de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po thams cad kyis bdag cag gi blo gos lus las phud de stan gang la/byang chub
536b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'dug ste/chos 'chad pa'i chos kyi stan der bla gos lnga brgya snyan du bting ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
536b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba/sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i phyir kho ra khor yug tu chu btsal na/sa phyogs de chag chag gdab pa'i chu bdud sdig to can gyis ci nas
536b5(nyi khri): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba chu ma rnyed nas/sems la sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi dga' ba dang /sems gzhan du gyur te/de'i
536b6(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba med par gyur cing /mchod pa de'ang ngan par 'gyur ba de lta bur bya ba'i phyir/chu de med pa byas pas chu ma rnyed par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
536b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to//'o na bdag gi lus phug ste/sa phyogs 'di khrag gis chag chag gdab bo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sa phyogs 'di ni rdul
537a1(nyi khri): che ste/rdul de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i lus la ma rung bar gyur na bdag gi lus nges par 'jig par 'gyur
537a2(nyi khri): ba 'dis ci zhig bya/bdag gi lus don med par chud zos pa bas 'di ltar byas na bdag gi lus med par gyur kyang bla'o//bdag gi lus stong phrag du ma 'dod pa'i rgyu dang /
537a3(nyi khri): 'dod pa'i gzhi dang /'dod pa'i mtshan mar 'khor ba na yang dang yang du 'khor ba'i tshe/chud zos kyi gnas 'di lta bu dag tu ni ma song ngo //de nas byang chub sems
537a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba mtshon rnon po zhig thogs te bdag gi lus kun phug nas/sa phyogs de kun bdag gi khrag gi chag chag btab bo//
537a5(nyi khri): tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rjes su slob pas/thams cad
537a6(nyi khri): kyis mtshon rnon po blangs nas/bdag cag gi lus phug ste/sa phyogs de bdag cag gi khrag gis chag chag btab bo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
537a7(nyi khri): chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang /bu mo de rnams kyang sems gzhan du ma gyur te/bdud sdig to can gyis dge ba'i phyogs la bar chang bya ba'i skabs rnyed par yang
537b1(nyi khri): ma gyur to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di de ltar chos 'dod pa dang /de ltar
537b2(nyi khri): yi dam la brtan pa dang /go cha chen po bgos pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par
537b3(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/lhag pa'i bsam pas 'di ltar sems can rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las yongs su
537b4(nyi khri): thar par bya bor sems pa de ngo mtshar che'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de thams cad lha'i tsan+dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs so//sa phyogs de kho ra khor
537b5(nyi khri): yug kyang lha'i tsan+dan gyi chu'i dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tshad brgya'i bar du bsrung bar byas so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub sems dpa'
537b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /khyod chos 'dod pa dang /chos 'tshol
537b7(nyi khri): ba bla na med pa de legs so//legs so//rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang lhag pa'i
538a1(nyi khri): bsam pa de lta bu dang /brtson 'grus de lta bu dang /chos 'dod pa de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrubs so//de nas byang chub
538a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di snyam du gyur to//bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i
538a3(nyi khri): chos kyi stan ni bting zin/sa phyogs 'di'ang chag chag btab cing phyag dar byas zin na/sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog gis gtor ba dang /'phags pa byang chub sems
538a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos 'chang pa la gtor ba'i me tog bla dag gis ga las rnyed snyam pa dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub
538a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so//rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man+da ra ba 'dri rnams khyer la/'di dag gis sa phyogs 'di khyod
538a6(nyi khri): kyis me tog gis gtor cig/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan la 'dug cing /chos 'chad pa la'ang gtor
538a7(nyi khri): cig ces nas/des lha'i me tog man+da ra ba khol bzhi brgya de la byin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas me tog de dag blangs
538b1(nyi khri): nas/me tog kha cig na sa phyogs der gtor/me tog kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhag go/de nas
538b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa lo bdun lon pa dang /ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/chos kyi stan gang ni 'dug pa der song nas/
538b3(nyi khri): stan btang ba la 'dug ste/'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor/mdun du byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
538b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la
538b5(nyi khri): me tog gis mchod pa byas so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis
538b6(nyi khri): 'phags pa mthong nas dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa yid la byed pa rtse gcig tu gyur pa de lta bu'i bde ba rab tu thob par gyur/de la byang
538b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa ni 'di lta ste/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/shes
539a1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do//chos thams cad rnam par dben pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dben no//chos thams cad
539a2(nyi khri): mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi g.yo ba nyid do//chos thams cad sems pa med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sems
539a3(nyi khri): pa med pa nyid do//chos thams cad mnan pa med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnan pa med pa nyid do//chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha
539a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do//chos thams cad mtha' yas pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do//chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir/shes
539a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do//chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do//nam mkha' mtha' yas pa'i
539a6(nyi khri): phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do//rgya mtsho mtha' yos pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do//ri rab lta bur rnam
539a7(nyi khri): po sna tshogs pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid do//nam mkha' ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
539b1(nyi khri): pa rnam par ma rtog pa nyid do//gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthA' yas parjod do//de bzhin du tshur ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed/
539b2(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yos pa nyid do//sa'i khams mtha' yis pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon
539b3(nyi khri): pa mtha' yas pa nyid do//de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yos
539b4(nyi khri): panyid do//nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid do//rdo rje lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gyur
539b5(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do//chos thams cad 'jig pa myod pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig pa med pa nyid do//chos thams
539b6(nyi khri): cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do//chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/shes rab
539b7(nyi khri): kyipha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do//chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do//chos thams cad
540a1(nyi khri): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
540a2(nyi khri): po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin du 'dug pa las/de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nges par
540a3(nyi khri): byung ngo //chos thams cad rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad
540a4(nyi khri): sems pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
540a5(nyi khri): chos thams cad mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad skyo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa zhes bya
540a6(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ri rab rnam pa sna tshogs
540a7(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzugs mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /tshor ba dang /'du
540b1(nyi khri): shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sa'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i
540b2(nyi khri): khams dang /rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dadrang /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
540b3(nyi khri): dang /chos thams cad mi phyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad rnam par 'jig
540b4(nyi khri): pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad spyod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
540b5(nyi khri): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa na rab tu thob par 'gyur te/de la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo stong phrag drug brgya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
540b6(nyi khri): rtag par rab tu ngu bas rab tu thob par gyur to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/chos kyis 'phags pa'i le'u ste/bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o///
540b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang /lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /
541a1(nyi khri): byang phyogs dang /mtshams rnams dang /bla 'og dang /phyogs bcu gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sangs rgyas
541a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du byas pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/tshul 'di nyid dang /ming 'di nyid dang /tshig 'di
541a3(nyi khri): nyid dang /yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad pa mthong ba ni/dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na du byang chub
541a4(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du byas shing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba/tshul 'di nyid dang /ming 'di nyid dang /tshig 'di nyid dang /yi ge 'di
541a5(nyi khri): dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad cing 'dug pa lta bu'o//de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pas/thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan
541a6(nyi khri): par gyur to//tshe rabs thams cad du'ang nam yang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar gyur to//tshe rab sa thams cad du gang drang gang du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yod
541a7(nyi khri): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skyes nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon sum du chos nyan to//chung ngu na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/
541b1(nyi khri): /dang /chos nyan dang /byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral lo//de ma kham pa thams cad spangs shing ngal 'byor dang ldan par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cha dang
541b2(nyi khri): ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar rig par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
541b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'o//de bas na kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
541b4(nyi khri): thob par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' sprul pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis
541b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdagaso pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhig/rmongs shig/lhogs shig/kun chub par
541b6(nyi khri): gyis shig/gzhan la'ang rgyas par ston cig/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang mnyan par bya/gzung bar bya
541b7(nyi khri): bcang bar bya/klag par bya/kun chub par bya/bsgrag par bya/bstan par bya/bshad par bya/kha ton du bya/rab tu bsgom par bya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis
542a1(nyi khri): chung ngun/glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal bar bris te me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
542a2(nyi khri): mtshan dang /ba dan dang /kho ra khor yug tu'ang mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa du mas mchod cing /rim gror bya/bla mar bya/bsti stang du bya/mchod par bya/brjed par bya/gus par bya ste/
542a3(nyi khri): 'di ni ngas rjes su btams pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni/shes rab kyi
542a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la rag lus pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
542a5(nyi khri): bdag gi ston pa lags so//bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka'
542a6(nyi khri): stsal to//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin te/khyod kyis yongs su spyad do//kun dga' bo khyod kyis byams pa'i lus kyi las yid du 'ong zhing /yid du mi 'ong
542a7(nyi khri): ba ma yin pa dang /byams pa'i ngag gi las yid du 'ong zhing yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang /byams pa'i yid kyi las yod du 'ong zhing yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pas yongs su spyad
542b1(nyi khri): do//de bas na kun dga' bo nga da ltar lus 'di la gnas shing 'tsho skyong ba na/gang khyod kyis byams pa dang dga' ba dang /bla mar byas pa de/nga 'das pa'i 'og tu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
542b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di la gyis shig/kun dga' bo khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du gtod cing rjes su gtad kyis/khyod kyis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di med par mi 'gyur
542b3(nyi khri): bar gyis shig/kun dga' bo ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bzhugs par rig par bya/de srid du de bzhin gshegs
542b4(nyi khri): pa chos 'chad par rig par bya'o//kun dga' bo sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par
542b5(nyi khri): byed pa dang /sgrog pa dang /ston pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /'dri ba dang /rim gror byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /bsti stang du byed pa dang /mchod par byed pa dang /rjed par byed
542b6(nyi khri): po dang /gus par byed cing /me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug po dang /gos dang /phye ma dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /kho ra khor yug tu
542b7(nyi khri): mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pas mchod par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba/chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o//kun dga' bo
